☰ Document Outline

The by Mpu Monaguṇa

Current Version: draft, 2025-04-18Z
Still in progress – do not quote without permission.
  • Witnesses
  • Metadata

List of Witnesses

  • : Peter M.WorsleyS.SupomoThomas M.HunterMargaretFletcherMpu Monaguṇa’s Sumanasāntaka: An Old Javanese Epic Poem, Its Indian Source and Balinese IllustrationsBrillLeiden2013Bibliotheca Indonesica36

Metadata of the Edition

  • Title:
  • Text Identifier:

avighnam astu

saṅ hyaṅ-hyaṅ pinakādideva ni karas para kavi makatattva ṅ akṣara saṅ saṅkan paran iṅ palambaṅ atidurlabha kahanan ira n kavīśvara saṅ sūkṣmê* kukus iṅ tanah kinikir iṅ kuku ri səḍəṅ iṅ aṅrəgəp laṅə̄ māyākāra vinimba nitya sinamādhi* manurunana caṇḍi pustaka 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sambandhanya k aṅarcanê pada nirâhyun ajar-ajara milva riṅ kavi yekī kāraṇa ni ṅhulun praṇata bhakti ri sira magave namaskr̥ti luṅgah niṅ kalaṅə̄n sapuṅgəl asəkar kakavin inuparəṅgan iṅ laṅə̄ puṣpāñjalya ri jə̄ṅ nira n Sumanasāntaka caritakənâstu sanmatan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pūrvaprastuti niṅ kathā hana sira dvija taruṇa suśīla subrata śiṣyâgastya* sira prakāśa karəṅə̄ kasutapan ira nora tan vruha khyātîṅ rāt Tr̥ṇavindu nāma pinakesi niṅ ujar-ujar iṅ kadevatan sakveh niṅ hyaṅ anaṅśayê hyuna nirâṅadəha ri paṅadəg Surādhipa 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndan saṅ hyaṅ Suranātha mukhya pinakādi niṅ avədi manaṅśayê hati lvir tan duhkha sira ndan i tvas aviveka riṅ aṅənana de niṅ olaha gūḍhākāra nira n vikalpa kadi tan hana panaha-nahā nirâlaha prāyê saṅ suyaśa n təka ṅ bhaya sakêṅ musuh avədi kaciryanâvədi 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvantən rakva varāpsarī linəvih iṅ sa-Haripada vagəd vicakṣaṇa prajña dyah Hariṇī* ṅaranya tuvi vaṅśaja vəka-vəka devaputrikā sākṣāt hrū nikaṅ indracāpa subhagêṅid-iṅidan i hayunya dug siṅī aṅhiṅ sāra hiḍəp hyaṅ Indra śaraṇāśraya paṅalaha śakti niṅ tapa 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yekī rakva kinon hyaṅ Indra marəkâṅucap-ucapa rahasya riṅ taman śīghrânəmbah acum vulat nika sinuṅsuṅ iṅ ujar amanis priyambada om putrī saṅ anəmva kāṣṭaguṇan aṅhilaṅakəna kaśaktin iṅ tapa aṅhiṅ māsku sinambhavâsiha paṅə̄bana niṅ aśaraṇêṅ kadevatan 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvantən brāhmaṇa siddhiśakti magave tapa katəka-təkêṅ surālaya maṅde saṅśaya ni ṅhulun ndan aləməh katəṅəra ri vikalpa niṅ hati saṅkṣepanya lumampahânaku mamañcana maṅənəsa tan parovaṅa eñjiṅ māsku lumakva və̄rakəna riṅ hima sumiliba tan hana vruha 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan de nira mojar asru paṅutus nira lumarisa tan vruh iṅ bhaya kepvan dyah Hariṇī katon gəgəh i suṅsut ira yadin apakṣa laṅghana rəs lāvan pagəh iṅ kabhaktin ika kāraṇa niki n ubhaya n lumampaha paṅgil paṅhvata janma liṅnya səḍəṅanya karahatana riṅ pamañcanan 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mantuk dyah Hariṇī manəmbah i* Surendra ri vijila nikā madandana* eñjiṅ maṅkat akañcugâdarupa bhūṣaṇa nika pinasaṅnya tūt hənū tan kvâmbəknya lumampa-lampah* aṅəlih kasusu laku nikâṅhade-hade denyâdharma ri de nirâṅutus amighnanana tapa tatan hanâṅrvaṅi 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅūni n pamvit i jə̄ṅ Surendra maməgəṅ taṅis inimur-imur kinə̄lakən maṅke n sampun adoh* lakunya vənaṅ aṅləpasakəna taṅisnya riṅ havan lagy ânambatakən laranya kasihan pati səsəl anəsəl purākr̥ta tūt mārgāmbara luhnya tan papəgatan drava kadi titis iṅ maṇik bañu 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kāṅən denya katuhvan iṅ giṇa mamighnani tapa vipathâgave hala yadyastun kavaśā pira ṅ sukha təmun yan amuhara hala ndya don ikā mvaṅ yan tan kavaśā katon tətəp i śāpa nira paṅavaśanya tan vuruṅ kodāsīnan irêka ta pva pinalar-palar ika siha saṅ hyaṅ Īśvara 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mampəh mātra laranya luhnya pinakembuh i manis i matanya yan vulat luṅsur-luṅsur ikaṅ tapih pinakatambəh i raras i təṅah nikâlaris hrəknyâlvan ya samar-samar tuna-tunâmuvuhi manis i de nikâṅucap aśrī varṇa nikâṅəlih vənəs ikâṅhaləpi kadi vənəs niṅ abrata 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

luṅhā lampah ikânəlat ri hirəṅ iṅ gagana hanan avās hanan samar rəp mukṣânusup iṅ rəməṅ kadi vulan lumaku kasaputan lamad-lamad lvir vintaṅ sumurup katonan ika riṅ vəkasan asəmu marmakê kapə̄ rəm niṅ megha tinūtakənya manicip-nicipi javuh avarṇa cātaka 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ramyanya n paməgat laṅit ləpas adoh təka ri sadavatā nikaṅ limut agyā de ni panas hyaṅ arka karaṇanya n alisuh atavəṅ-tavəṅ hima prāpta ṅ truh sumaput prabhāva ni lakunya vahu mari huyaṅnya kāṅinan tūt Gaṅgâhavan indracāpa tumurun lari nika sukha mampir iṅ vukir 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vatv ânuṅgul amarvatâhrit aguhâtupis atiba-tiban latāṅkura ṅkā teka n dumunuṅ lukar ni darupanya pinahayu lugas siniṅsətan* tistis tan hana tīrthayātra viku śakty atapa katəmu śūnya kevala aṅhiṅ handiva-handivâgaravalan katəmu marək anuṅsuṅ iṅ guyu 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

priṅgâtyanta ruhurnya mānuṣa paran vənaṅa mara ri dohnya durgama ṅhiṅ saṅ paṇḍita saṅ huvus tuməmu ṅ aṣṭaguṇa sira vənaṅ marêrika hetu dyah Hariṇī vənaṅ mara kajanman ika saphala devakanyakā lər denya n tumurun savaṅ garagatī tumurun ahavan antih-antihan 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tiṅhalnyâbayaṅan mamet i patapan saṅ atapa parananya bañcanan* riṅ Vindhyācala* rîndrakīla saləbak vukir ika pinaran katuṅkulan mvaṅ riṅ Revatakāgra Gandhamadanādri masamun apa tan hanâtapa hetunya n bhramitâpəgâkuliliṅan kadi pakalaṅan iṅ niśākara 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lambuṅ niṅ Himavān kidul hana ta parvata śuci patapan hañar katon tumraṅ* teja nika prabhāva nira saṅ sutapa tilaka niṅ jitendriya aṅlīlâṅililan pahoman ira sə̄h kukus ika maṅadəg nirantara lvīr oṅkāra mavindunāda kadi hənva nira hələm anəmva śūnyatā 18

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

buddhi dyah Hariṇī tumiṅhal irikaṅ patapan asəmu harṣa niścaya byaktâvās Tr̥ṇavindu ta pva makapājaran iki liṅ ikânəhər marək līlâṅambah i hambal iṅ jalada saṅsaya samar asamun hibək javuh miṅsor lvīr ahavan turun-turunan iṅ gupura sukha hanan kadînulur 19

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

prāptêṅ parvata śūnya kayvan ika pakṣa vukir asəgəh iṅ hañar ḍatəṅ haryan mvaṅ hujuṅan sakêṅ* pisaṅ alasnya rumarasah amet kalālatā sakveh niṅ vulakan sumaṅgraha bañunya valahar ika pakṣa sāgara jaṅgâṅambəki pakṣa kasturi vaṅinya hinaturakən iṅ drəs iṅ barat 20

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vahv âron anak iṅ pakis haji katon sukət i pasusupanya durgama sakveh niṅ kayu nora tan pagati de niṅ anila təka riṅ tr̥ṇāṅkura ndan trāsâsəpi tan paron kapanasan paḍa ragas amalar-malar javuh vaṅkal seṅvan alīt-alīt bataṅ agə̄ṅa hələm i paṅadəgnya riṅ juraṅ 21

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lvir tan pahyaṅ ikāṅ alas hana giraṅnya vahu linavad iṅ varāpsarī tapvan marma dahat panuṅsuṅ ika kevala kusuma yayā maveh sukha lumrâkveh* tumibêṅ gəluṅ kadi tinap savaṅ aṅit-aṅitan səkar taji kady âṅəmbaṅ akon aṅantya pakamaṅgala nika tanəmən ya devatī 22

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ləṅləṅ niṅ talagânamar tasik anak tuna-tuna kavi nora maṅləṅəṅ * paṅgaṅ vvadnya kakumbah iṅ bañu sulurnya vahu mətu satuṅtuṅ iṅ tanah i groṅ-groṅ i pasir-pasirnya mavatu dyan aniru-niru piṇḍa niṅ karas līlâṅanti darā putihnya kadi śaṅkha madulur aṅurambat iṅ hənī 23

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkā ta dyah Hariṇī marâdyus aməḍar təṅah abuṅah amavvahan gaḍiṅ mālih ṣaṭpada niṅ saroruha malivran i vətis ika kesisan tapih romanyâvilətan marê susu nikâniru-niru rakət iṅ lumut-lumut kəmbaṅ niṅ kumudâṅlilir kadi tinaṅhi vinulatan ikâṅdadak məkar 24

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ri sampun ika məntas aṅliga-ligā kadi taman aśarīra devatī titis-titis ikaṅ vəhaṅ satitis iṅ bañu vulakan anumbər iṅ paras *lumə̄ṅ amiluluk* gaḍiṅ kahudanan susu nika kasarambahan bañu sirat ni bañu niṅ gəluṅ kinirab aṅhiribi kukus i sāri niṅ puḍak 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

titis ni madhu niṅ madhubrata baṅun ləṅa vaṅi humaḍaṅ hanêṅ śilā pavitra hana tīrtha nirmala sumaṅgraha ri harəp avarṇa pahyasan hrəbuk-hrəbuk i kəmbaṅ iṅ sarasijâsəmu havu-havu muṅgu riṅ cupu hirəṅ ni kucup iṅ trikañcu suməlat kadi sipat avavan puḍak-puḍak 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lumampah aṅəlih kaṅelan apa tan tahu mahas-ahas iṅ vanāśrama səkar niṅ asanâmayuṅ* kuniṅ apiṇḍa mamayuṅana kāla niṅ panas paḍâṅrəs atatā ṅ* vuluh kadi harəp təkənakəna tan intar aṅhaḍaṅ gaḍuṅ kadi kamāsihən paḍa lumuṅ baṅun aharəp anuntunêṅ hənū 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

huvus təka riṅ āśramâṅiṅət-iṅət ry ulaha nika məne n panəmbaha nəhər lumaku muṅgah iṅ gupura saṅśaya manaha-nahā marê daləm aluṅguh irikaṅ bukur paṅaraṅanya nəhər asidəhâṅure gəluṅ cəcək masahuran sakê vuri pinakpak ika pinakadūta niṅ hala 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


bhagavān Tr̥ṇavindu səḍəṅ ajapa nitya Śivasmaraṇa asamādhi kumə̄l katəmu həniṅ i buddhi nira n humənəṅ dvija śukla suśīla sira pinakadarśana riṅ patapan kadi Vaiṣṇavavimba pavulatan ira n pamutər guduha 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

i rare nira ṅūni hati nira hibək sukət aṅrahabi inənə̄ ni rajah tamah ira karaṇanya n aron asəvə̄ atuha pva sira vruh aṅaji guṇa niṅ guru nora kari hana sattvaguṇâmaṅani sukət i buddhi nira n patapa 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vijayêṅ patapan dvijavara makasādhana yoga nira anukūla ri jə̄ṅ nira sahana niṅ indriya nora vani aṇimā laghimādi kakaratala de ni samādhi nira kamumukṣuhan aṅhaḍa marək akəlir svaśarīra nira 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri huvus ni samādhi nira linəsu rakva harəp mijila anəlat rarab iṅ rərəb aṅuraṅi tan panələs harəpan larap iṅ kilat iṅ gagana kadi dinəmvan aganti lumə̄ṅ paṅapə̄ ni gərəhnya kadi mamisiki n hana vāhu ḍatəṅ 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


mijil munivarâhavan həniṅ i buddhi nira laku nirâṅhade-hade pijər mulat i posik iṅ jaladhi ramya təpi nika katuṅku-tuṅkulan ri tiṅhal ira riṅ bukur saṅ araras vinulatan ira maṅligā-ligā ya kāraṇa nira n parâgaravalan saṅ ahayu tumuluy madan tapih 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ ugratapa nirvikāra tamuyan vəkas iṅ ahayu riṅ kadevatan salah səmu manis-manis nira baṅun manis iṅ anəmu mitra riṅ hənū dudū sukha nira n mulat paḍa lavan sukha niṅ atamuyan* kadaṅ-kadaṅ ikaṅ turida rāga sampun amatəh milu-milu mamiratyakən manah 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aniṅsəti həniṅ ni buddhi nira śuddha ni basahan ira n siniṅsətan subaddha daluvaṅ siṅī pinakabaddha nira pamadha* riṅ rajah tamah samar tura-turah ni bhasma nira paṅgəsəṅ ira viṣayâtəmah havu* jamaṅ kadi mahā taraṅtaṅən i sampət ira huvus anampətîndriya 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

marək sira sulakṣaṇâdara maṅakṣama* kaməna nira n paluṅguha katon upaśamâtalaṅkup aṅagəm kayu kanaka supattralepana tamuy nira maseva dharma pakatonan i manah ika bhakti kevala prasiddha guru śiṣya rūpa nira kālih i papupul irêrikaṅ bukur 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

anəmbah ikaṅ apsarī mətu rarasnya tan asarag aṅambək-ambəki ləməs ni luṅayanya kālih ajajar kadi pəpəsa kahambəṅ iṅ susu laris ni jarijinya sampun atalaṅkup inayat inamər marêṅ mukha amatyakən i raśmi-raśmi ni liriṅnya n api miṅay aṅīrakən vulat 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lanâṅiṅət-iṅət dvijeśvara tumon hayu nika viniveka riṅ hati tulis kanaka vahv inuṅkaban aṅāśraya ri buṅah ika n pabhūṣaṇa ahadyan ahənəṅ nəhər masidəhâsəmu taruban i kāla niṅ gave yadin halivatêṅ sabhā tan alaraṅ haləpakəna maḍampa mās tatur 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sinaṅśaya nirâlumâluñuta madhya nika kulayən iṅ pasaṅgaman susunya vinaliṅ nirêmva gamələn ri kahiḍəpan ikôṇḍuh-onḍuhan vətisnya kadi marvi maṅgarita paṅkvakəna kahiḍəpanya de nira mukhanya gumavaṅ ya rakva tinahâlvaṅa hilaṅa ri kāla niṅ tiləm 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hyaṅ iṅ nagara kālasan pavulatanya n anuruni rikaṅ vanāśrama madhubrata baṅun pinañjiṅan ikâṅidəri salaga mətta riṅ səkar puḍak kadi panəmpa-nəmpahan ikâsəmu maniliha lambay iṅ ṭikā amānuṣa hayunya kenaka nikâmulaṅunakəna riṅ jitendriya 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kayogyan iṅ apiṇḍa ratna liniṅir saparana nika ta pva həmbanən hade kuməḍapa n vulat yan aṅadəg təhər aṅadəga tan paluṅguha yadin lukara kenya tan vruh amahayva kahaləp ika denya n aṅligā savaṅ-savaṅ iṅ aṅhəmū guyu kapantəs ika pamapaganya riṅ vulat 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


āścarya buddhi bhagavān Tr̥ṇavindu denya ndātan hana hyun ira mātra sumə̄ṅa riṅ tvas kevalya susthira manah nira tan prapañca masvāgatâmanis ujar nira sārjavâtvaṅ 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan kṣamākəna kamîbu paran kitâri strī tan vruh iṅ bhaya ri durgama niṅ vanādri aṅhiṅ katon kita vənaṅ mara nirvikāra prāptâṅənəs maniluman baṅun indrajāla 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

āsəṅka ni ṅhulun i māsku təkanta maṅko strī niṅ viśeṣapuruṣa prabhu cakravarti tan sah kinuṇḍaṅ i səḍəṅ niṅ aburva-burvan ndā ṅke n katəmva samayanta lavan priyanta 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

strī tan padharma ta kunaṅ kita kāri śoka svāminta tan pahaməṅan kavi tan pavastha* ambəkta vikva manusup-nusupêṅ alas gə̄ṅ sambin hiḍəpta vulikən palarən katəmva 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

anvam kunaṅ kita katuṅhapan iṅ bapebu muṅgv iṅ kadaṅ maṅupapīra* maveh larâmbək mārganta lampus aṅusir vanadeśa śūnya ahyun* lumakva viku kilya rarā viratya 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hyaṅ-hyaṅ niṅ āśrama kunaṅ kita divyacakṣuh vruh riṅ jitendriya sadābrata tan kənêṅ strī buddhinta mogha mavəlas mulat iṅ daridra prāptânurun paran ikā paṅanugrahanta* 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan hiḍəpku ri hayunta sakêṅ vanādri ambət ni sinvam iṅ aśoka marê təṅahta molah* kadînəluk-əluk luṅ ikaṅ gaḍuṅ mrik tan sah katon i luṅayanta ləməs-ləməsnya 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

amraṅ baṅ iṅ katirah arja hanê laṭinta tuñjuṅ birū məkar alurv akusū sugandha mālih lurunya mamanis kavavê matanta mimbâmarāśraya tikəlnya hanê halista 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

polah nikaṅ kusumasāri hanê vivalta maṅgiṣṭa vāhu rinəmək tumibê kəcapta paṅhrəṅ nikaṅ bhramara muṅgv i taṅis-taṅista hīs* niṅ tusāra rumarab makajanma luhta 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sandeha buddhi mami de ni haləpta māsku dūra n manuṣya kita kevala devaputrī de niṅ manarka ri ḍatəṅta mahāprabhāva saṅkê hyaṅ Indra mapa donta varah kamîbu 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan panarka nira marma dahat rasanya mambə̄ tilam kadi huvus vruh i rumrum iṅ strī śr̥ṅgāra devaduhitā kavəlad hatinya maṅgəh ri buddhi bhagavān kəna bañcananya 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


suraputrikā sumahur ādara mulat aviraṅ tumuṅkul anaṅis bhagavān rəṅə̄n pavarah i ṅhulun aṅusir aṅāśrayê kadi kita taha tan sakê Surapati n ḍatəṅ aṅənəs amet pradeśa vəgilən mvaṅ asambhava n hyaṅa niṅ āśrama panaha-nahā dvijeśvara hade 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tuvi tan manuṣya manivi prabhu madulur aburva-burva riṅ alas hayu ni ṅhulun taha tan antuk iṅ aṅalap-alap sakêṅ girivana riṅ apa n rarâharəpa vikva manusupa manəmbahêṅ* viku talun pisaniṅv ajalva kavi mūrchita layat alaṅə̄ manambaṅ anadin 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

bhagavān manəhta huniṅan humulunakən avaknya tan patəbusan tuvi hetu niṅ mara ri jə̄ṅ dvija taruṇa bhaṭāra Dharma maṅutus i ratəṅ nikaṅ brata samādhi kakavaśa təkapta sampun amatəh mətu tan pasaṅkan inucap vulatana tariman ṅhulun phala nika 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hyaṅən i ṅhulun ri pada saṅ dvija taruṇa kaśuddhyanôtus-utusən pisanīṅv anəṅgaha məne n pasuruhana səkar lavan bañu damu marəkêṅ paturvan aṅisapvakəna suku munīndra riṅ pakasutan tan asambhava n hulun anaṅhuluna yan apuyəṅ dvijarṣi majapa 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

arənah təkapnya n aṅucap kama riṅ ujar amighnani brata tapa mata mesi luh saha taṅis vinulatakən ikā vineh amanisa ajajar pasaṅgraha nikā susu vaṅi ni pipinya lāgi sumaji kadi pādapâṅlih alaris təṅah ika pasənāha ri dvijavara 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

umənəṅ* dvijarṣi rumase vacana nika təkā vaśâṅhamu-hamu smaradūta kevala manisnya n aṅucap ataṅis lanâməlas-arəp vəkasan dvijendra vihikan ry abhimata nika yan pamighnani tapa mətu kadvijātyan ira nora kavədi nira sāhasânapathani 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


aḍā vipatha ko pakojar iku dhūrta tan aharəp i hayva niṅ tapa huvus vruh aku yan pakona Suranātha karaṇamu ḍatəṅ mamañcana ikaṅ hala gavemu tan vuruṅ amaṅsulana maləsanêri ko məne manuṣya təmahamva tan valuya riṅ surapada vəkasamva devatī 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yadin śatasahasrabhāgan i sukhaṅku n ataki-taki niṣparigraha tathāpi kapana n samaṅkana sukhaṅkva k aṅusira sukhêṅ surālaya hana pva sukha niṅ manuṣya masamāgama mapa ta gave nikâdhama ləhəṅ juga ṅ anəmva pātaka sakêṅ katuduhana kabañcanâtapa 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nahan liṅ ira sāhasâṅḍavuhi śāpa nəhər anudiṅî kivâṅdələ̄ prapañca surakanyakā kahilaṅan hurip apəga ri tan sih iṅ Vidhi ri doṣa nika rāga-rāga n aṅusir sutapa pisaniṅūn kabañcana alum kadi gaḍuṅ pinuṅgəl aṅayuh səkar iṅ asana tan vuruṅ pəjah 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tumuṅkul i harəp dvijarṣi makacāmana rarab i ləbū ni jə̄ṅ nira hanan kadi vaśâṅdələ̄ nəhər aminta vinaluyakən iṅ surālaya məhāh salahasâtəpak jaja manəmbah aḍəkuh amalar kasanmata* apan harəp iṅ antaśāpa karaṇanya n aṅucap amanis maṅañjali 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

dvijarṣi huripən ṅhulun titisanâmr̥ta valuyakənêṅ kadevatan əmās* maṇik anekavastu kəta ṅ enaka panəbusa ni ṅhulun hurip ṅhulun pva kasihan muvah syapa pametana pirak i rikaṅ tapovana mataṅnya k anaṅis panəmbaha ri jə̄ṅta panəbusa ri jīva ni ṅhulun 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tuhanku bhagavānku hāh sipi lalista vulatana manəhta kāsy-asih harəp muliha tan vənaṅ mulih aṅantya ri kita kita melik i ṅhulun unəṅ niṅ abapebu tiṅhalana denta mapa karika hetu niṅ hənəṅ kədə̄ harəp anona māti kəna śāpa karika kita tan vruh iṅ vəlas 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ahā mpu vihikan ṅhulun ri vuyuṅanta* kalalarana śuddha niṅ tapa kṣamākəna manəhta tan tugətananta sakasalah i śīla ni ṅhulun prasiddha kita paṇḍitânumata riṅ viguṇa vipatha tan vruh iṅ krama si səmbah ika jampya niṅ kadi kita n luməkasa vuyuṅ iṅ kadi ṅhulun 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kucup niṅ asanâluru ndan amalar karirisana ri taṅgal iṅ kapat gaḍuṅ lumay aṅolakən tavaṅ aluṅluṅan amalar anəmva rambatan həlaṅ midər anambayaṅ saha taṅis kapanasan amalar drəs iṅ javuh ṅhulun pva kalaran mataṅnya k amalar turunana vara de dvijeśvara 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ahā pahalavə̄ ta koṅ avakana ṅ kapalaṅ-alaṅ i demu n apsarī kadaṅ-kadaṅa de bapebu pəkuləmva paḍa kari sirêṅ kadevatan pəjah ṅaran iki syapêka ta taṅis-taṅisana mulatâsihêri ko vəlasku ri hayunya sis mapa tikī haməṅana niki yan pəjah məne 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

bhaṭāra Suranātha tiṅhalana de nr̥pati kasih-arəp patik haji huvus kaləmahan śināpa kapana n maluya muvah i pāda saṅ prabhu hilaṅ manə-manəh Surādhipati tan vuruṅa pəjaha riṅ pamañcanan riṅ āśrama vəkas ni jīvita patik haji viphala pakon Surādhipa 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

prabhu prabhu rəṅə̄n taṅis ni Hariṇī kapəgan aputək aṅhiḍəp lara pəjah pinativar kinonakən i tan kavənaṅ ika gave dinohakən ikaṅ gati śināpa sis ya katahā ya katəmu tuluṅən patik haji pati pva balik iṅ hurip lara lalis pva balika ni vəlas Surādhipa 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vijil sahana saṅ hyaṅ iṅ kusuma vāhu sumalaga nihan lavad* ṅhulun hurip gəlisa ni ṅhulun ya palakunta ri yativara hayva tâsuve kunaṅ yan agəgəh dvijarṣi palalun savuyuṅ* ira sadenya saṅkulən tuhun kita luməṇḍva-ləṇḍva ri śavaṅku gəsəṅən i pañaṇḍi niṅ vuṅū 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

manis ni mata ni ṅhulun labuhən iṅ jaladhi luh irikaṅ tasik madhu raras ni vaja ni ṅhulun hañutən iṅ śrigaḍiṅ i pucak iṅ gunuṅ gula ləməs ni ləṅən i ṅhulun ləpasən iṅ gaḍuṅ aṅəlih aṅolakən tavaṅ laris ni vətis i ṅhulun kəkəsananta kəmitana ni deva niṅ puḍak 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kəlab ni tapih i ṅhulun suji ya teki pupulakən i posik iṅ səkar pataṅkis i giriṅsiṅ i ṅhulun aṅantya ri ləṅəṅ i kiriñciṅ iṅ bañu pənəd ni laku ni ṅhulun tan asarag valuyakəna ri lampah iṅ liman pəpə̄ ni panaṅisku tan kahuniṅā* ḍavuhakəna ri śabda niṅ cucur 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ameta maṅunəṅ galuh kita pamorana ni kusut i roma ni ṅhulun ri mimba ni taman ta paṅləpasananta ri rəṅu ni halisku yan tikəl gəmuh ni susu ni ṅhulun vahu mijil tuhañaṅakəna riṅ pucaṅ gaḍiṅ vənəs ni mukha ni ṅhulun hañutən iṅ vulan inəmukan iṅ lamad-lamad 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pamādapa* ni madhya ni ṅhulun aros kirimakən iṅ aśokapādapa əbun* hana ri tuṅtuṅ iṅ tr̥ṇalatāṅkura patuvavanê luh i ṅhulun lavan pañurigênunus ni paṅavakku rakətakəna denta riṅ tulis luṅid ni kuku ni ṅhulun turuṅ aṅanya ri jaja-jajar iṅ səkar taji 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nahan śruti ni de nikânaṅis atuṅtuṅ ucapan aməlas-məlas-harəp samasta para deva sūkṣma humənəṅ tinaṅisan ika tan hanâṅlavad arəs hava-havākənâvədi kumə̄l vruh i gəgəh i vuyuṅ* dvijeśvara paḍâṅrəs anaṅis-naṅis taṅis ikā piniturun ika muṅgu riṅ vaneh 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

taṅis-taṅis i deva niṅ kusuma sūkṣma tinaṅisakən iṅ madhubrata taṅis niṅ amarāśrayêṅ vulan avā tinaṅisakən i śabda niṅ cucur taṅis-taṅis i deva niṅ jalada cātaka* manaṅisakən hanêṅ tavaṅ taṅis-taṅis i deva niṅ masa kapat tinaṅisakən i gəntər iṅ patər 18

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

muvah dyah anu mojar asrət ucapanya tuna-tuna sinambaṅan taṅis mpu ḍaṅ hyaṅ apa tāh inanti ni manəhta paṅuṣadha ri duhkha ni ṅhulun yatan hana hiner manəh dvijavarâsiha humuripana ṅ huvus* pəjah kṣamākəna magə̄ṅ ṅhulun mpu varahən duga-duga mara tan harəp-harəp 19

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nahan rasa ni de nikânaṅis aminta vinaluyakən iṅ kadevatan udhāni bhagavān paṅavruhana de nira mulat amanis vavaṅ lipur apuy siniram iṅ javuh paḍa ni suṅsut ira tan agəgəh vavaṅ paḍəm sərəh vaṅi lavan duh iṅ vvah araməs ri vaja paḍa ni de nirâṅucap 20

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paran karika tan sihaṅkva ri kitânaku kita karikâpan uttama manuṣya tuvi sāvakanya yan atə̄n mara-mara hiniḍəp kadaṅ-kadaṅ kunaṅ saṅ agave laranta paramārtha nira sira bhaṭāra Śaṅkara lukat ni kapalaṅ nikaṅ sukr̥ta mārga ni kapalaṅ i denta devatī 21

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

priyanta riṅ anādijanma dadi mānuṣa lituhayu sūryavaṅśaja narendra Raghu rakva mānak aniru prakaśita subhagêṅ purāntara apañjy Aja dhanurdharânvam isi niṅ Raghunagara turuṅ smarātura tuhun kita dine bhaṭāra yugalanya muvah akurənâsihê kita 22

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kunaṅ pva siha ni ṅhulun ri kita tan kalavasana dadinta mānuṣa aṅālihana kaprabhun kita lavan saṅ Aja sukha sarājya tuṅgalən tuhun paməkasanta vīja savijîrika kita maluyêṅ kadevatan səkar sumanasântakanta ya tikâməgatakəna ri śāpa ni ṅhulun 23

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

huvus pva kita mantuk iṅ surapadânaku katəka-təkêṅ vvaluṅ tahun samaṅkana narendra saṅ kavəkas iṅ nagara muliha riṅ kadevatan apaṅgiha muvah lavan kita tuməmvakəna phala nikaṅ kadigjayan mataṅnya pahayun manahta sukhamārga matəmahana rājaputrikā 24

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nahan rasa ni de nirâməgati śāpa nira təhər ajar satorasih ri mūla ni dadinya len təmahananya tinalatah irâgalar taṅan kunaṅ pva vəkasan hiḍəpnya ri kaśāpa nika kadi vineh anugraha unəṅnya matəmah luh adrəs i kapə̄ lara turida nikâtəmah taṅis 25

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


hāh saṅ mukṣa ri luhku tan pahaməṅan namu-namu pəjah iṅ pasaṅgaman maṅke pvâmbəka niṅ prahāsana bisâṅhari-harih iṅ arəs pinaṅkvakən ṅūni n hyaṅ kita riṅ surālaya manəhta milu matəmahan varāpsarī maṅke pvâṅdadi rājaputra kita her ṅhulun atəmaha rājaputrikā 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hāh svāmiṅku dudut ṅhulun ri juraṅ iṅ ləpihan alal aṅə̄lakən laṅə̄ həmban riṅ vvat aśokapādapa təṅahku pagaməlana luṅgah iṅ gaḍuṅ suṅsuṅ riṅ maṅunəṅ galuh lulut unəṅku ri kita kaka tan vənaṅ kinas riṅ paṇḍan haḍaṅən ṅhulun lumaku śoka laku-laku ṭikâhavan puḍak 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan ṅrəs-ṅrəs i samba-sambat ika kāsihan alal apasah lavan priya tan sih niṅ Vidhi mogha tan patuluṅan karaṇa nika manəmvakən lara de niṅ gyānya tuməmva janma saṅ aniṅgalakən iriya riṅ kadevatan amvit matya manəmbah iṅ dvijavarânəhər aṅusapi luhnya riṅ sabuk 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


huvus praṇata bhakti tan paśaraṇāśraya mati lumah iṅ pamañcanan humuṅ taṅis i sundarī nikaṅ alas hinarivuvu ni śabda niṅ gaguṅ rərəb kusumasāri tan papəgatan kətug i təḍun iṅ ertalîṅ juraṅ luṅ iṅ gaḍuṅ aṅindracāpa humaḍaṅ havana nika madadya mānuṣa 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hyaṅ Agni hana riṅ śarīra mijil aṅgəsəṅi śava nikâgilaṅ-gilaṅ kasiddhyan ira saṅ dvijarṣi gumave dilah ika karaṇanya n ujvala bukur pamiḍaran ndatan* milu gəsəṅ kadi jalada* rinəṅgan iṅ kilat samantaji paḍəm tuhun hana kukusnya kari sakukus iṅ damar pəjah 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hayunya milu bhasmibhūta təka riṅ gəluṅ ahavuk amiṇḍa riṅ kukus lumə̄ṅ va nikaṅ asthi mātra kadi śeṣa ni luru ni matanya yan vulat baṅun tura-turah nikaṅ sipat ikaṅ latu-latu tumibā paḍâhirəṅ hilaṅ sinirir iṅ samīraṇa havunya tumuluy anarīra riṅ hrəbuk 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ hyaṅ niṅ suraloka tan pahaməṅan namu-namu pəjah iṅ pamañcanan sūkṣmâṅjanma marêṅ Vidarbhanagarī sira ta pinakasāri niṅ sarāt putrī śrī Krathakeśikeśvara nəhər hayu nira kadi ṅūni n apsarī khyāti śrîndumatī panaṅgah i sira n pamukha kadi śaśaṅka pūrṇama 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

*lvīr iṅ svapna vijil nirâdbhuta karəṅvan i vali nira riṅ kadevatan rəmrəm taṅ daśadeśa de ni sahab iṅ jaladakusuma* muṅgu riṅ tavaṅ ləṅləṅ de ni gərəhnya ṣaṭpada malivran apupul irikaṅ limut hrəbuk sumyuk taṅ madhupuṣpavarṣa madulur jaya-jaya ri jayā nr̥pātmajā 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅūni n tuṅgal anak nareśvara lavə̄ manah ira ri vijil nr̥pātmajā ndātan pembuh ikaṅ sukhê sira baṅun bañu humidəṅ aṅanti riṅ ranu maṅke n pembuh anak nirâhayu sinambhava maṅadəha lakṣmi niṅ purī embuh gə̄ṅ kadi sāgara rvab aməpək sukha nira ri vijil nr̥pātmajā 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan saṅ pinakeña rakva kulavaṅśa vəka-vəka kadaṅ-kadaṅ haji aśrī varṇa nirâraras kadi saroja kinəlabakən iṅ ryak iṅ bañu de niṅ məñcuh aṅambək-ambəki sabhāva nira təka hirəṅ kineriṅan susvan bāhvan agasyak aṅhaləpakən vruh iṅ aṅinakanê tuhan-tuhan 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lāvan tovi nirâhaləp marəka hadyana kunaṅ asavaṅ priyambada ndan parnah kaka de nirêña nira karva sira paḍa suśīla vīryavan kālih-kālih irâṅharis-haris anusvani rahina vəṅî suputrikā saṅkêṅ svarga hulun tuhâṅgəh ira ṅūni ri hana nira riṅ kadevatan 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvaṅ ri jro juru niṅ məṅəs pinarək iṅ vagəd amirit i hatvik iṅ manis sakvan selvan atūt manahnya kalavan kabayan iṅ arəjêṅ kaguṇḍikan tuṅgal riṅ katəkāsihan lavan ikaṅ pinuji pinakagusti riṅ* raras rūm rakryan nr̥paputrikā mava hayunya tuhu ratu ni raśmi niṅ prajā 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

strī māvak caturaṅga sabhya tan athāni panagara təkâhavan ratha prāyâpāmbəkan aśvasañcari lakunya vagəd aniru*lampah iṅ liman nistanya n viparīta rūpa nika tan kasah i pada narendraputrikā himpər peka minantryakən huvus abhūṣaṇa hinaləpakən yayâhala 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan rājasutânvam eṅgal atuhâṅiṅət-iṅətakən aṅdələ̄ tavaṅ aṅliṅliṅ kinaharṣan iṅ kaka-*kakâmvaṅi sira rinəbut pinaṅkvakən kahyun-hyun kumurəb-kurəb kumədal asriṅ aniru-niru putra niṅ pəñu vahv âhuntv aputih katon səḍəṅ irâsəmu guyu baṅun aṅhəmū mənur 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

solah bhāva nirâmaṅun sih aṅəvah* bapa bapa juga de nirâṅucap yan paṅjaṅkah aṅaṅguh-aṅguhi gumoh lumaris asəmu ləmbu kanyakā mogâhyaṅ sira yan maluṅguh ararəm tumiru-tiru paluṅguh iṅ gaṇa yan sore mulat iṅ vulan vruh avavā vulan anuduhi vimba niṅ vulan 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

endah buddhi nikaṅ vaneh mamitaṅis-mitaṅis i sira harṣa riṅ taṅis eṅgal mary anaṅis pinakpak amanis vulat ira sinave pinaṅkvakən len tekaṅ harəp* iṅ halâhala-halan mamalaku hala hāsyakāraṇa maṅkin tībra raras narendratanayâhayu ri huvus ira n paveh ala 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

anvam tapvan apâsarik hayu nirân inaṅətan apupuk ri vunbunan tan paṅde hala tambəh iṅ hayu bajaṅ-bajaṅ ira mata niṅ lavak bulu pantəs yan pagəlaṅ lave vənaṅ i kāla nira kapəjahan rare bajaṅ tambā niṅ səgu tuṅtuṅ iṅ sərəh aṅimbuhi manis ira yan hanê rahi 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndi nyū* danta paḍā məne n ləviha yan marək i sira səḍəṅ pinaṅkvakən lāvan ketaka dūra n aṅhiriba nista nika n inuparəṅgan iṅ ṭikā sakveh niṅ kusumâvənəs pinakataṇḍiṅ ira vavaṅ alum sakêṅ taṅan maṅgəh de niṅ anusvanî sira dudū lavan anak-anakan sinusvakən 12

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

eṅgal vruh tinitah bisâtaratayan vəgig aṅadəg-adəg vavaṅ tibā guyvan* vruh makukuk bayan tinañakən kahanan ira bisâtukup mata sorêsuk maləbū-ləbū cala kinon ahuvusana ya saṅkan iṅ taṅis harṣânon gigirən sirâṅgyat anəpak bisu-bisu nəhər aṅgigir-gigir 13

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

*saṅ Bhojânak irâtuhâpagəh ikaṅ guṇa ri sira paṅavruh iṅ ratu sākṣāt prāṇava īśvara nrəpati kāsih ira sira suśīla nītimān aṅhiṅ rakva pakə̄ nareśvara ri bhūmi nira sira sadā janapriya maṅgəh rovaṅ irâṅadəg ri hiḍəp iṅ mulat i sukha nira n paḍâpagəh 22

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndan griṅ saṅ prabhu saṅsayâbvat atələb maṅinak-inaki tan tulus varas təṅrān iṅ hurip iṅ śarīra paḍa rūkṣa mavarah i təkā nikaṅ pati yekā hetu nirâṅutus marəka riṅ dvijavara r̥ṣi śaiva sogata mvaṅ mantrī vinəkas-vəkas nira n anak nira sumiliha ratva hayva len 23

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakveh saṅ vinəkas-vəkas paḍa təñuh tvas ira kahənəṅan mulat juga de niṅ duhkha tumon i kāsy-asih i saṅ kavəkas ira dumeh sirâsiha mojar mātra pəgat-pəgat vəkasan amrih asayut aməlas-məlas-harəp luh lāvan səkəl iṅ taṅis dulur i de nira sumahur i śabda saṅ prabhu 24

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

he nāthaṅku huvus kapaṅku vacana nrəpati rasa nirâvəkas-vəkas an saṅ Bhoja gumantya ratvakəna yadyapi pəjaha məne nareśvara ndan lvir vyartha ḍavuh ni śabda naranātha ri sama-marək aṅlavad-lavad āpan ṅhiṅ sira keṅə-keṅət* alavas kumalilirana kaprabhun haji 25

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śaktin de naranātha hayva ləsu saṅ prabhu tahapana vedya kinkinən śrī devîndumatī katoliha katon uvuh-uvuha nira n katiṅgala *mvaṅ saṅ Bhoja sirânvam ardha kapalaṅ vəkasakəna narendra riṅ prajā ndān amrih-mriha saṅ prabhu syapa parāśrayana sama-marək məne n kari 26

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan liṅ sama maṅlavad-lavad i saṅ prabhu lara nira membuh aṅlare vahv âṅlumpuhi saṅsayâmaṅəti roga nira vavaṅ alum sirâvənəs tan polah sira tan kəḍap ṅuni-ṅuni n paṅucapa sira kevalâturū ṅhiṅ maṅguh kalavan miṅəl sahur ira n tinaña-tañan i de nirâlara 27

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ai Bhojaṅku vəkaṅku hayva tan asih kita bapa riy arinta kāsihan putrīṅkv Indumatīṅku bhaktya ri kakanta kita sarika sambhavâsiha anvam kāri tuhanku* deṅku kavəkas riṅ iña lavan uvâmalar tuha himpər hantiga niṅ manuk taḍahasih sy anaku tinuvavākən iṅ vaneh 29

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vuṅsv amvīta bibinta matya tumutê kapati saṅ ahulun ṅhulun tuhan lvâmbək māsku saṅ aprihêṅ* bhuvana səmbahən iṅ amava rāt kitânaku ai putrîndumatīṅku māsku t ahurup tapih alah ibu kenku kenakən soṅsoṅaṅkva tapihta karvana lavan haji ləpasa mamukṣa-mukṣana 30

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan liṅ parameśvarī tucapa saṅ prabhu kasih-arəp aṅhiḍəp lara saṅ hyaṅ jīva hanê gulū nira lavan kətə-kətəg ira saṅsayâsamun sampun kāku pasāra-sāra ni varah yativara rinəgəp nareśvara tan simpaṅ kadi de nirâṅayatakən panah aṅənani de nirâṅhiḍəp 32

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

prāpta ṅ truh kadi səmbu-səmbur i jajâṅavara ri gəmuh iṅ payodhara varṇākāra nikaṅ kuvuṅ-kuvuṅ apiṇḍa pupuk i rahi keṅgutan halis polah niṅ kilat iṅ tavaṅ kadi kəḍap niṅ asamaya kapaṅgihêṅ taman his-hīs niṅ bañu muṅgu riṅ tarətəpan kadi luh iṅ anaṅis pinaṅkvakən 37

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

muṅgv iṅ maṇḍyusa kāli-kālih ira mogha kadi kinasut iṅ pasaṅgaman keṅər mātra gulū narendramahiṣī kadi cala-cala tan panūt kinol piṅgir niṅ kanin iṅ jajâsəmu mirah kadi karagət i tuṅtuṅ iṅ kuku rāhən siñjaṅ ira n lume miṅay avarṇa vahu kavava de nareśvara 38

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ahā bibi haji ndi sihta vinaliṅku ta kita tulusâsihê ṅhulun muvah bapa haji ndi sihta palakunkva* tulusa ni vəlasta ri ṅhulun ujarta kita ṅūni kāsihana niṅ* jagat anaku sadā pakāśrayan jagat karika māsihêry aku kita pva paḍa tan avəlas maṅaryakən 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

prabhuṅku kita kālih əndi parananta pavuṅu sakarəṅ varah ṅhulun yan iṅ Śivapadâthavêṅ Haripadâthava ləpasa kunaṅ sakêrikā ṅhulun tumuturâpa don iṅ ahurip viphala yan apasah lavan kita patiṅku havanaṅkva muṅsir i padanta bapa tañakənêṅ kadevatan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri kāla ni huripta ṅūni bibi sāhasa kita sahasâṅabət ṅhulun hasih bapa hajî* ṅhulun təka sirânuluṅ aṅusapi luh mamaṅkvakən mataṅ ya bibi mah palu ṅhulun alah pavuṅu sakaharəp ṅhulun habət ndya sī yan anuluṅ muvah bapa hajî ṅhulun atəhər ataṅguhê kita 5

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aḍā hyaṅ aparan ta koṅ Vidhi ṅaranmu tan avəlas adəṅky anon sukha bapaṅku sira māti demu mapa doṣa nira huvus akīrti riṅ jagat lavan bibi tumūt prasiddha tika ko muvah aməjahi tan pakāraṇa mataṅ ya vətu ko rva sānak aku patyani saha bala demu həntyakən 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan sambat irânaṅis kaḍəḍətan* lara hati nira tan vənaṅ kinə̄l simsim vāhu hilaṅ maṇiknya kaləbū paḍa-paḍa nira niṣprabhâkucəm* dady âteja katonan iṅ rahina tan paravi vəṅi tiniṅgal iṅ vulan saṅkê rūpa nirâsavaṅ karəbahan gunuṅ alara ri līna saṅ prabhu 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paṅde niṅ vidhi tan vənaṅ vinadha tiṅhalana kasih-arəp suputrikā kāry anvam ri pəjah nareśvara samaṇḍyusa sira kalavan nareśvarī de niṅ duhkha kədə̄ sirâmalaku milva maṅatigana maṇḍyusê daləm* patrəm vahv* inunus nirênayatakən ri jaja kaka-kakâkrak aṅrəbut 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅkin ghūrṇita śabda niṅ vvaṅ anaṅis vədi kaluputanêṅ* nr̥pātmajā āpan buddhi nirâṅhuvus-huvus apakṣa pəjaha tumutê nareśvara gə̄ṅ tr̥ṣṇâsih arāma-rena kapəgan kapati-pati sirâlarânaṅis drāk siddhânəmu duhkha niṅ dadi manuṣya paṅavaśa ni śāpa saṅ r̥ṣi 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ Bhoja prihati n tumon kasih-arəp ny avak ira kari de nareśvara kady agriṅ sira de ni duhkha nira tan sah anaṅis i dagan narādhipa āśābhūta marambəhan vətu ni luh nira mulat i narendrakanyakā marmâmaṅku pəgat-pəgat sapitutur* nira tuna-tuna de nikaṅ taṅis 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan hayva viraṅrvaṅ induṅ ənəbən ta pamanas i laranta tīsakən riṅ svargastha narendra sampun atuhâpituvi* huvus akīrti riṅ jagat pakṣa kṣatriya rāka rakryan apagəh vənaṅa śaraṇa rakryan iṅ hayu ṅhiṅ yan māti kakanta mamrih iṅ ayun kita pəjaha tumūta ri ṅhulun 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hayvâśâlara duhkha yan bapa haji mvaṅ ibu haji pəjah sirâdulur yāvat janma ṅaranya tan hana tuvuh vatu kaluputa saṅka riṅ* pati tan pendah kadi cakra niṅ ratha təka ṅ dadi niyata midər purih nika saṅkêṅ mr̥tyu təka ṅ hurip kunəṅ ikaṅ pati niyata mijil sakêṅ hurip 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

māyākāra hanêṅ crəmin paḍa nikaṅ dadi sahana-hananya tan sthiti himpər pādapa tan vuruṅ manirarâməkasi tuha tuvuhnya tan lanā tiṅkah niṅ hurip iṅ manuṣya juti tattva nika tan alavas vavaṅ hilaṅ kintv îkaṅ pati jāti tattva nika tan kṣaṇika pinakadharma niṅ dadi 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

eman ṅvaṅ luməkas mamet pati sakêṅ* luməkasa ri kapetan iṅ hurip pə̄ṅpə̄ṅən ta huripta yogya dadahanta makahuluna de munīśvara āpan yan vruh i bheda saṅ rva kalavan vruha ri pasamudāya niṅ tiga icchā nora kasaṅśayêṅ hala lavan hayu niyata luput sakêrika 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


kumva kunaṅ liṅa rakryan apa hayu nikaṅ hayu yan gavayən ri vruh i saṅ rva bhineda lavan i sira saṅ tri tinuṅgalakən kumva kunaṅ liṅa rakryan apa hala nikaṅ hala yan gavayən ri vruh i saṅ rva bhineda lavan i sira saṅ tri tinuṅgalakən 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

siṅgih ujarta ri saṅ kr̥tasamaya viśeṣa paṅavruh ira kveh nira riṅ nagarêṅ acala paḍa tikā* pinakoṅgvan ira ndin rakəta ṅ sukhaduhkha ri sira satatâbrata tan palabuh lokaparāśraya kāraṇa nira magave hayu tan vipatha 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ vruh i saṅ vəkas iṅ samaya vinuni de paramādiguru kevala śuddha manah nira linətu-lətuh kapanâlətuha vāhyaśarīra pinuccha nira ri təka niṅ pati tan ginəgə̄ jñāna viśeṣa śarīra nira taya śarīra nirêṅ vəkasan 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvaṅ magave hayu yan vruh i sira saṅ amukti gavenya hayu tan dadi tan luput iṅ hayu hayu ni gave nika tan viphala vvaṅ* magave hala yan vruh i sira saṅ amukti gavenya hala tan dadi tan luput iṅ hala hala ni gave nika tan viphala 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvaṅ magave hayu tan* vruh i sira saṅ amukti gavenya hayu tan dadi tan tuməmu ṅ hayu hayu ni gavenya tumūt maṅiriṅ vvaṅ magave hala tan vruh i sira saṅ amukti gavenya hala tan dadi tan tuməmu ṅ hala hala ni gavenya tumūt maṅiriṅ 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ viku gūḍha nihan vulatana mamaṅan təḍa riṅ pahəhan tan təḍa tan śuci ta pva sahana-hana niṅ pinaṅan liṅ ira hetu nirâmbək alokika vinulatan ajrəm apiṇḍa kasop śuddha nikaṅ pratipatti makalarapan uttama niṅ samaya 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

māsku mataṅnyan ikaṅ hayu gavayakənanta səḍəṅ mahurip paṇḍita tovi yayā sira maṅulahakən brata tan kaluṣa buddhy ahəniṅ brata yoga tapa taki-takinta maran kavaśa gəgvana rakryan anəmvakəna vara-varah paramādiguru 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


anəmu-nəmu kətêkā saṅ sampun kr̥tasamaya vihikan i rasa saṅ hyaṅ tattvajñāna kaləpasən tan ulih-ulih iṅ aṅdoh saṅkêṅ pāda munivara ulih iṅ asaṅu tasyan bhaktîṅ paṇḍita matuha 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aṅinak-inaka taṅ vvaṅ yāvat* jñāna pinakadon syapa ta sira mamaṅgih tattvajñāna dudu gave hana satata masevā tan byaktanya pinihanan sukr̥ta juga maṅinte lāvan duṣkr̥ta maṅiriṅ 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hana sira guruputrânak niṅ paṇḍita nagara sahana nira ta rakvâdr̥vya ṅ jñāna pakagurun taha tan ika paniddhan vet niṅ paṇḍita matuha amilihi juga saṅ hyaṅ tattvêṅ uṅgvana rahayu 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

anak iṅ apirak akveh ṅūnî nvamnya paḍa sukha sahana nika ta rakvânirv akveh apirak ika taha tan ika paniddhan vet niṅ śreṣṭha panariman amilihi juga saṅ hyaṅ Śrī tan siṅ kahanan ira 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kita yayi səḍəṅ anvam prih saṅ hyaṅ rasa kavikun pira karika musuh niṅ vikv aṅhiṅ nəm ikaṅ akas alahakən i daləm tvas pet siṅ soṅgvan ika rarah* alaha pəjaha rakryan yêki svarga ṅaran ika 5

nā de nirâvara-varah ri narendraputrī tapvan tətəs tinuna sandhi nikaṅ prayoga anvam suśīla guṇamanta kr̥topadeśa saṅkê paṅajyan ira kavruh irâdhiguhya 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrī putrikā kapənətan humənəṅ tumuṅkul sampun bhinasmi śava saṅ prabhu de munīndra muṅgv î taman sira cinaṇḍi lavan sudevī sampūrṇa bapra nira ratna mahāprabhāva 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ Bhoja sampun aṅadəg ri Vidarbharājya svasthā sabhūmi nira bhakty anukūla sādhu mavvat paḍâmarahakən ri sukhanya rakva anvam muvah nr̥pati liṅnya muvah manəmbah 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun sirâyugala ratna viśeṣaputrī rājāṅkurâvilət ikaṅ pakurən savandhu solur lulut sahati ləṅləṅ aluṅluṅan kuṅ saśrī* sakəmbaṅ alaṅə̄ sakurā savīja 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kayvan ragas paḍa nikaṅ nagarî Vidarbha riṅ vr̥ddharūpa haji devata lahru sākṣāt maṅke n prasiddha kadi kayvan aron akəmbaṅ śrī Bhoja maṅdani sirânvam apiṇḍa rəṅrəṅ 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


eñjiṅ śrîndumatī kinon marəka kālih saṅ Sunandâṅiriṅ lāgy âmūrṇama mopavāsa ya ta maṅde suṅkavā niṅ hati tistis meh tumibā ṅ ḍavuh vvalu lumampah tan kva de niṅ harip mukṣa lvīr amarāśrayê mukha nira śrī niṅ vulan tan lumə̄ṅ 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun prāpta sirê daləm praṇata marmâtvaṅ ri jə̄ṅ saṅ prabhu lāvan śrī parameśvarī sira sinambah māsih aṅliṅ rəsəp om rakryan pada Nīlakaṇṭha kinabhaktyantâstu dīrghāyuṣa svasthā tuṅgalən iṅ manuṅgali jagat māskv îbu nā liṅ nira 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ndin kāryêvəha riṅ vicakṣaṇa sujanma lituhayu kavi priyambada bhaktîṅ hyaṅ prabhu śakti dhairya saha vāndhava saha bala-kośavāhana yadyan sāgara tambakən satakənâthava vukir alihən ratākəna byaktâvās kavaśanya de nira saṅ uttamapuruṣa viśeṣa riṅ jagat 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrī Bhoja pva sira n prasiddha guṇamanta saphala sira bhūmipālaka prajñā* śāstravit iṅgita vruh iṅ apālapan aṅinaki buddhi niṅ marək akveh dr̥vya nirâprameya kadi sāgara papupulan iṅ vvay iṅ nadī vany ânindita riṅ parākrama yan iṅ naya kadi bhagavān Vr̥haspati 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


embuh bhūṣaṇa niṅ təkən vuvuṅ apūrva karacanan ikā təkêṅ pamanisan lāvan tiṅkah ikaṅ paṅastryanan aparpat* ahaləp akilā paḍâhayu-hayu de niṅ mās pinakopacāra sinisik pəñu pinakavuvuṅnya kumram asinaṅ lvir digdāha riṅ astaparvata sənə̄ nika murub apadəlvan iṅ kṣititala 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aśrī ramya ni de nirâmahayu rājya kaliliran apūrva kādbhuta dahat miṅgar bapra nikê daləm vatu hitəm kuṭa nikaṅ i* yavā lumaṅkuṅ ahirəṅ kulvan vetan agopurâtiśaya lor kidul agupura piṇḍa marpat aruhur kr̥ṣṇākāra paḍâṅlunaṅ kadi gunuṅ kumukus i səḍəṅ iṅ darâvrəg aputih 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


luṅhā ṅ vr̥tta ri kārya saṅ prabhu paḍâdbhuta sahana nikaṅ vvaṅ aṅrəṅə̄ vvaṅ-vvaṅ pora ḍusun-ḍusun paḍa harəp vihikana mulatêṅ svayambara tan samvas raray aṅhvan iṅ təgal atakvan i təka ni gave nareśvara salvir niṅ baṇijêṅ pəkən taliṅa-lintah anaḍah ucapan gave nika* 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun prāpta samotusan humatur iṅ nr̥pati səḍəṅ irân hanêṅ sabhā enak buddhi narendra de ni panuval para ratu rasa tan vuruṅ təkā lumrā ṅ vr̥tta təkê daləm ri ḍatəṅârya Raghusuta marêṅ svayambara tvas niṅ strī sakaḍatvan aṅdadak aluṅ turida paḍa rumūpakê sira 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

strī-strī harṣa pinə̄m pinañjiṅakən iṅ nagara ri pamihaṅnya riṅ* yayah tan harṣêṅ kavi rakva rena nika monaguṇa pisaniṅūn tumiṅhala ndan rakvêki hinurnya matya saka riṅ tuluyakəna susatya riṅ priya liṅnya n kevala tan hinanti ni papaṅgiha nika pəjahêṅ panambaṅan 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tapvan māri taṅis-taṅisnya n inalap hinaturakən i jə̄ṅ suputrikā vrā niṅ roma maṅekadeśa ri piliṅ-piliṅan ika baṅun pamer i luh enak riṅ vəkasan manahnya mamalar-malar i pada narendraputrikā āpan svāmi nikā karəṅvan i parəknya ri saṅ Aja təvək nikâpasah 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

antuk saṅ priya maṅdavākən inaləm para kavi sumənāha riṅ kajaṅ yeki n rakva kinonya kady aṅucapâmah aku tuhan alap vaca ṅhulun mogha nyan ya kinonakən vacan ikā ri pamaca nika maṅdadak lumuh svāminyâdadi pustakânuturakən hiḍəp ika pinapagnya riṅ taṅis 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅūnî kāla nika n turuṅ marək i jə̄ṅ nira ṅaran ika ken Madhūdakā saṅ mambaṅ Madhusūdana priya nikā kavi taruṇa marək ri jə̄ṅ haji vidhy âmidhyani kāraṇanya virahênalapan alara luhnya tan pəgat ndah rakryan Jayavaspa teki vəkasan ṅaran ika satəvək nikā marək 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


para prabhu kaḍaṅhanan turida rāga nira sinaput iṅ smarâmulaṅuni huvus katəka kuṅ nirâhavan ujar tuhun aməlas-arəp riniptakən ira lavan punagi kesy anambaha ri jə̄ṅ nr̥pavaraduhitā hana hyuna nira akiṅkiṅ* aṅalap kasor paḍa tan aprabhu sahana nirârəbut kahulunan 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vavaṅ nr̥patiputrikā rinəbut iṅ hiḍəp inaṅən-aṅən raras-raras ira hanan kahiḍəp iṅ madhubrata rəṅih-rəṅiha nira n arəs kapaṅkva harasən ləyəp hayu nira n linaṅvakən amūrti kakavin inapus vineh amanisa hanê hati kinubdha kady apəga kāraṇa nira mijil iṅ puḍak dadi ṭikā 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

adandan asənāha sañjata para prabhu ḍatəṅa marê* Vidarbhanagara lanâṅiṅət-iṅət ri pahyasan irâṅinakana ri manah narendratanayā hanâṅdadak anat śarīra manahap-nahap aharəp alantasa n vinulatan paḍâṅalap-alap sipat jənu mənuṅ havu karaṇa suputrikā n aharəpa* 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

muvah saṅ Aja sampun arpat akire lumarisa makamaṅgala dvijavara sahasraśatakoṭi vīra vinidhi nrəpati tumuta śakti sampun ayaśa pənuh sahana niṅ ləbuh təkap i sañjata nika kumaluṅ pinañjər aṅadəg ikaṅ nagara denya kady akalaṅan vihaga saṅ Aja moliha prabhusutā 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mijil sira śinaṅkhapāṇyan i karaṅ ni patiga niṅ aśoka vahv asalaga ikaṅ bhramara harṣa riṅ kusuma muṅgv i taṅan ira marâṅisəp tan avəliṅ* laki-stry alivəran hañar-hañar apaṅgih adulur akaraṅ-karaṅ səkar arūm katampvan i kucur nikaṅ vvay ataviṅ-taviṅ i lavə-lavə̄ nikaṅ sarasija 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

i sampun i kaśaṅkhapāṇyan ira mañjiṅ i daləm adulur lavan dvijavara anambah* aṅusap ri jə̄ṅ nr̥pati mamvit i ḍatəṅa nirêṅ Vidarbhanagara sinuṅsuṅ iṅ ujar prahāsana nəhər jumaya-jaya* jayā nirê paran ira aum hanaku saṅ pakolihən i tiṅhal iṅ ahayu duməlva jalva rasika 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kunaṅ pavəkasaṅkva hayva ta bapaṅku tan apənəd iṅ ambək iṅ para-paran rare mara kita ndatan raraya de niṅ amava manah atvaṅêṅ vvaṅ atuha inuttama dhanurdharânaku tathāpi tan ika paṅayāya riṅ kadi kita ikaṅ guṇa ya tan paraṅkəpana maryada rahayu lavə̄ hananya kapalaṅ 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ikaṅ sakahavan ri bhūmi ni bapaṅku pahayu kita rakṣakâṅanumata sapavvat ika hantusākəna sasambhava haturakənanya māsku tariman ujarku pituhunta hayva kita sāhasa maṅalapa vastu mūlya tinəṅət prasiddha kadaṅ iṅ jagat kita dumadyakəna sukha nikā mataṅnya pahayu 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pamitran alavas rəsəp karaṇa niṅ vənaṅ aṅalapa vastu tan pamalaku yan iṅ viṣayarāmajātaka purihnya karaṇa niṅ anəmva mās pirak ika karāsikaguṇan ya kāraṇa niṅ oliha raras i manah niṅ adyah araras kaśaktin abhimāna kāraṇa niṅ aṅrarah aṅalapa rājya niṅ ripukula 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sirat-sirat i de narendra Raghu mojar amanis amadharmakən ri saṅ Aja minuṣṭi pinakādideva hiniḍəp rasa nika kinayogyakən pinituhu putus niṅ adhamā tan ahyuna ruməṅvakəna ri pitutur nirâhayu dahat ya kāraṇa narendraputra makacāmana rarab i ləbū ni jə̄ṅ narapati 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri sampun ira mamvit iṅ nr̥pati sarvi laku nira marê narendramahiṣī hanâṅhaḍaṅ aveh sərəh saha taṅis* vagəd ahayu hinəmban iṅ kaka-kaka kataṅgamaṅ aveh səpah nr̥patiputra nəhər amuhun amrih aṅhari-hari* tapih saṅ araras pininta nira mūlya basahan ira raṇḍi paṅhurup ira 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

byatīta ri huvus nirâṅucap-ucap təka sira ri taman narendramahiṣī* ləṅəṅ kadi kadevatan haləp ikâpan ajuraṅ avukir mapājar-ajaran maertali pinañcuran jinalatuṇḍa tinalaga ri sornya kādbhuta dahat ikaṅ kaka-kakânvam adyus anəṅah lavan anak-anakanya ketaka miṅiṅ 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


kalpadruma taruvara pārijāta vinaṅun bvat asana sakapat abhrâsinaṅ asəmu sakêṅ kadevatan ululnya kanaka pinahat jinriṅjriṅ iṅ anak-anakan maṇik cinaturaṅga lumarap amirah mās jaṅga katirah avilət praləmba nika riṅ tarətəpan alaṅə̄ 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkānā nr̥patisuta marək ri rena nira sādara satiru-tirun amvit lumarisa ḍatəṅêṅ Vidarbhanagarī bibi nira vihikan marmâsih avəlas asəgəh mamakpak amapag riṅ ucapan amanis nirvighna kita bapa jayêṅ svayambara sadâṅalahakəna ratu 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryān aṅinaṅa* tanayaṅku māsku mapa hetu niṅ avak akuru agriṅ karika kita lavan vaneh brata kunaṅ karaṇa niṅ avənəs hayvânaku kaluṣa kitâhyun iṅ kajayaśatrvan* anuta ri harəp akveh phala nika kaki sarvavighna niyatanya hilaṅ alaradan 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndan rakva kadaməlan ikaṅ svayambara kahop riṅ anakəbi rara sakveh para ratu pininaṅ ya teka pilihən sakaharəp alapən de ni ṅhulun ahiḍəp i buddhi saṅ rara kapan harəpa riṅ atuha ṅhiṅ kahyuna nika ratu cakravartitanayâguṇa kavi taruṇa 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan pva saphala vəka cakravarti tuvi śakti vihikan aṅaji* siṅhākr̥ti tuhu-tuhu siṅhaputra vənaṅ uṅsirən iṅ aśaraṇa byaktânaku mamənaṅa riṅ svayambarasabhâṅalahakəna ratu tan səṅgahən aṅaləm anak syapêka kadi māsku lituhayu vani 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


tatkālê paṅucap narendramahiṣī tucapa ta para ratnakanyakā osik tan pakavanvan agyaṅ i ḍatəṅ saṅ Aja kadi hañar-hañar mulat tan pātmā kamatəṅgəṅən kalukaran gəluṅ asidəha tan hanâṅucap kady âhə̄m turidanya n osah akəcap lvir anicipi manis nr̥pātmaja 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvantən lvir śaśivimba vāhu mijil aṅḍaḍari hayu nikânvam iṅ vayah aṅgə̄ṅ mabrata śuklapakṣa nika paṅlvaṅ i manah ika tan vənaṅ licin rāganya n dadakan tumaṅgal i ḍatəṅ nr̥pasuta kadi tambvaṅ iṅ vulan kr̥ṣṇākāra təṅahnya de ni tapak iṅ suh asəmu*-səmu Rāhv añumbana 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

len taṅ lvir pranitâdagaṅ kira-kiranya sumikəpa vəkas nr̥pātmaja kapraṅ rvêpu kataṇḍəgan turida tan patahənan aṅagəm pralāpita toh toh nyân iṅ agəgvan ambək apagəh mapa tiki n alah aṅgəgə̄ smara aṅlampvâṅusirê padadvaya nirân panikəlakəna tur humaṇḍəma 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

strī saṅsāra sarāga mohita savaṅ vana gahana kalahrvan* iṅ kapat trāsa tvasnya kakiṅkiṅan ginəsəṅan pinaravaśa tinunvan iṅ smara norânīsi manahnya kevala panasbaran alisuh aṅə̄lakən lara maṅke pva n karəṅə̄ gərəh saṅ Aja mañjiṅ aluṅ asəmi kuṅ nikâsəvə̄ 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

endah buddhi nikaṅ vaneh təkap ikâmava turida luput linakṣaṇan muṅkur tan huniṅê ḍatəṅ saṅ Aja mañjiṅ asila ri harəp nareśvarī ndan denyâhyas apahyasan dudu-dudū hiniraṅakən ikê nr̥pātmaja sūkṣmākāra ni raśmi-raśmi ni vulatnya n araras apadəlvan iṅ crəmin* 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kanyā rvaṅ siki ramya kālih aṅisapvakən anak-anakanya ketaka tuṅgal mājar i putra-putran ika māsku saṅ Aja sira rakva maṅkata ndan hayvâkilayū tuhanku niyata ṅhulun inucap ujar nikâkalib marmanyâpasah ambək eṅgal apadudvan aṅuvahi pamitran aṅdadak 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

strī-strī suksəka vahv agātra turidanya mijil i vijil iṅ payodhara tan sah riṅ salukat gave nr̥patiputra sinalukatakənya tan humuṅ ramyârūm karəṅə̄ manisnya sinameni pamavan ika riṅraṅ iṅ hati* tan samvas ginarut-garutnya hiniḍəpnya saṅ Aja sahasâṅisapvakən 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakveh niṅ kuməmit prapañca ni hatinya kuməkəsi taṅisnya riṅ karas āpan buddhi narendraputra kadi tan tulusa duga-dugâṅhalimbaṅa* bhakty ânəmbah i jə̄ṅ ni rena nira məṅgəp amanis agave vulat maliṅ luṅhā tan pracurânəhər-nəhərakən manah iṅ ahayu kāri suksəka 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


mijil saṅ Aja kādbhutâbhinava rūpa saṅ aṅiriṅ apan paḍâhyaṅ* ahaləp ikaṅ gaja rathâśva sañjata sabhūṣaṇa nika dumilah kasənvan aruṇa sumaṅgraha humerakən vidhi nira n lumarisa kumisik pasaṅgha niṅ ujar baṅun jalada tan pakāla gumərəh ri taya niṅ aṅin aṅḍapur saha kilat 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

*payuṅ -payuṅan iṅ ləbuh kadi səkar sinavuṅ apan anekavarṇa suməkar ikaṅ paṅuṅaṅan huvus vinalunan vəḍihan inuparəṅga riṅ tulis əmās rarânvam inəgəh parəṅ mijil amaṅguṅ asəmu-səmu lakṣmi niṅ masa kapat paḍâlal asənāha tiṅhal amanis vulatakəna ri raśmi-raśmi saṅ Aja 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hanêṅ gupura tan vavaṅ sira lumampah ataña ri gənəp ni sañjata nira samâsila hanêṅ ləmah muni manuk marahakən i vijilnya tan hana kari sirêṅ palukayan kinon ira kumona ri para juru yan lumakva rumuhun samaṅkana sira n lumampah aḍarat harəp iṅ ulah avās yayanyan ahaləp 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri lampah ira ghūrṇita ṅ paḍahi paṅharəp ira kumisik maṅertali tibā saru svara nikâbaruṅ binaruṅan tabə-tabəhan agənturan kadi gərəh humandaru* tibā gubar kumətug asriṅ aniru kətug iṅ hudan vahu ḍavuh arūm uni ni ghaṇṭa niṅ liman aṅuṅkaṅ asahuran i paṅhrik iṅ kuda bisir 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

dvijāti r̥ṣi śaiva boddha śuci sojar ira maṅabhivāda muṅgu ri harəp yathākrama paḍâdarâhaləp agə̄ṅ i vətəṅ ira lavan huvan* riṅ atuha lumampah alaris malah ya tan arampaka ri sadavatā nikaṅ ləbuh agə̄ṅ humuṅ təkap ira n paṅuccaraṇa mantra kadi madhukarâṅisis humalivat 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kəliṅ vani-vanîṅ usāna pamarakṣa nira mamava bhindivāla palaga baṅun rinavisan vəhaṅnya kalavan ḍaḍa nika paḍa vok təkêṅ suku vulun hibək tatu rujit-rujit kadi tinambalan avak ika varṇa bəntar inavət agə̄ṅ paḍa kabhīma-bhīma kadi dānava mukha-mukha daitya piṇḍa caviri 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ikaṅ marək i jə̄ṅ narendratanayânvam aguṇa paḍa darśanīya taruṇa titik nagara nora tan vruha n anak vəsi haji tuvi mūlya kavvaṅan ika vatək Madana maṅdadi vvaṅ ujar iṅ mulat i lituhayunya n ahyaṅ araras kunaṅ saṅ Aja Kāmadeva sakalânurun ucapan ikaṅ kapūhan i sira 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

samaṅkana nikaṅ* vvaṅ iṅ paṅuṅaṅan haṅu-haṅun arəbut mulat ri saṅ Aja hanan kadi harəp silih galaha riṅ susu manəvəka riṅ nakhâkas aluṅid paḍâkira-kirâkəkəs mata maliṅ-maliṅ aṅiriṅi kāladeśa sumilib katon kadi silih praṅêṅ halis arəṅv inayat-ayatakənya maṅkin araras 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ikāṅ amava pavvahan* lituhayu prakaśita kavi mambaṅ uttama rare hañar təka sakêṅ Vidarbhanagarī layat inalapan aṅhañaṅ-hañaṅakən rarānya kavəkas pinañjiṅakən iṅ nagara marək i jə̄ṅ narendratanayā ya kāraṇa ni luhnya mantən amalar-malar i saṅ Aja molihê sira hələm 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

manis ni kakavinya mūla ni papaṅgih ika lavan ikaṅ rinuddha vinalat pinet pəjahanâsənə̄tan i kadaṅnya vinuni karaṇanya yan ləpas adoh paḍâpalarasan lavan jaruman amrih aṅalih ahavan vəṅîṅ ava vulan tinūt i paṅaran-ṅaranya Kavidoṣa vəkasan i ḍatəṅnya riṅ nr̥pasuta 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ya tīka tan adoh ginəgvan ira bāhu nika vinisikan tinakvanan ira syapêka paḍa saṅ svayəmbarakəna prakaśita pinakādi niṅ vvaṅ ahayu ikaṅ vvaṅ aṅuṅaṅ bvat indravanitâhyas ika pahavasən ta ya n sama hirib kəcapnya n aṅəsah miṅəl ya pavarahnya ri saṅ Aja vavaṅ rəmək hati nira 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hanâṅuṅaṅ anuṅga*-nuṅgal aṅisapvakən anak-anakanya ketaka miṅiṅ mahâṅjəlagakən hayunya makapaṅhaḍa buṅah i mukhanya tan patalutuh ri kāla saṅ Ajâṅinaṅ vinulatanya ri vulat ira lə̄r matanya lumiriṅ baṅun hañar anūt harəp səpah avədy aṅucapa tumiliṅ miṅe kadi cala 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rarânvam akire vulat dudu-dudū saṅ aṅəsah i kisapvan iṅ kaka-kaka tupis-tupis i de nirâṅənahakən manah ira tumibê narendratanaya vagəd-vagəd anirva-nirvakən i de nira gaməl inamər nirê taṅan ira təkāsih atabəh sərəh saha pucaṅ nika dalihan irâṅave ri saṅ Aja 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

i sor niṅ asanâsəkar hana sirâṅuṅaṅ araras aliṇḍuṅan kaka-kaka ṅəlih-ṅəlih iṅ ekacitta ri narendrasuta ṅəlih irâhuyaṅ pinəpətan savaṅ-savaṅ i denirâmava vulat-vulat iṅ asamayâvədi n katəṅəra mulat pva saṅ Ajâṅdadak sira miṅe səmu niṅ avarahê katəmvana nira 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

muvah vvaya* sirâhaləp rara sujanma pinavulaṅakən hanêṅ* paṅuṅaṅan gaḍiṅ pinakaputra-putran ira tan sah inarək-arəkan sakê nr̥pasuta ya teka tumurun hinəmban iṅ iñâmava sərəh arənah marək ri saṅ Aja bapâṅinaṅa rakva liṅ ra bibi liṅ nikaṅ aṅujarakən vaśâsəmu guyu 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pratāpa naranāthaputra kumutug pracalita kadi parvatâgni dumilah ikaṅ vvaṅ aṅuṅaṅ baṅun kusuma sālas anəḍəṅ ika kāri tan papəgatan manahnya ginəsəṅ təkêṅ turida rāga nika paḍa hilaṅ syuh aṅdadi havu ya teka hinañutnya riṅ nr̥patiputra sakala sira pə̄h niṅ arṇava madhu 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

manis niṅ ucapan kaka dyah ari liṅnya sinəpuhan i raśmi niṅ vulat arūm ya teka kinabehan iṅ vvaṅ aṅuṅaṅ mr̥du lalita rasanya rāgakaraṇa raras-raras i denya miṅgək aṅənāni n* aṅucap api tan vruhən hana mulat halisnya minahānya molah amaṅun gət* unəṅ arəṅu maṅlare ri saṅ Aja 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


strī-stry âṅucap sojar ikā yinuktyan liṅnyê narendrātmaja mūḍhabuddhi akveh sira ṅke nagarī ry Ayodhyā sāmantaputrī paḍa yogya-yogyan. 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yadyan təkā dlāha sirê Vidarbha tan suṅsuṅən riṅ kakavin vilāpa tan kevva riṅ rāga təkap suputrī bhagnapratijñā mulihêraṅ-eraṅ 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan vuvusnyê naranāthaputra ndan rakva parnah jaruman gatinya vvantən suputrī paṅadunya yogya marmanya duhkhê saṅ Aja n tan ahyun 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

parnah kakanyâsrak atuṅga yôjar antən hade denta təkôjar apyak putrī paran tan harəpê tuhanku hyaṅ niṅ purī tovi yayā sirâhyun 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅko n marê śrī naranātha Bhoja ambək nira śrîndumatī pakādin ghārâpan atyanta viśeṣaputrī sāmantaputrī sira tā maṅadyah 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan sahurnyê paṅucap ny arinya bhāvanya miṅgək tumikəl halisnya koṅ aṅdələ̄ solah ikā n asəṅhit gə̄ṅ krodha sojar nika karṇaśūla 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvantən kili vrəddha sahur nirâtvaṅ sajñêbu ni ṅvaṅ kṣama ta ṅhulun dyah buddhinta kevalya sumorakən saṅ sāmantaputrîndumatī viśeṣa 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tan sor sirêṅ janma karājaputryan riṅ vīrya siṅgih sira tan paḍâḍah* ndan yogya ghārâpa hivaṅ nirêbu mūlya n minūlyan krama niṅ dadi vvaṅ 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan sahur saṅ viku vr̥ddharūpa məṅgəp pratuhv âsəmu pakṣapāta milv âhadenî sira yan lumampah rovaṅ nirâgoṣṭhi vulatnya heva 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


tucapa ṅ* vvaṅ i paṅguṅ ika kadi vayaṅ jinajar kinudaṅ sakunaṅ-kunaṅ iṅ taliṅa larap i hintən* ika n kuməñar hana tâṅadəg an hayu nika kahiḍəp kadi modahita i kasiṅkab i kenya hana kadi gibah vinuluṅ sinurat 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paḍa tan humənəṅ sahana niṅ aṅuṅaṅ mavagəd-vagədan amanis-manisan mata nəhər araṅin-raṅinan paṅavak arupit-rupitan susu nəhər aləməs-ləməsan luṅayan sira saṅ sinajinya saṅ Aja juga nora muvah kinire 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nr̥paputra səḍəṅ sapavulatan aveh ləṅəṅêṅ* aṅuṅaṅ tadanantara meh ləpasa laku nira vəkas iṅ nagara amanis kadi tan pəgata vulat irê salavaṅ-salavaṅ amalar hana niṅ vvaṅ ahaliṅana kori məṅā sasisih 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

araras rinasan patəmu nira vulat rasa tan ləpara kalavan saṅ akūṅ alavas i sira kady avarəg-varəgan apatūtan unəṅ kasih-arəp inatīta tiniṅgalakən i layat nira kāri saṅ ahayu vulatnya tinambaṅ ira 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nda* atīta sira n kajənəkan akurən vulat esy akadi asalin viṣaya n ləpas i mukha nikaṅ ləbuh iṅ nagara kuṭi śāla lumaṅkuṅ i təpi niṅ ayun tirisanya pənuh panəḍəṅ ni vuṅūnya mamituturi rāga nirêṅ aṅuṅaṅ 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kadi vah Surasindhu bala saṅ Aja kātatakut gumuruh ratha rəṅga padāti kadi parahu sə̄h adulur humilī gajah aṅgala ghūrṇita piraṅ ivu kady asibū gumuluṅ sagəḍaṅ kahilī gaḍiṅ ika tulalenya lumintah avās* 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paḍa bhakti hənū nira sakalihatan paḍa tan humənəṅ valaharnya lavan pahatan asaji mīna sayub cumaḍaṅ amapag vaṅi niṅ kusuma vinava niṅ pavana mrik arūm bhramarâsəmu maṅhaturakən i gavenya kiduṅ ri sira 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kadi maṇḍala ramya ni papupul ikaṅ kayu-kayv asəkar vaṅunanya vuṅū səḍəṅ asinaṅ añaṇḍi minerv aruhur humilī* vulakanya paḍa caluṅanêka katon humaḍaṅ hulu kəmbaṅ ikaṅ gaḍuṅ anəpərakən ri narendrasuta 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

patapan kəna rāga kayu manis ikā sinəpər-səpəran amapag mata jāti ni mata ni vuluh nika tan vriṅ iraṅ aḍahəm haḍavanya rumara-rara harṣaja denya mulat pajajar ni pabañvan ika kapahiriṅ milu kady aṅaraṅ 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ Aja sira kaṅelan muṅgah riṅ ratha vəkasan saṅ agajah aturaṅgânuṅgaṅ sabhya ciha-ciha mvaṅ agiliṅan arampak vvaṅ sāmānya tan ahaləp saṅ aḍarat alarêraṅ kagrək-grək magaravalan 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nr̥pasuta ləpas eṅgal prāptêṅ thāni kuluvutan satəka-təka ni lampah niṅ vadvânamun adulur i harəp i vuri* lumrânəṅkv âyun manasa-nasar havan arupək inambah membuh lvā kadi tinəpa 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vukir ajajar ahaṇḍap-haṇḍap śūnya maṅililan kadi kukusan amuñjuṅ puñcaknyârnəb inululan hana talaga riṅ agra ndan vvainyâhaṅət ahasin pinara-paran iṅ adyus baryan landəp avukiran 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

suku-suku nika durgâtyantêvəh nika pinaran pinəga tinəpa de niṅ molah ṅūni riṅ alavas sahaja malivat i jro ṅkân līlâməkasi parab dadali nika laki-strī prāptânambər asahuran 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lura-lurah aparək lvah guṅguṅ vvainya* ḍinavuhan papupulan ikaṅ aṅhvan ramyâḍə̄m aṅariṅ-ariṅ paḍa marək adum uṅgvan yan vvaṅ* śreṣṭhi humalivat asila-sila ri piṅgir niṅ mārgâmalaku sərəh 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

umah atiśaya denyâporaṅ məṅgəp aṅililan vvaṅ ika paḍa humə̄t riṅ buddhy âlumbuṅ alit-alit təka ri sapi nikâlit norâkral-kral aməḍusi talaga nika jugâlvâṅlaṅhuy-laṅhuyakən agə̄ṅ 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hana ta baṅun amet vvaṅ doṣa n krūra ləkas ikā amava tali lavan kris pamraṅ-mraṅnya habalaṅan sapi nika sinikəpnyâṅrəñcal maṅlavan agalak ri huvus ika katalyan keṇḍit dinval iṅ aṅulaṅ 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nr̥patisuta kaluṅhâdoh śīghra n saha śakaṭa karaṇa nira n araryan mvaṅ sakveh ni bala nira amarəki pəkən alvā thāny âgə̄ṅ pakuləmana pira ta puluh i dūvanyâkveh sə̄h paḍa vinəgil 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ Aja kadi hanê jro rājyâpan sira kinəmit sahana-hana nikaṅ sarvāstra lvir pinakapagər ratha turaga tiniṅkah baprâṅrakṣa* sana-sini makagupura haləp niṅ mātaṅgâruhur ajajar 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tucapa para kadūvan tuṣṭa n paṅhinəpan ira sahana-hana ri deśanyâneka ṅ paḍa pamapag nr̥pasuta sira muṅguh* muṅgv iṅ* bvat halu təpi lor sama humatur aṅantî sor niṅ vāṇḍira magəlar 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

viku haji jənək aṅher iṅ śūnyâlavas amarāt vruh aṅaji sira santoṣâṅdo-dohi narapati nəhər amarahi sampun vr̥ddhâṅgə̄ṅ ulah alaṅə̄ atuha-tuha kadi brəm santən kāku manis ira 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sira ta marək aluṅguh milv iṅ dāyaka humatur kinasəgəhan apan vruh ṅūnîṅ rājya sira kabeh apituvi paḍa rovaṅ-rovaṅ niṅ maṅikət-ikət mukha niṅ aṅucap aśrī de niṅ mojar akakavin 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kṣamakəna bapa pavvat niṅ grāmyâdhama kaluṣa padapa hima lavan* centən mepâlpa lihatana* sama duvəga ri rakryan yan tvak hayva hali-halin pinakabañu-bañu ṅke ṅhiṅ yan len juga yan ikā 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vulatana kakudeśanyâthānî* gəgər asəpi ya tuna-tuna sərəh vvah təkvan tan hana dinadak palapat alas agaryaṅ-garyaṅ tan savəgilana linəṅəṅakən iṅ ambək marmanya n rəsəp alaṅə̄ 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aluru vahu kalahrvan* kayvanya n śravaṇamasa asəpa humuraṅ avyaṅ rurvan ronya kapavanan analukati təlā vvad niṅ sarvatrəṇa riṅ ayun pəjah aməkasi kiṅkiṅ luṅ niṅ jaṅga kapanasan 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

təvək i ragas i kayvanya n karvâraras alaṅə̄ təṅah i tal ika mambət-mambət kāṅinan aṅəlih* manis i lahaṅ ikâṅhiṅ panraṅ-nraṅ vulat amanis tiniru-tiru niṅ ahyas ronyârjâpatah akiris 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

səḍəṅ iṅ asujimāsâtyantêṅ kaṣṭa gatarasa karikil ika kuməṇḍəṅ tūt mārgâmacəki suku saha panas i hənunyâdoh vve nora pinalaku tuhun amuhara ramyā sakveh niṅ vvaṅ ika jənək 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

jalada kadi pətəṅ yan təmbe niṅ kapat alaṅə̄ javuh aməkasakən rəm riṅ kayvan hañar asəmi vahu mari panaṅis niṅ kālaṅkyaṅ sukha sumayab asiga kadi tinambaṅ vahv înantukan agiraṅ 18

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tr̥ṇa taru paḍa məltik vījanya n masa kalima vavaṅ aluru kapiṅrəs tūt mārgâṅəlih alume linaran i kəñar iṅ vai yan luṅhā ṅ* rəməṅ anisih kadi pamanas i kuṅ niṅ kanyā dūra n atələba 19

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hañar abañu təgalnya n kānəm tapvan acarəcəh kadi sinipatan aprih mārganyâracək abənər turah i vərəh ikaṅ varṣâsat kāri kasarakat asəmu pupur areh tūt piṅgir niṅ halis inamər 20

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

brata nika ri səḍəṅ niṅ* māghâdyus rahina vəṅi javuh aṅapitu tan pāntyâdrəs maṅkin akəcəhan aṅura-ṅuraṅi teja hyaṅ candrârka kaginəman sukha salabuh ikaṅ luṅlūṅan māri kapiṅəlih 21

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ləbug i paləmahanyâjro riṅ* phālguna puraci patuna-tunahan iṅ ləmbv âsaṅsiṅ tahi papuṅən dvijavara sira baryan rəṅrəṅ mogha humalivat suməpər anasi pə̄han marmanya n śuci vəkasan 22

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

masa kasaṅa təka traṅ ndan mātrânəlani javuh ya karaṇa ni latəknyâtiṅgar vahv asat anisih sapapikatana gə̄ṅən təmbe niṅ manuk agalak tuhun asəpi hənūnya lvīr agriṅ paḍa caciṅən 23

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kusuma sahana māyvan yan vaiśākha paḍa vijah səkar iṅ asana kantun kady ahyun kalarakəna paṅirim-irim ikaṅ varṣâher veh ayu ḍumavuh kadi jaruman aṅinte rāgânīs amava taṅis 24

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

muvah asəkar alasnya jyeṣṭhâmiṅrvani sahapit tuhun aṅuraṅi rurvan de niṅ varṣa vahu mulih tura-turah i gərəhnyâgupyan meh aməkasana tuna-tuna kadi pamvit niṅ harṣâməkasi taṅis 25

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nahan ucapan ira mpuṅkv aṅde harṣa ri saṅ Aja vəṅi mara sakamantyan prāptâneka taḍah ira dvijavara sira mālih muṅgv iṅ bvat halu təpi lor para viku juga kāry âgoṣṭhi mvaṅ nr̥patanaya 27

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paḍahi marək agupyan śabdanyâmanis inamər kadi paṅucap-ucap niṅ muṅgv i jro jinəm akule apituvi sinamenîṅ gīta śrī nr̥patanaya rasa nika vinivekâneka ṅ pālapan amanis 28

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tucapa bala nirâkveh bhāvanya n paṅinum-inum aṅigəl aṅiduṅ asraṅ tvaknyâkveh kadi humilī paḍahi nika guməntər sinraṅ niṅ tabə-tabəhan kadi baribina saṅ hyaṅ riṅ svargâtukupa kapə̄ 29

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


luṅhā ṅ māsa pilih təṅah vəṅi tiḍəm sahana niṅ aṅinum paḍâturū tistis nora mumik tuhun saṅ Aja tan mrəm amaṅu-maṅu tan kənêṅ turū aṅhiṅ ramya rinəṅvakən panalimur-nalimur ira ri kiṅkiṅ iṅ hati gəṇḍiṅ valyan arūm svaranya karəṅə̄ savəṅi kiniduṅan kiduṅ buvun 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lor vetan pamalantənan kaparək iṅ lvah adaləm asamīpa paṅdyunan vvaṅnyâvuṅv amasaṅ damar vruh i masanya n amalu-malu meh tibā ṅ ənəm tan paśrī svara niṅ palu dyun asarag təvas amaribini ṅ* vvaṅ aṅrəṅə̄ endah mvaṅ palu vastra ramya kadi de niṅ amalu daluvaṅ rinəṅvakən 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aṅdyun* karva rabinya tan padivasâviḍiṅan avurahan silih cacad nitya ṅ śabda paḍêṅgal asrak amaləs hinalan* ulih ikâgave ghaṭa strīnyâmet parihāra tan vədi kadūṣana n ahala gave nikā paṭa kahyun-hyun kadi śaiva sogata mapaṅghaṭapaṭa juga hetu niṅ humuṅ 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakveh niṅ baṇijêṅ təpas paḍa sumambutakən i sagave nikâlavas norâpək paḍa lobha lābha kaharəpnya n akuṭa-kaṭikan paḍâdamar saṅkəp dvalnya huvus ratəṅ paḍa sumaṅgraha vijila niki n marêṅ pəkən asyaṅ-syaṅ karəṅə̄ humuṅ saṅa-saṅanya səmu niṅ aharəp katumbasa 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

eñjiṅ vāhu huvus ḍavuh pitu muni ṅ* paḍahi baṅun akon adandana sakveh niṅ prajurit paḍâmuṅu ri paṅhavin ika kamənanya maṅkata ardhêñjiṅ pva hiḍəpnya təkvan apuyəṅ ya ta karaṇa nikâturū muvah ṅhiṅ maṅkat saṅ Ajâkəmul-kəmul alañciṅan aṅarahakən sakêṅ ratha 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ mambaṅ Kavidoṣa tan vənaṅ adoh ri sira marək amaṅku pavvahan prajñā tan kasilib ri tiṅkah iṅ asevaka maṅinakanêṅ tuhan-tuhan vruh riṅ yogya kahənva de nira tinūt sapavarah ika ramya tūt gəgər yekā rakva hənūnya ṅūni n aṅalih saha jaruman ikâməgat gunuṅ 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkānê ləmbah* ikâlaṅə̄ pamaḍəkan vvaṅ ika vija-vijah paḍâṅayar lumrâkveh aputih vuyahnya kasavur sumarasah anamar vvay iṅ* javuh avrā tampər* ikâgəlar kasarakat-sarakat asəmu sāri niṅ puḍak harṣâmbək saṅ Aja n təkâvuya-vuyah mata tuvin aharip kadînusap 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

abhrā lvir səkar iṅ laṅit braja katon paməvəh i supit iṅ sahiṅ-sahiṅ aṅjrah tan kahanan ləvas pasuṅ ikâsira-sira kadi kəmbaṅ* iṅ karaṅ lvir luṅ niṅ katirah mirah ni suṅut iṅ huraṅ aṅariṅ-ariṅ marêṅ* lumut tūt mārgâharəmis pəjah kadi mənur saka salavə-lavə̄ sumamburat 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun ləpas ratha narendrasutâpan adrəs saṅ brāhmaṇê vuri lavan rəṣi śaiva boddha agyā paḍânututi tan hana kāry araryan muṅgv iṅ* gajâśva ratha masraṅ alumba-lumba 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lvah Narmadā katəmu de naranāthaputra saṅ brāhmaṇâsabha-sabhā ri ya sāri-sāri atyanta* nirmala paṅavruhanê śucinya marmanya n uttama vijilnya sakêṅ śaśāṅka 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri lvah sabhānya səḍəṅ adyus ahilya-hilyan nora ṅ bhayêriya putus vuhayâluṅâṅlvaṅ* aṅlaṅhuy adrəs anamar gajamīna* mətta himpər karaṅ liman i kāla nikâṅalimpuṅ 10

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun kənâmrih aṅusī pulihan tumandaṅ ndan sarvasandhi* ni śarīra nikâgrah aṅrəs yeka n paṅohan aṅadəg mati tan pasāra gor bhoh tibā kadi śilādri rəbah kaliṇḍvan 20

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition
