Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kalpadruma mrik inalapnya pamurṣitanya lvir puṣpavarṣa tumibê naranāthaputra āścarya buddhi nira sādara* de nirâṅliṅ hyaṅ hyaṅ paran kari kita syapa tā ṅaranta 22

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


kənoh patakvanta ri tiṅkah i ṅhulun ṅhulun kasaṅkhya n maṅaran Priyambada svaputra saṅ Citraratha prakāśita sirâdigandharvapatî kadevatan 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅhulun sakêṅ svarga viśāta lālana anuṅga-nuṅgal mahas iṅ vanāntara təkêṅ pasir tan hana tan kalaṅlaṅan laṅə̄ niṅ ambək saparan tinūtakən 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ṅke Narmadā ṅhulun acaṅkrama sāri-sāri kañcit kapaṅgih aṅadəg bhagavān Pataṅga pakṣâdyusâpatələsan tumuluy marêṅ lvah mogha ṅhulun tumurun aṅruhurî sirâdyus 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

gə̄ṅ krodha vākcala sira n panibāni* śāpa oyuh gajah təmahanamva maran mari hyaṅ ṅke tôṅgvanamva tan adoh ya sakêrikiṅ lvah nāhan vəkas ni paṅucap nira karṇaśūla 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tan mithya ri ṅhulun ikaṅ gajaməttarūpa byaktân asaṇḍuta ṅ ujar yan anəṅgah alvā saṅkêṅ amaṅgih* i vuyuṅ bhagavān Pataṅga tapvan śināpa tumuluy matəmah gajendra 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

an maṅkana bvat i vuyuṅ bhagavān Pataṅga kāruṇya buddhi nira riṅ vəkasan sirâsih āpan ṅhulun marək anəmbah apinta*-kāsih maṅhyaṅ ry anugraha nirê rikaṅ antaśāpa 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mojar sirâsəmu manis təkap iṅ tumiṅhal om hayva saṅśaya ri siddha niṅ antaśāpa tan lupta yan təka hələm saṅ Ajâhavan ṅke tuṅtuṅ ni sañjata nikā havananta mantuk 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun sirâməkasakən vacanântaśāpa luṅhā sira ṅhulun aṅanti humer* təkanta soventa* tan təka ya kāraṇa niṅ* bhramanta məttâvərə̄ pira-piraṅ tahunən byamoha 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅke n ḍatəṅ kita sahâśva sahasra saṅkhya ṅke Narmadâvija-vijah savatək-vatəkta mātəṅga papraṅ aṅiriṅ paḍa sāra śūra mavrəg rəbah binuru ni ṅhulun iṅ paḍə̄man 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aṅhiṅ kitâmanah anuṅsuṅ iṅ astra tīkṣṇa syuh kumbha ni ṅhulun ikā tinut iṅ paratra ndātan paniṣphala vavaṅ maluyâdadi hyaṅ sākṣāt kitâmr̥ta vijil nikaṅ antaśāpa 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

atyanta gə̄ṅ ni hutaṅ i ṅhulun apramāṇa saṅmohana ṅ pamaləsê kita divyaśastra gandharvaśastra pinajə̄ṅ hyaṅ asañjatêka jñānanta maṅləpasakən saha mantra siddhi 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

atyanta yogya yan ajinta ya kavruhanta kārādhananya saha mantra sahêndikanya pə̄ṅpə̄ṅ ṅhulun vruh i vəkas ni rusit-rusitnya śaktinya kavruhan anambəhanê guṇanta 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndātan pamatyani guṇanya yadin guṇanta śatrv âdhamâpituvi tan mati denya mūrcha moghâturū sahana niṅ ripu tan vri rātnya nistanya maṅkana yayā kita yan jayêṅ praṅ 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

he saṅ Priyambada kita n paṅutus paṅajya* moghâviraṅ hulun apan gumave laranta ṅūnî səḍəṅta matəmah gajamattarūpa tan len ṅhulun kaṅaranan karaṇanta māti 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hā hāh hade saṅ Aja denta manaṅgah eraṅ an sāhasâməjahi ri ṅhulunən gajendra āpan prasiddha kita maṅhvatakən kajanman atyanta gə̄ṅ i hutaṅ i ṅhulunən maluy hyaṅ 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yadyan sabhūr-bhuvah ikaṅ guṇa kavruhanta tātan sadoṣa yan atambəha vīrya sasvah ndā maṅkanā kita n aṅajya vimohanāstra taṅgap nihan hila-hila ṅ tumulak paveveh 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

an saṅ Priyambada kədə̄ maṅutus maṅajya mary âviraṅ saṅ Aja sampun atiṅkah uṅgvan lor saṅ Priyambada kidul saṅ Ajâtalaṅkup saṅmohanênaji nirêṅgal apan vidagdha 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sandhinya kāku saha śakti ni devatanya saṅyoga niṅ śaravara mvaṅ ikā tujunya sampun tama stuti nikā saha kūṭamantra saṅhāramantra paḍa kavruh ira prabheda 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vruh saṅ Priyambada ri harṣa narendraputra an pembuh astra śara sūkṣma mahāprabhāva tiṅkah niṅ apraṅ inucap nira mogha jambat amvit sirâsəmu manis baśa de niṅ ojar 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

he mitra mantuka kakanta lumarya maṅke siddhā ṅ prayojana kita n ḍatəṅêṅ Vidarbha nāhan vuvus nira nəhər* maṅagəm sərəh vvah luṅhâhavan gagana məltuk apan sira hyaṅ 18

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun prāpta sirêṅ surālaya Vicitraratha paḍa sukha n tumon sira ndan saṅ kāri kamānuṣan həla-həlâṅucap-ucap i səḍəṅ nirâpupul nistanya n tama de nirâṅaji tathāpi salahasa ri saṅ Priyambada yan təṅhā kadi tan tumuṅkula savet ni karakətan irâṅdələ̄ tavaṅ 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sandhyākāla pasaṅ damar nr̥patiputra manaḍah i huvus nirâjapa eñjiṅ pūrvaka saṅ Priyambada ginoṣṭhi nira mahuvusan təṅah vəṅi vahv amrəm tumuluy tinaṅhi sira maṅkat asaləsək i tīra niṅ nadī gəntər ni grit ikaṅ rathâməkarakən kucup iṅ asana ramya tūt hənū 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

eñjiṅ kāla nira n təkêṅ pasir alasnya pətəṅ asəmu śeṣa niṅ vəṅi lvir harṣā gaganâsəgəh pavulatanya gərəh ika kadi priyambada moghâśrī kuməḍap kilatnya nəhər aṅluru-luru kadi medi maṅdu-lor kady ânəmbahakən* səkar niṅ asanânisi huyaṅ i riris nikâṅdadak 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mambə̄ sāgara ramya niṅ laṅit avarṇa tali hurut-urutnya tan pəgat kālaṅkyaṅnya baṅun jukuṅ niṅ amayaṅ ləyəp i lari nikâmaḍəm ḍarat kuntul mə̄r kadi tuṇḍan iṅ banava kāri tan ilu kajahat lanâlayar saṅ hyaṅ candra baṅun bahitra ḍatəṅ iṅ kuləm amava śaśā marê Java 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

megha lvir karaṅ iṅ laṅit kadi vərəh limut ika ri sare nikâputih vahv âmīt i kuvuṅ-kuvuṅnya savaneh karərəban akucəm pəgat-pəgat gəntərnyâvurahan humuṅ kadi katunvan i larap i kilat nikā murub runtuh piṅgir ikâtəmah javuh anūtakən aṅin* alaṅə̄ tibânisih 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ramya lvir siluman karaṅ ri mukha niṅ muhara paḍa-paḍâṅhapit bañu alvā tiṅkah i mekhalanya ri təṅah paṅadəg-adəgan iṅ marâṅləṅəṅ karvânuṅgul apāntaran sapaṅuhuh kadi gupura sivak sakêṅ adoh lvir hambal sphaṭikâṅ alun turunan iṅ kavi pəjah atuhâṅhañut* laṅə̄ 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

priṅgâhrit təpi niṅ samudra kadi paṅhinəpan* i ləṅəṅ iṅ labuh kapat lvir prāsāda* pukah karaṅ ni paraṅanya hana kadi siluṅluṅ iṅ kavi airtambaṅnya baṅun vvit iṅ truh asəvə̄ kilat avilət alūṅ avaṅkava lumrâvarṇa rəṅit kukusnya sinavat-savat inidəran iṅ guruṇḍaya 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

miṅgut piṇḍa nikaṅ karaṅ liman anuṅkuli* paraṅan i piṅgir iṅ tasik lvir molah tulale nikâmijilakən bañu kadi paṅanak niṅ ertali kahyun-hyun kumucur parəṅ rva tuməḍun ləṅəṅ aṅənani tiṅhas iṅ karaṅ rəmpū* syuh amənir-mənir kadi tinapyan iṅ aṅin aputih sumamburat 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paṇḍan māti ləṅəṅ sumuṇḍay akaraṅ-hulu karaṅ i sare nikaṅ pasir sakveh niṅ bhramarânaṅis paḍa sumuṅkəm aṅarəki səkar huvus ləvas dinyūs iṅ truh i saṅhub iṅ jaladhi saṅsaya ləṅəṅ arurub-rurub limut hemanyânvam* arūm puḍak nika tumūt pəjah i turuṅ ikâtulis ṭikā 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nyū dantâsəpi tuṅga-tuṅgal aṅadəg muṅgv î rəṅat niṅ trəbis ləṅləṅnya n hana riṅ pasir silih ave lāvan ryak iṅ sāgara tan vruh yan tinulis parab sahana niṅ vvahnyâkəmul nīrada de niṅ laṅv anaput katuṅkul i laṅə̄ niṅ nūsa mukṣa n rərəb 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ikaṅ prāsāda syuh karahan apa tekâmarikala tibê piṅgir niṅ sāgara kasih-arəp hyaṅ Gaṇapati katampvan* de niṅ ryak mata nira kuməmbəṅ kadi lumuh mulat kady ahyun vuṅvakəna sira yan kāla hasila 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sanistanya n tan vaspada viṣaya niṅ śabda karəṅə̄ təkap niṅ gəṇḍiṅ mvaṅ grəbəg i laku niṅ vvaṅ mapapagan yayâtah vr̥tta śrī Raghusuta karəṅv an sira təka vulat herən taṅ vvaṅ sanagara paḍâlah rəṅə-rəṅə̄n 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lumampah saṅ Bhojâmapag i saṅ Ajâpan sira təka kasuṅsuṅ riṅ mārgâṅucap-ucap aluṅguh paḍa sukha parəṅ maṅkat ramyâdulur iniriṅ iṅ vvaṅ sanagara ikaṅ rājya lvir bəntara mukha nikân ardha marupək 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


tiṅkah śrîndumatī n kapiṅ tiga nira n piniḍuḍuk i daləm kathākəna akveh pañcabale ri viṅkiṅan ikaṅ pamiḍuḍukan i sor huvus hibək de niṅ strī paḍa hinyasan cumurigênunus avak ika varṇa sañjata byaktâkūṅa kaləṅgakêṅ panulisan puḍak ikaṅ anulad raras nika 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tvas niṅ megha dinadyakən vaṅunan uttama pinahuvus iṅ labuh kapat tumpaṅ pitv aruhur sinaptabhuvanâparimita kalaṅə̄nya riṅ tavaṅ truh-truh mvaṅ larap iṅ kilat hatəp ikā karaṇa nika lanâkuvuṅ-kuvuṅ gəntərnyâṅdadi kumbaṅ edran anaṅis hana ləṅəṅ aṅurambat iṅ tətə̄ 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ryak niṅ tīrtha sinr̥ṣṭi vastra tinulis pinakatiba-tibān linaṅvakən tustus niṅ maṇi sūryakānta dumilah rahina vəṅi dinadyakən damar kəmbaṅ niṅ cirapattra kalpatarupuṣpa sadədəg aṅadəg tigaṅ siki māyā niṅ vulan iṅ samudra madhu śuddha saphala ginave laṅit-laṅit 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

byaktâbyakta nikaṅ tulis vuvuh i kādbhuta nika tulis iṅ huvus tama yan kəmbaṅ kadi mambva rūmnya kadi molaha vinilət i luṅgah iṅ gaḍuṅ mvaṅ yan vvaṅ-vvaṅan arja kady aṅucapâsəmu-səmu guyu de nikā mulat vimba hyaṅ Smara śuddhi de niṅ anulis lvir amanaha manah nr̥pātmajā 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkā tôṅgvan nr̥patiputrikā piniḍuḍuk tuhu-tuhu sira janma devatī tan sāmānya mahāprabhāva təka riṅ kaka-kaka kadi devakanyakā aśrī pahyas ira bvat Indravanitâmuvuhi haləp ira n hanêṅ sabhā ḍaṅ saṅghâguñəpan bhaṭāra karikâṅrakət ujar ira yan tumon sira 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakveh-kveh nira saṅ kadaṅ haji huvus kili marək atatā paḍâtuha mambə̄ parvata pājaran haləp i de nira humaləpakən suputrikā endah mvaṅ sira saṅ rare* hañar ataṅkil ahayu-hayu vahv amekhala mambə̄ maṇḍala riṅ sabhā paṅuparəṅga ni haləp ira riṅ nr̥pātmajā 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

strī-strī vāhu cumampakâsəmu hijo pamulu nika pinantəs iṅ sabhā sampirnyêṅ jaja tan paniṣphala hananya muvuhi haləp iṅ vulaṅ tatur tuṅgal denya mavâmbək abvat atuhan ri parək ika ri jə̄ṅ nr̥pātmajā lvir devī humatur sakêṅ surapadânrahakəna haləp iṅ surālaya 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


prah-prah nr̥pavaraduhitā ri guṇḍik ira len i kaka-kaka nira yan vruh-vruh agaməl aṅiduṅ lavan vruh aṅavat ya linəṅənan ira embuh pva guṇa nika siniṅhəlan kinaluṅan ya kinaləvihakən sampun pva ya kavi paḍa kāku siṅ guṇa samaṅkana ya kinarahan 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakvehnya paḍa marək anaṇḍaṅ anvam araras rara rahayu vagəd sabhyâmanis aṅucap ikāṅ asiṅhəl akaluṅ vahu kavi kakavin ndan rvaṅ puluh ikaṅ* akarah jitākṣara vicakṣaṇa naṭakagiṇa ṅhiṅ dyah Jayaluh ikaṅ inuttamâsisik əmās maṇi nəhər amava 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


prāpta ṅ rātri yayan katon hayu ni varṇa nira ri vijil iṅ niśākara hyaṅ-hyaṅ niṅ madhumāsa rūpa nira yan kasaṅa kasapuluh tiniṅhalan maṅke n māsa kapat hyaṅ iṅ masa kapat kahiḍəpan ira de nikaṅ mulat cañco strī liṅa niṅ tumon sira məne n huvus atəmu lavan nr̥pātmaja 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lumrâmintaṅ ahə̄m ri bāhu lumarap jənu nira kanakâṅhulap-hulap embuh sə̄ṅ ni tutup gəluṅ nira murub maṇik ika kadi motar-otaran de niṅ kostubha nīla kādbhuta səkar taji nira sumənə̄ kapañjutan* ūrṇā śuddha huvus hanêṅ rahi nirâsəmu paṅavaka təṅran iṅ hurip 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndin ṅgānya ṅ vvaṅ anəmva rūpa kadi rūpa* nira n ahayu rājaputrikā vvaṅ riṅ rājya yayan kapūhan aṅaləm ri sira kadi hañar-hañar mulat aśrī varṇa nira n tuhan saphala yogya n adəgakəna ratva niṅ tulis tan samvas lavaṅ iṅ kaḍatvan inucap milu-milu kavəṅān tiniṅhalan 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paṅkun mesya ṭikā kayogyan i vətis nira damarana teja niṅ vulan pantəs yan makasumpiṅən kikirən iṅ kuku-kuku nira kosapêṅ laṭi rekhan riṅ kakavin vilāpa kahaləp ni susu nira parantya niṅ parab tan sāhêṅ ratu śakti kenaka ni soca nira yan ikətən səkar taji 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ekəl roma nirâraras kadi katona rumaraba sakêṅ gəluṅ lukar akveh mahyun aṅuḍva de nira yan ahyas anisigi vajâṅhəmū guyu yogyâsaṅkan aṅin dumadyakəna polah i tikəl i halis nira n cala byaktâgatgat ataṅhya-taṅhya manah iṅ mulat i mukha nira n pasaṅ damar 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndin putry âhayu -hayv* amaṅpaṅa hayunya ri hayu nira n ahyas aṅḍiri sakveh niṅ vvaṅ ahadyan akryan asavaṅ hinayu marək i jə̄ṅ nirâlavas pahyas niṅ para pora maṅhiribi pahyas ira hinayu cihna niṅ manūt ekacchattra raras-raras nira paṅə̄ban iṅ ahayu sujanmakanyakā 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakveh saṅ ratu tan vənaṅ sahasa kevala humənəṅ aṅantyakən parih aṅlampū suməsəl śarīra nira tan vənaṅ anəkani senakê hati mogânaṅgəl arəs ruməṅvakən i kādbhuta ni hayu narendraputrikā mavvat rāga vilāpa cihna niṅ akūṅ alah aləh akirim-kirim ṭikā 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

akveh pahyas irârəbut kahulunan kahiḍəpan ira de nikaṅ marək rorv aṅ campaka ramya māyun-ayunan ri jaja nira n amaṅya-maṅyani lāvan pādapa tan vənaṅ sah i sirâməpəti gavay ika n səh iṅ gəluṅ tañjuṅ muṅgv i kapə̄ nira n mrik inaṅit marək araras anulya-nulyani 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

prāptôlih kalaṅə̄n ikāṅ asana ramya pinakakalasā nirâturū mvaṅ roṇḍonya tinap rinūpaka tilam sinalinan i səḍəṅ nikâluñut maṅgā səmpalən aṅkən eñjiṅ alapən humatura śayanā nira n rimaṅ svarga n māti kakiṅkiṅan huvus akīrty amihutaṅi laṅə̄ ri jə̄ṅ nira 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

molih varṣa sipat nirârahat i solah ika təka hirəṅ hanê mata kālanya n kahəmū səpah nira baṅun pinakaliḍah ira n hanê tutuk kāsih-kāsih irâlavas karika puṇḍutan ira kasəlap hanê hati ṅhiṅ kəṇḍit nira mās tumūt i parahasyan ira vahu marək sinanmata 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tambe rakva sira n svayambarakənâmiliha sakaharəp nira prabhu ndān ambək nira kevalâviraṅ i līṅa niṅ umulat anəṅgahâhaṅan āpan tan hana ṅūni kevala sirâmuṅari pinakakabvatan hañar yekā hetu nirâviveka kalavan kaka-kaka vihikan riṅ iṅgita 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndātan karkaśa de nirâṅucap-ucap ri pasəlur iṅ ujar sirâṅucap ndi ṅ parva ndi kitâṅrəṅə̄ n* hana kadi ṅhulun amiliha jalva riṅ sabhā yadyastun hana maṅkanā niyata ta pva viraṅ ika kadîraṅ i ṅhulun saṅkṣepanya huvus katon vidhi nareśvara dinulur i tan sih iṅ Vidhi 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

āpan kenaka niṅ kadi ṅhulun aṅanti ri kaka haji yan sirâsiha her-herən palarən hanâsiha bhaṭāra tuməkakəna dharma ni ṅhulun prāptânomaha yogya liṅ nr̥pati sambhava kaharəpa ni ṅhulun muvah yadyastun layata ṅhulun pi tavanən ry ubhaya haji paran kasaṅśaya 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lāvan yan hana ratv anomaha marā ta sira humaturê nareśvara ndātan kahyuna ni ṅhulun sira tuhun kaka haji sira kevalâharəp hayvâmidhyani ta pva sih-siha nirâmavarəṅəha ri buddhya ni ṅhulun ndak ton duhkha nikaṅ kinədvakən apaṅgiha viphala yan tan paḍâharəp 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yan kāṅən sukha niṅ licin dumadak ahyun adaluvaṅa harṣa riṅ jamaṅ denya n kilya rarā makāśraya* nareśvara kuməmita kāla niṅ rare yan vr̥ddhâjara dharma riṅ girivanâmagəhakəna ri dharma saṅ viku ramya ṅ vaṅ guru loka sarva təka yan lumaku-laku rinampak iṅ kili 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅke pva n ḍumavuh vidhi nrəpati tan pamavarəṅəh i buddhi ni ṅhulun ṅvaṅ dūra n vənaṅâjñalaṅghana tuhun rasa pəjaha tibêṅ paluṅguhan evəh tan kahiḍəp kalīṅa ni manah nira yan aharəp iṅ svayambara maṅgâṅdadya* limut ṅhulun ri viraṅ i ṅhulun amiliha jalva riṅ sabhā 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


tuhan i ṅhulun akṣamakəna paṅucap ni manəhta rəṅə̄n vidhi saṅ prabhu sambhava kəkəsakənê hati yogya dahat dumadak pva hade n katəkana rinasan ri manahta tuhan pira hayva nikâṅucapa n ahala yan hiniḍəp mahala 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pituhun vidhi saṅ prabhu tuhan anipis kaviraṅta hade paḍa vāhu ḍatəṅ sahana-hana* nikaṅ parivāra marək amahur-hurakən ri para ratu pinetnya sirêṅ vəgilən sira saṅ kinabehan inaləm ika rəṅvakənanta tuhan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ nāthêṅ Magadha prabhāva nira tan patəpi kadi laṅit maṅambara lvir vidyādhara darśanīya pakatonan i bala nira śūra dug siṅī ahyaṅ solah irâmanis kavadi de nira lituhayu tan pasiṅsiṅan sākṣāt Indra sakêṅ surālaya kaveni tumuta mijilêṅ svayambara 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

krūrākāra saṅ Aṅganātha sanirukti sira yan aruhur sulakṣaṇa sabhyâmbək nira tan rinakva sira yan prabhu lituhayu sādarâṅucap śakty ânindya mahāprabhāva kumutug bala nira paḍa śūra suśrama tan pendah kadi saṅ hyaṅ Agni mijil amralayakəna rumampaka ṅ jagat 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

siṅhâmbək saṅ Avantinātha kadi saṅ Yama guṇa nira lokapālaka norâdharma ṅaranya rakva yan i bhūmi nira paḍa sukhâgave hayu* sə̄h vadvā nira piṇḍa kiṅkarabalâmava curiga gadāyudhâpupul sākṣāt mr̥tyu curik nirâkas aluṅid baṅun aṅayam-ayam parāṅmukha 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tan pendah Baruṇânurun saṅ Anupādhipati suyaśa bhūmipālaka himpər sāgara kāṅinan bala nirâṅrvabi* nagara hibək təkê daləm təkvan lvir nira riṅ raṅin dhvaja vəlaṅ-vəlaṅ aputih arok lavan hirəṅ Rāhu mvaṅ śaśivimba rūpa nika kāraṇa ni musuh irâtabəh titir 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


siṅ solah saṅ Susenā pracalita kadi saṅ Bāyu riṅ buddhi madrəs vadvā-vadvā riṅ ambək lituhayu katəṅər yan pravīrâprih iṅ praṅ himpər seḍuṅ karəsrəs bala nira kumisik lvir gəlap holih asriṅ byakta* syūha ṅ musuh de nira n asəmu hudan sañjatâvor halisyus 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

*ṅhiṅ saṅ Hemāṅgadâtyanta sugih ira hibək mās maṇik rājayogya* līlâcum somya saṅ Vaiśravana paḍa nira n ghorarūpâdavâgə̄ṅ norânaṇḍaṅ yatan mās bala nira satəgal kāla niṅ hanyan aṅjrah sakveh niṅ śatru śīrṇâkuniṅa vulat ikā de nirâpan vah iṅ mās 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aśrī saṅ Pāṇḍya śuddhākr̥ti nira satirun paṇḍitânvam vidagdha tan kāsy-asih tuhun tan harəp iṅ ulah agasyak yayan sopacāra saṅ hyāṅ Īśāna sākṣāt paḍa nira n ahaləp riṅ sabhā nora tan vruh atyantêṅ yoga kavruh nira karaṇa nira n katvaṅ iṅ śatru śakti 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvantən saṅkêry Ayodhyā lituhayu dahatən rājaputrâdvitīya ndan rakvânak mahārāja Raghu saṅ Aja saṅjñā* nirêṅ rāt prakāśa saṅ saptādhikrətâtyanta haləp ira kabeh sor kagə̄ṅan pratāpa* himpər candrâkucəm tan vani mulat i narendrātmaja lvir hyaṅ arka 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ hyaṅ Brahmâgave rūpa nira kadi paran riṅ raras mār manisnya yadyan gandharva vidyādhara niyata nikâsora riṅ rūpa kālih aṅhiṅ hyaṅ Kāma saṅ sambhava mapaga raras rūm nirêṅ martyaloka sampun pvâṅāśrayê citta nira masuruhan rāga kuṅ don irâṅher 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndān ambək ni ṅhulun ṅhiṅ sira juga kadələ̄ n kāptya rakryan suputrī anvam pūrṇêṅ paṅavruh lituhayu taruṇâpālapan kṣatriyāṅśa jaṅgâṅuṅsir kapat ramya nira vinulatan dlāha yadyan patəmva āpan tuṅgal sirêṅ rūm kadi vulan aṅilo vimba niṅ candrakānta * 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan ujarnya paḍâsəlur avara-varah kinatuṅgalakən sə̄ṅ i manahnya katon səmu-semu niṅ akuṅ ri narendrasuta ṅhiṅ kakəna* prih ikā sira viṣaya ni goṣṭhi nika n paṅucap rūpa nira sthiti ri tvas ika sinamudāya lavan turida 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrîndumatī sukha mār hati nira ruməṅə̄ ry ucapanya rəsəp yan tan avədya sirêṅ vvaṅ atuha hana buddhi nirâməpəra rāga nirê saṅ Ajâvətu taṅis inamər vədi kavruhana liṅ nira mogha lumuh yan aharip araras parihāra nira 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mojar ikaṅ rinahasyan ira vacana liṅnya rəṅə̄n ta tuhan saṅ ratu tan hana tan lituhayu kadi devata rakva sira ndan paḍa sor sira de saṅ Aja saphala putra narendra Raghu hīṅan ira n sira yogya kaharəpana digjaya rūpa nira 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrîndumatī kəna rāga tuhun api hade kadi tan malara de nira mojar apet silib amarani lokika buddhi nira hayva vavaṅ pinisiṅgih ujar ika tuhun hiḍəpən sakarəṅ āpan ikaṅ dadi janma sakaharəp ikā kaka mogha dudū 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nista nikân apadudvan ibu kaharəp iṅ dadi janma kabeh yan kinatuṅgalakən ndya tika hala nikā tuhanən pituhun māsku mataṅnya kakūṅana saṅ Aja tuvin vvaṅ anakta sira hayva kədə̄ liṅ ira ndan asəmu-səmu harṣa nəhər gumuyu 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndah paḍa bindar ikaṅ marək i sira kapeṅin ajalva muvah mogha girahyasən ambək ika katanəhan turidâṅlarani asyaṅ i rovaṅ ikâṅucap-ucapa kinonya marək-marəka liṅnya nihan sanu saṅ ratu pili-pilihan dumən i ṅvaṅ ari 6

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvaṅ-vvaṅ ahadvan agatgat anagu-nagu məṅgəp atəṅv ahəniṅ bhāva nika n kəna rāga hanan asidəhâlupa tan paṅinaṅ vyartha sərəhnya hanê taṅan inagəm-agəm tuhu-tuhv alaṅə̄ bhrānta rumūpaka saṅ suṅana sərəh asūṅa səpah ri vaja 7

len taṅ* agoṣṭhi ri gīta saṅ Aja ginavenya hañar katəka dudv aṅaləm ri palambaṅ ira mamaranî manis iṅ paṅikət śrîndumatī kavəlad hati nira ruməṅə̄ ri rasanya ləṅəṅ lvir jaruman saṅ Ajâmisiki hiḍəp irâsriṅ akon mijila 8

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ vvaṅ inuttama sampun adaluvaṅ adoh sira riṅ viṣaya milv atuhâmbək irârarəm arəja suśīla lanâsiḍakəp tan rəṅu tan lumiriṅ duga-duga pakatonan i tiṅhal ira yan paṅucap sira tan paṅucap-ucapa len saka riṅ kavikun 9

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

strī səḍəṅ iṅ viṣayânvam ahaṅan apasabraṅan ambək ika mvaṅ sira saṅ viku vr̥ddha marək aṅipi nāga milət ri sira yan vulat aṅdu matanya dinulur i halisnya tikəl minahā marma manisnya paḍâṅucapakən i kaharṣa nikā karəṅə̄ 10

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


viku rājya kavi vruh aṅaji kaharəpku siviṅkva sanu kakavinya palar piguṇana ri parəknya ri jə̄ṅ nr̥pati ulah iṅ paḍa kāsy-asih aṅapi laṅə̄ hiḍəpəṅkva sukha kəmulaṅkva jajanya taṅan ika saput-saputaṅkva susu 1

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

agaḍuh kavi kāpti mami sanu vənaṅ pasabhā pavukir vijil iṅ pihutaṅ pavadal inani rovaṅ ikânukhani kalavan kalaṅə̄nya vənaṅ anigakən manah iṅ prihatin yadin aṅləṅəṅâdulura maṅusirê trəbis iṅ paraṅan 2

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

puhavaṅ vahu-vahv amr̥ti-mr̥ti katə̄nku* siviṅku sanu turidaṅku kaḍaṇḍa n alavas aharəp vvatən iṅ banava aputək hati niṅ kasarapuṅ alaṅə̄ mulat iṅ pasisi kaputər hati ni ṅhulun alal aharəp tumutêṅ alayar 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

anak iṅ prajurit mətu pajurit* ikaṅ kaharəpku* sanu ləvu ramya niki n katəkana lurugan ri huvuskv atəmu havinəṅkva curiknya saha raṅin ikā payuṅaṅkva tumūt tan arəs yak umilva səḍəṅa nika keṇḍita riṅ palagan 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ya ta təmahana tiṅlur denya n śaiva sira sivin ikaṅ apalaran anvam vruh têṅ śāstra viku haji lilu tumakula lampūn dan yan paṇḍita nagara atuha-tuha bagañjiṅ byaktâṅhə̄bi yan inusir 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kunaṅ amuhara kiṅkiṅ yan bot svan sipi mararas viku mirah aguṇâśrī maṅgəh vikva narapati sira ta sivin aharyan santoṣâmalara dəmak palumutana yan anvam yan vr̥ddhâpuput anadi 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

taha* sanu yan i rantəntâṅhiṅ tyāga juga sivin sipi raras iṅ ataṇḍaṅ deśâdoh mahas alaṅə̄ ləvu sukha niṅ akarvan soṅsoṅ yan jamaṅ anipis pakararas ika paṅkun gantin mvaṅ palu daluvaṅ 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tuhu marika vuvusta ndan son mogha salah ile təka turida kəna prih de saṅ brāhmaṇa sinivi mulat iṅ avəka mambaṅ prajñā prāya jitasabhā ṅhiṅ amuhara viraṅroṅ heman dhūrta cala nika 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kunaṅ amuvuhi* rāgī riṅ tvas ni ṅhulun alavas vəka-vəka capaṅ aprih riṅ praṅ vāni panagara aṅavayuha saliṅ-liṅnya n sampun ṅvaṅ apatutan ikaṅ ujar ibu rakryan kadi asyaṅ maṅiṅin-iṅin 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nahan ucapan ikaṅ strī təmbenyânəmu turida tan avuni ri manahnya n bhrāntâkuṅ managu-nagu hana ta titir anambut vehan milv aṅucap-ucap mavara-varah i rumrūm niṅ sāminya* tan aviraṅ 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


rare mərə-mərəh pajātyan agəlo vinara-varahan iṅ pasaṅgaman mapaṅ* kumətər aṅgaməl susu taṅanya saha kətə-kətəg sumamburat ulih niṅ amuruk-muruk tinaṅanan ri pataṅanan i sandhi niṅ prəman huvus pva ya tamâharəp vayuha tan rəṇa kadi manah iṅ tamêṅ aji 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

dudū sanu lavan huvus pracacah asriṅ arabi sinivi priyambada huvus tama karāsikanya kadi vah madhu rasa nika riṅ giṇâmanis amakpak aṅucap tuhan tinikəlan halis i səḍəṅ ikâṅgaməl tapih baṅun pəjaha riṅ karaṅ hulu taṅan ṅvaṅ i paṅamər ikâṅalap hati 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ikaṅ kavi ñamut laṅə̄nya rinasan saha kakavin araśmi riṅ tilam ikaṅ jariji mogha kelu ginaməlnya kinuku hiniḍəp-hiḍəp tanah lanânipati pet manis kavava kelu kadi ləkas ikânulis karas kiduṅnya panurū-nurūnya sahajâṅgaməli susu nəhər kinaṅsyakən 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pravīra sinivi priyambada tuhun kavatək ulah ika n vanîṅ raṇa añumbu kadi de nika n paṅalavaṅ raṅin i səḍəṅ ika n paṅolakən anaṅtaṅ amapag vulat nəhər aminta linavanan anūt mamaṅkvakən marêṅ susu taṅanya mogha hiniḍəp nika ḍuka-ḍuka niṅ curik siṅī 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lavan-lavanan i ṅhulun viku mirah lituhayu pinakesi niṅ kuṭi manisnya kadi poh apādapa tiki n mamaragi gula gaṇṭi dug siṅī liriṅnya pinarantyan i ṅhulun iṅ ambyan iṅ umah i səḍəṅ nikânasi dudū svara nikê karinya karəṅə̄ panamaya nika yan parê ṅhulun 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan de nika goṣṭhi senak i manahnya panalimur ikâharip mata tan tuṅgal ruməṅə̄ ry ujarnya hana heva hana səmu pacəh məṅən-məṅən strī kryan-kryan paḍa mūla-mūla rabi niṅ kavi muvah aṅucap samaṅkana tan doṣâsiṅ ujarnya mogha minanis-manisan ika tinuṅtuṅan laṅə̄ 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan kenaka niṅ manuṣya sararā vərə-vərəha yayan papaṅgiha ambək nāgarika* vruhâṅikəta bhāṣa sakurasa savīja riṅ laṅə̄ yan pāyvan kakavin maṅarvana vilah kakavin ika palambaṅ iṅ yaśa yekā Kāma Ratī ṅaranya n araras paḍa kavi savavânak iṅ maṅə̄ 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

luṅhâṅdoha marêṅ pasir kahaləpanya n amarəṅana māsa kārttika sakvan selvan ahimya-himyana manumpaka ri valakaṅ iṅ karaṅ liman ramyâtuntunanêṅ hənī ri surud iṅ rvab i təpi-təpi saṅsayâḍake līlâmeta huraṅ tanah nəhər asumpiṅ asaṅu-saṅu saṅva niṅ maṅə̄ 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndak ton harṣa nika n parambakana riṅ bañu tuna-tuna mombak-ombakan kālih-kālih ikâdulur paḍa girahyasən anəmu laṅə̄ ləyəp dahat strīnyâmiṅkasakən tapih jənək amet uvur-uvur agəlar marêṅ təpi byaktâlūma kakə̄ma riṅ bañu hasin vətis ika panahā nikaṅ mulat 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rūpanya n mahasêṅ* pasir kadi katona mahasa ri samudra niṅ tulis āpan de ni ləyəp-ləyəp ni patəmunya kadi tasik avor lavan laṅit yadyastun yan aṅumbaṅêṅ* jaladhi kavruhan i pamilət iṅ kuvuṅ-kuvuṅ sākṣāt devata devatī mahas-ahas ləṅəṅ aṭika-ṭikan sakêṅ tavaṅ 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

buddhinya n vahu-vahv acaṅkrama marêṅ pasisi vahu mahas lavan priya maṅgā n* tan muliha n panon padulur iṅ layar asəmu matuntunan taṅan solihnya n pakaraṅ-karaṅ vinavanan taṅan ulah-ulah iṅ hañar-hañar apvī niṅ hiliran ya sādhana nikâkəla-kəlana ri piṅgir iṅ tasik 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

piṅgir niṅ paraṅan gihā vatu sumoṅ pinakapasaji riṅ marâṅləṅəṅ* priṅgârəs tinatar hənū nika suməṅka tumurun atupis rəṅat-rəṅat parnah lor maṅuṅaṅ tasik mukha nikā dunuṅan i kəñar iṅ niśākara ṅkāna n paṅhinəpâmaḍaṅ-vulana yadyan aharipa sukha n paḍâmrəma 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

təkvan pvêki n anak vəsi nrəpati kavvaṅan ika vəka niṅ* sinanmata yadyastun kilalan təkap saṅ ahulun pavəkasakəna riṅ marêṅ pasir byakta n mantuka molih-olih alaṅə̄ haturakəna ri jə̄ṅ nareśvara cihnanya n kavi karva kāsih ika vāhu vihikan asabhā-sabhâmasir* 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan vastu ni denya mojar api doh ndan abhimata nikê suputrikā śrī devîndumatī huvus vruh iṅ apa n kasiliba riṅ ujar samaṅkana *kālap buddhi nirêniriṅ vinava riṅ* ləṅəṅ amasir ahimya-himyana ndan mogâpi hade sahur nira paṅavruhana panalimur manah rimaṅ 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

siṅgih ṅgānya vuvusta ramya ṅ akurən sarara vərə-vərəh paḍâraras luṅhâsaṅva karas tanahnya mahasêṅ pasir adulur ahimya-himyana tan vaṅ mātra kasiṅya mātra manah i ṅhulun irikaṅ ulah samaṅkana ndak ton kevran ikaṅ giṇânivi taṅeh mamaḍana raras iṅ vujaṅ-vujaṅ 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

təkvan tan hana harṣa ni ṅhulun ataṇḍaṅa pasisi huvus tama ṅhulun pora vvaṅ nika tan vruh iṅ puruṣabheda hiliran amukət* hanâmayaṅ moghêraṅ ṅvaṅ* isin maṅambila karaṅ-karaṅan i pasurak niṅ ampuhan aṅhiṅ ryaknya maṅaṅkul-aṅkul ajajar baṅun asəgəh anəmbah iṅ maṅə̄ 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ambək ni ṅhulun iṅ vukir təka rəsəp mvaṅ aṅaləvihakən sakêṅ pasir de niṅ kveh nira paṇḍitâtapa ri parśva nika kumuliliṅ təkê ruhur yadyastun ṅvaṅ atiṅgalêṅ nagara vikva rara maṅusirê munīśvara ramya ṅ pakṣa vukir yayan ku n aṅuṅaṅ ry abhimata saṅ apakṣa sāgara 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

və̄ṅîṅ māsa kapat ṅhulun milu ri jə̄ṅ nr̥pati mahas-ahas mariṅ vukir saṅ hyaṅ lek i surup hyaṅ arka mijil aṅḍaḍari kadi maṅumbaṅ* iṅ pasir tūban mvaṅ gərəh iṅ patər tan asarag dhvani nika lalitânurū-nurū eñjiṅ meh tumibā ṅ ḍavuh pitu samaṅkana mavuṅu tinaṅhi niṅ cucur 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

abhrā kayvan ikaṅ vukir vijah arūm kadi pinisalinan səkar miṅiṅ len taṅ sarvalatâvilət samar arok baṅun ahurupa luṅgu-luṅguhan sakveh niṅ kayu mās lavan kayu puriṅ paḍa-paḍa masuṅut vəlas-harəp *ṅkānê piṅgir ikaṅ juraṅ pətuṅ ikā paḍa kadi pinituṅtuṅan limut 14

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

taham rakryan di ṅ parvata ləviha saṅkêṅ jalanidhi anūsâpaṇḍan raṅkaṅ apasir asaṅhub saha kilat muvah tan pāntyāntyâmpuhan ika baṅun kārttika sadā manuknyâlivran yan vahu mari javuh lvir laru*-laru 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

bhaṭārī Śrī pə̄h niṅ jaladhi pinutər lāvan amr̥ta muvah catrâśvâtyanta riṅ aṅuparəṅgê haləp ira tuvin hyaṅ Viṣṇu svāmi nira jənək i jro* jalanidhi mataṅnyan mūlya ṅ sāgara karaṇa niṅ parvata sinor 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tuhan putrī tan keməṅan iṅ ucapan yogya sahura huvus vruh rakvê* tiṅkah iṅ acala len kṣīrajaladhi apan yan mūḍhā buddhi nira pisaniṅv ânəmu sahur kunaṅ pvâpan prajñā sira sumahur apyak saha guyu 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rare saṅ Aja śakti pustaka ləṅən Raghuvəka vani kavy anuṅgali ikaṅ guṇa hanê sirâgaṇita riṅ kapana kavaśa tarka niṅ mulat prasiddha sira sūtra niṅ karavivaṅśan amagəhakən āgamêṅ prajā rusit niṅ aji ta pva rūpa nira tan hana ratu vənaṅ aṅdələ̄-dələ̄ 4

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun prāpta sirêṅ* sabhā pinakamaṅgala ni haləp ikaṅ svayambara śrī devîndumatī sirênarahakən mijila vahu huvus bhinūṣaṇan muṅgv iṅ ḍampa sirâpəgâṅənəb-ənəb kətə-kətəg ira mār sumamburat saśry âvarṇa tulis ḍinampan avənəs-vənəs asəmu rakət kapañjutan 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

endah ḍampa nirâpənəd kinajaṅan kusumaśara tinap linaṅvakən ronyêndrāyudha puṣpacāpa pikulanya mamukha-mukha nāga campaka mās tuṅgal nika puṣpaliṅga niṅ aṅarcana ri* pada bhaṭāra Manmatha nāgākāra surat-suratnya tinətəs ni luh iṅ akuṅ amaṅkvakən ṭikā 2

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ācārī kalavan karaṇḍan ira saṅ pinituhu ri tatā samâṅiriṅ sampun muṅgv i harəp sirâhaləp* acum nəhər aṅarahakən lumampaha kəṇḍaṅ goṅ muni t aṅkat-aṅkat atərəh dhvani nika karəṅə̄ sakê yava sakveh niṅ maṅuṅaṅ paḍâṅənəb-ənəb raras i hati nika n tumiṅhala 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


rakryan putrī mijil kābhinava haləp irâpūrva saṅkêṅ kaḍatvan aṅlīlâvās katon bhūṣaṇa nira kuməñar lvir panolih hyaṅ* arka aṅher riṅ gopurâṅrəgrəg i pasaləsək iṅ paṅharəp sə̄h marampak sākṣāt saṅ hyaṅ vulan vāhu mətu riṅ udayādrîniriṅ niṅ grahâkveh 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mogâhyaṅ de nirâmet hayu mamulaṅunî buddhi niṅ vvaṅ tumiṅhal hyaṅ* Śrī liṅnyê sirâṅiṇḍarat aharəp ametâśrayêṅ martyaloka len tekaṅ vvaṅ suməṅgah Ratih i sira sakêṅ svarga lāvan surastrī bhrantânəṅgah dvicandrâdulur i payuṅ irâtyanta śuddha rva sādəg 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nyū dantâkuniṅ aṅhapit gula-gula lvir ikaṅ amava pavvahan* gaḍiṅ tapvan vāla dahat rva sādəg abəbəd niyata kahirisan tvas iṅ mulat təṅgəknyâluṅ apiṇḍa kāṅinana polah ika n asəmu buṅkah iṅ pupus* aṅhiṅ dyah Jayavaspa*paṅhulu manisnya n anilihi mamaṅku pavvahan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tan havvan gati saṅ rarâhavu*-havu vvaṅ ahayu tinuras raras nika lūd bhasmāṅkura laṇḍa rakva sira saṅ tuha-tuha nika yan sakêṅ bibi solah seṅər ikâhaṅan gəsəṅ i pāmbəkan ika təkap iṅ smarānala yogyā kuṇḍaṅa niṅ manunvani pamiṅgir amənəma kaḍatvan iṅ musuh 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mopih vahv amayaṅ-mayaṅ ri hati niṅ mulat anəku-nəku pralāpita tapvan rañca hatinya kevala valəlvan amagəhakən iṅ kakanyakān kāsəṅkanya pilih pucaṅ-pucaṅan iṅ smara rumimaṅa buddhi niṅ kavi yogya n raṅkulən iṅ vanîṅ raṇa təṅahnya pasuṅakəna səmba-səmbahan 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tapvan vr̥ddha dahat sirêña nira lāvan uva nira paḍâkurug mirah ekəl roma nirâsəlat huvan ikaṅ hayu tumalavuṅan turuṅ ləvas luñcip niṅ kuku pantəs aṅgrəmusa lagy aṅuluṅ-uluṅi rāga niṅ mulat edran tiṅhal irêṅ sabhā baṅun anambəra hinayamakən titik maṅə̄ 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

putrī niṅ kryan anak vəsi nrəpati rakva kaka-kaka nirânvam iṅ vayah pantəs tan pamikārakən hayu rəṅunya muvuhi raras iṅ matâmanis lvir hyaṅ-hyaṅ təka tan hinundaṅ anurun sahana nika paḍâvulaṅ tatur kram niṅ sampir i bāhu mās inapi molah asəmu həlaranya n aṅlayaṅ 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ikaṅ mamava* kaṇḍi-kaṇḍi rara vahv agəluṅ ahayu poṣadhan lulut lumut -lumut ikaṅ payodhara vənaṅ paṅuvata səḍəṅ iṅ jajâhənək pupur nika vənaṅ paṅoṣadha piləg niṅ iruṅ apan arūm sakêṅ kapur lukar karika kenya mukhya pinakādi paṅuvata ri rāga niṅ rimaṅ 1

vagəd-vagəd ikāṅ añāmarani varga* pasisi saləmah lavan vukir savarga kalavan vulan mukha nikā kaləṅəṅan ika mitra niṅ cucur təṅahnya vahu vanva riṅ jriṅ aṅəlih vahu vaśa riṅ aśokapādapa sasīma kalavan mayūra gəluṅanya vəka niṅ asanâkadaṅ patər 2

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kanyā liṅta hade kaharṣana paḍanya salaga kapana n kakūṅana kuṅ jaṅgâṅalayan tathāpi kapana n pamiləta raras iṅ rara n ləvas* dr̥ṣṭāntanya səkar ləvas riṅ apa rakva vulatana məne n kasumpiṅa kiṅkiṅ tībra yan iṅ səḍəṅ rara rarasnya paḍa-paḍa lavan jrah iṅ səkar 1

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan de nira nātha* mojar apadudvan ulah-ulah ira n paḍâlulut buddhi śrī naranāthaputra milu rañca ri vulat ira riṅ nr̥pātmajā mūrchâpan vahu-vahv anon rakət aṅiṇḍarat anəmu ṭikā təkâlulut paṅ niṅ kūṅ asəvə̄ vilāpa kakavin tinama-tama nirê daləm hati 12

ndah nāhan liṅ narendrātmaja ri hati nirâpan sira bhrāntacitta rakryan putrī marê śrī Magadhapati pənuh vvaṅ manonton marê jro avrəg de saṅ Sunandā kadi lanaṅ aṅusī sāhasânəmbuṅ iṅ hvī ramyâvelā katon riṅ vəkasan aṅililan śrī suputrī tinonton 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


mojar śrΔ Magadhādhipê nr̥pasutā nihan ibu marəkâkisapvana socaṅkv îbu lavan matanta sakadaṅ paḍa-paḍa dadi niṅ gula drava atyantêbu hayunta tan patatalan tuhu-tuhu n avatāra niṅ Ratih heman māsku yatan papaṅgiha lavan ṅhulun apan avatāra niṅ Smara 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vruh ku n tan hana sanmatanta hana duṣṭa marəki ri kitâmadohakən tonton denta matanta məṅgəp amanis dumadak arəṅu yan tumon ṅhulun paṅron vimba nikuṅ halista n abənər kuṭila milu ri tuṅtuṅ iṅ hiḍəp tan saṅkêṅ hana doṣa kimburu manahta təka vival apeda ri ṅhulun 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan janma ni janma ni ṅhulun adadyana ratu tumutêṅ svayambara ndan rakryan ta muvah svayambarakənâmiliha ratu ri madhya niṅ sabhā denya n tan kinasanmatanta palalun sinalahasa ri tan sih iṅ Vidhi ramya ṅvaṅ pinagantakən tulusa tan tulusa tuvi yayâpuput raras 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan de Magadheśvarâṅucap arūm amalar i sahura nrəpātmajā śrī devîndumatī tan eṅəh apa tan hana manah ira keṅərê sira marma śrī naranātha mantən aṅucap təhər amaḍəm* ikaṅ smarê hati vruh ri vyartha ni kuṅ nirê nr̥pasutā n kadi viphala niṅ ahyun iṅ tulis 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ndah mojar saṅ Sunandā ri narapatisutā liṅnya tiṅhal tuhanku nāhan ta śrī mahārāja Magadhapati saṅ yogya petən sivinta yadyastun siddha rakryan sasisihana huləs dlāha lāvan narendra sakveh niṅ strī hanê jro nagara niyata tan sāha saṅkê padanta 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sugyan tan vruha māsku yan śrī Magadheśvara sira maṅaran Parantapa sampun śīrṇa musuh nirâvrəg i kaḍatvan ika* mati ri madhya niṅ raṇa aṅhiṅ pat lima śeṣa niṅ karahatan paḍa kavəkas anūt marê sira saṅkṣepanya yathārta* māsku sira yan prakaśita maṅaran Parantapa 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yan riṅ vīrya lavan guṇa syapa sirâṅləvihana sira yan paḍa prabhu vah* riṅ mās maṇik uttama ndya ṅ adagaṅ luməvihana sira n dhaneśvara sampun pūrṇa kadānaśūran ira kaprakaśita təka riṅ purāntara ṅhiṅ putrī kakuraṅ ni ghāra nira hetu niṅ aṅadu ri māskv aṅədvakən 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvantən* deśa ləṅəṅ ri Puṣpapura bhūmi nr̥pati pasamūhan iṅ kavi luh niṅ strī kəna rāga rakva talaganya pinarigi ri layvan iṅ gəluṅ sambatnya n panaṅis ya tâṅdadi madhubrata hana dadi cātakêṅ tavaṅ mambə̄ rūm ni mukhanya sampun atəmah kumuda məkar i tambvaṅ iṅ vulan 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkā tênduṅ parananta māməṅ-aməṅ an huvus atəmu lavan nareśvara bhuktin sih nira denta ramya niṅ atuntunan adulur akālihan payuṅ yêkā vīrya ṅaranya riṅ kadi kitâhayu pinuji yan amrih iṅ priya ramyâṅarvana ḍampa riṅ para-paran sipi vanəh iṅ akālihan tilam 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan liṅ saṅ Sunandâmanis araras arūm de nikâkon atəmva sampun kājar pratāpa nrəpati lavan ikaṅ vīrya sampun tiniṅkah ndātan mlecchā* suputrī n inucapan aṅucap len sakê saṅ narendra mogâsuṅsut məne n ahyuna kinədə-kədə̄ kevalâdoh riṅ ambək 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


śrī devîndumatī katon səmu ni buddhi nira n alalisê nareśvara āpan* tan hana raśmi-raśmi ni vulat nira pinarəkakən* vavaṅ miṅe yêkā hetu nira n kinon aṅalihâmvita rumuhun anəmbahê sira mambət madhya nirâṅgaluṅgaṅ i panəmbah ira kadi panəmbah iṅ tulis 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ry aṅkat śrī nr̥paputrikā śrī Magadheśvara kavəlas-arəp kamānuṣan mary âteja səpah nirâsəpa sigit-sigitan ira tibâkusêṅ ləmah tan śobhâkilayū vulat nira səkar nira maṅavay-ave hanêṅ kapə̄ tr̥ṣṇā kūṅ ira tan katolih inatīta nəhər inilagan yayan tumūt 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


śrī devîndumatī lumampah aṅəlih prāptê saṅ Aṅgādhipa ndātan vany asabhâhaliṅ-haliṅan iṅ ceṭī paḍâkveh marək tan sah dyah Jayavaspa lot linihaṅan bāhunya karvâviḍaṅ āpan kāsih irâlavas tuvin arūm tan sor dahat riṅ hayu 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


agyā ṅ buddhi saṅ Aṅganātha ri ḍatəṅ nr̥pavaraduhitā marê sira mojar tan panahânəkākən i lulut-lulut ira ri nareśvarātmajā ṅke rakryan mapa hetu niṅ kadi vival mulat ariris apakṣa maṅsula hāh vāliṅku təkâkisapvana kita n təka dumadak adoh təka ṅ tamuy 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

antənku n tuna kapva sihta vinaliṅku tumuta saparanku tan saha māskv induṅ ndi vəkas ni kuṅta palakuṅkva hurupən i lara prih i ṅhulun rāganta mvaṅ unəṅku denya n ahurup tali paṅuvata kiṅkiṅ i ṅhulun vet niṅ tan hana sanmatanta palarəṅkva karika karaṇanta tan sahur 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

dyah saṅ harṣa piniṇḍa ratnavanitâṅaraṅa karaṇa niṅ lanā lulut saṅ kiṅkiṅ ginave rarâhayu sujanma karaṇa niṅ akuṅ tumon kita saṅ rāgānala maṅdadi vvaṅ amanas-manasi hati kita n kinonəṅan saṅ rəs maṅdadi janma rājaduhitâmuhara vədi niṅ ahyunê kita 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan de nira mojar aṅrəsi hatîniṅət-iṅət apa tan kinahyunan heman vīrya nira mvaṅ uttama ni kaprabhun ira suyaśâdbhutêṅ jagat riṅ rūpâsəmu rūpa niṅ Smara savarga lavan asana riṅ labuh kapat tan kevə̄* viphalaprayāsa hana tan pinakadi kadi kambaṅ iṅ caru 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


mantən śrī naranātha mojar irikā ta dyah Sunandâṅucap liṅnya dyahku harəp kita vruha ri pāvak niṅ gərəh niṅ kapat nāhan māsku saṅ Aṅganātha pahavās gəntər madadyan ratu yogyâtəmva lavan kitā kita təmah niṅ cātakâmet javuh 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkānê rājya saṅ Aṅganātha vəkas iṅ ramyê huvus niṅ laga ry antuk saṅ prabhu maṅlurug saha bala lvir vah sakêṅ parvata gəntər niṅ grit ikaṅ rathânəmahakən kuṅ ni vvaṅ iṅ kārttika luh niṅ strī kahañaṅ ri līna ni ratunyâṅde paḍət niṅ ləbū 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndan heman tuna rājalakṣmi satəvəknya n rājya nirdevatī hetu śrī naranātha tan sthiti pijər luṅhā madevāśraya de niṅ hyūn ira* n aṅhyaṅa ṅ nagara mogha n kevəhan tan hana ṅhiṅ rakryan pakarājalakṣmi nira marma de nirâṅundaṅa 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan yan hana sanmatanta ri sirânambāna kiṅkiṅ nira ndak pinta nya səkar tajinta pamahugya mvaṅ sərəh riṅ kajaṅ taṅgap denta məne səpah nira katon heman yatan suṅsuṅən nya ṅ siṅhāsana karvananta pakisapvan māskv i paṅkvan haji 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan denya n aṅədvakən nr̥pasutâhyun vaspadê saṅ prabhu mogâcūm ararəm vulat nira sinuṅsuṅ riṅ vulat lə̄r* miṅe ndan dūrâhyuna kevalâvədi kumə̄l ambək nirâṅdoh arəs yan tiṅhal kadi tiṅhal iṅ mulat iṅ arcâṅher iṅ uṅgvan bhaya 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mālih śrîndumatī riniṅriṅ inarih de saṅ Sunandâmava āśābhūta saṅ Aṅganātha ri layad* devī nəhər tan valuy de niṅ bhrānta nirâṅikət rasa palambaṅ paṅlipur luh pinə̄m ṅkānê vatvan ikaṅ salə̄ panulisan marmā rasanyâmanis 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan saṅ maliṅ iṅ matâmatik i rūpaṅkv âṅəḍap yan vulat kālap denta manahku məṅgəp amanis rūpanta duṣṭêṅ hati mukṣa tvaskv i səḍəṅta mūr syapa ta len saṅkê kitâṅambila eman māsku tuhan-tuhan maliṅ atimpuh duryaśakṣatriya 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan hayva kita pramāda ri surup niṅ lek məne riṅ vəṅi prāptâmora kakanta hayva kita tan yatnā ry avaktêṅ jinəm sāk niṅ ken avanaṅkva mañjiṅ i parāhasyanta riṅ pamrəman maṅgā matya matâku pə̄kana kukuṅku n paṅguhā riṅ pupū 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nahan rasa ni de nirâhyun amaliṅ-maliṅana ri raras suputrikā agə̄ṅ sukha nira n tibā manah i saṅ katuduh arusita pva riṅ manah ri kāpusan ikaṅ smarâpunagi yan valuyana sira de nr̥pātmajā lumakva mapasaṅ-pasaṅ vuyaha yan mulih iriṅ-iriṅən marê daləm 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

atīta sira saṅ narendra maṅaraṅ tucapa sira narendrakanyakā sinuṇḍaṅ inamər kininkin aṅəlih rasa tumayuṅa kabvatan raras tuvin manah ira n prapañca kumətər hati nira mulat iṅ vvaṅ iṅ sabhā baṅun lumaku ri vvat evəh aləyə̄ maṅamər-amər i de nira n laku 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saharṣa saṅ Avantinātha ri ḍatəṅ saṅ ahayu pinakahyaṅ iṅ sabhā hanan pasiḍakəp hanan pasidəhâṅurah-arih ulah iṅ girahyasən vah iṅ kapitu tan pahī vətu ni rāga nira ri naranāthaputrikā pənuh maṅarape təkêṅ kaka-kakânvam atuha sinarambahan lulut 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

i maṅkana ni de nira n karakətan turida sinaput iṅ manobhava tan enak aṅinaṅ tan enak aṅucap humənəṅ apəga ta n sayâvənəs savet i* pamanas nikaṅ madanabahni ri hati nira maṅkin aṅlare ya kāraṇa nirâṅucap tan aviraṅ suməgə-səgəh i saṅ nr̥pātmajā 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


rakryan bhāgya kita n ḍatəṅ nihan aluṅguha yayi ri kisapvan i ṅhulun mās lāvan maṇik uttamârja humaḍaṅ pakəna nika panumbasê kita yadyan kaprabhun i ṅhulun suṅakənaṅkva ri kita yayi yan kitâharəp yan praṅ yan kakavin panəkva ni kakanta ri kita yayi yann apaṅgiha 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yan riṅ kārttikamāsa ramya masa ni ṅhulun aməṅ-aməṅ iṅ pasir vukir kuṇḍaṅ-kuṇḍaṅən i ṅhulun kita mulat-mulata ri kakavinku riṅ yaśa yan māsâsujimāsa ramya masa ni ṅhulun amənəm i rājya niṅ musuh kuṇḍaṅ-kuṇḍaṅa ni ṅhulun kita mulat-mulata ri kavaninku riṅ raṇa 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan de naranātha mojar araras mambə̄ laṅə̄ niṅ jinəm siṅgih yan pracacah karas vaśa ri tuṅtuṅ niṅ tanah riṅ kapə̄ siṅ soṅkab ni tutuk nirâvətu laṅə̄ kāmīrasâpet manis pə̄h niṅ harṣa pinə̄m atūt guru-laghunyârjâṅənoh lambaṅa 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ katvaṅ niṅ avarṇa campaka tumiṅhal sakṣaṇê saṅ prabhu ceṣṭākāra nirênarih vinulatan de saṅ Sunandâtaña māskv induṅ mapa buddhi rakryan i narendra n svāmya rakryan sira yogyâpan kadi mūla tuṅgal apasah maṅke n təmah mānuṣa 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


yadin kitâtəmva lavan narendra ry Avantideśâtiśayêṅ subhikṣa vvaṅ uttama vvaṅnya kavîṅgitajña pacaṅkramānanta pasir vukirnya 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

gunuṅ Mahākāla ṅaranya ramya kapunpunan de saṅ Avantinātha i pārśva-pārśvanya patīrtha-tīrthan pənuh dvijarṣy âjar-ajar tan imbā 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sabhā bhaṭārêśvara nityakāla śivāmbha sakveh ni bañunya śuddha kuləm pva saṅ hyaṅ tuvi kr̥ṣṇapakṣa yayâpaḍaṅ de nikaṅ ardhacandra 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paran tatan ramya nikā parāna pamenanê kāla nikaṅ basanta ikaṅ larâgə̄ṅ mala niṅ śarīra avās hilaṅ māry aṅaveśa denya 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


tāman saṅ nātha tan popama haləp ika sampun prakāśâdvitīya piṅgir niṅ lvah srəp ātis ny aṅin ika humaras gandha niṅ paṅkaja mrik sākṣāt svargātmakâpan sahana-hana nikaṅ kəmbaṅ aṅjrah paḍârūm heman yan lena saṅkê kita śaraṇa ni kādevatanya n pinūjā 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan de saṅ Sunandâmirəsəpakən i saṅ yogya karmā sudevī ndān ambək śrī suputrī miṅay atiməs adoh tan hana ṅ rāga mātra sampun vruh saṅ Sunandā karaṇa nika n akon muṅsirê saṅ Pratīpa asrət lampah nirâlon laku-laku jaladânūtakən mārutâlon 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndan saṅ kāry âṅaraṅ sis kavəlas-arəp irâmeri luh tan tinolih baryan tiṅhal ri devī sira rasa pəjahâpan rəmək tvas nira syuh limbe-limbe sudevī kadi maṅavay akon milva ri śrī narendra vet niṅ bhrāntâṅikət bhāṣa ri saruṅan ikaṅ patrəm aṅrəs rasanya 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ṅhulun yaśana rāga māsku pakadharman ənahana raras niṅ aṅrəṅih hayunta makavāṇḍiranya ya paṅə̄bana para-paranaṅkva yan rimaṅ prasənta ri daləm jinəm titisananta luh i lukar i kenta riṅ tilam susunta pakasādhananta kalavan pipi katiga təṅah maran ləpas 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan de śrī narendrânəmahakən i lulut kuṅ nirâvak vilāpa yêkī tan sah ri paṅkvan vinaca tiniliṅan koṅ rinəṅvan vinasvās adrəs luh śrī narendrâṅrasani rasa nikâpan katuhvan rasanya yogyâṅantyêṅ mahantən vacan iṅ alaradan kālapan ratnakanyā 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan putrī huvus mālih asəmu paṅalih niṅ səkar sālas aṅjrah kveh niṅ guṇḍik nira mvaṅ kaka-kaka rumarâṅasturi mrik vaṅinya lagy âtaṅkis humuṅ hambuluṅan i tali* kenyânamar* ṣaṭpada strī harṣâmbək saṅ Pratīpâmapag iṅ ujar arūm tustus iṅ laṅva-laṅvan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ibu t asy-asih kita kadaṅ-kadaṅa ri səḍəṅ i ṅhulun rimaṅ kita yogya mitra kulabandhv amarasana ri rāga ni ṅhulun pakavarga ni ṅhulun i paṅkvan asisihana raśmi niṅ prəman arənah manahkv aṅaku sānak iri kita patəmvan iṅ jaja 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pakənaṅkva yan marək i māskv amibikana laṭinta riṅ vaja lumut iṅ payodhara huvus kakiṅan usapanaṅkva riṅ jaja iruṅ i ṅhulun panutulaṅkva luh i pipi ri pamrih iṅ sipat lukar iṅ tapih salinanaṅkva karatala məne n pamaṅkvakən 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ndah yêki n liṅ narendrârasa mijila sakêṅ bhāṣa lāvan palambaṅ sotan ta ṅ sāri niṅ rāga piturun i laṅə̄ niṅ kavi bhrāntacitta tan paṅgintir manis niṅ təbu savukir apan tan patuṅtuṅ manisnya marmânyuh prāṇa rūmnyâsəmu paṅucapan iṅ vahv amaṅkv âṅdudut ken 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan putrī mulat riṅ nr̥pati kadi vulat niṅ ṭikā riṅ vilāpa mojar ta dyah Sunandā vvaya ta sira sivin śakty asaṅjñā Pratīpa sākṣāt svargânurun rūpa ni nagara nira ry Ânupa khyāti riṅ rāt kumbaṅ kəmbaṅ papaṅgihta* kadi patəmu niṅ kārttika mvaṅ basanta 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ Arjuna Sahasrabāhu riṅ usāna sira sinivi śakti nītimān prakāśa sira saṅ Daśānana musuh nira huvus ayaśâmatī musuh tathāpi kaparājayêṅ raṇa huvus hinuripan alavas pinañjara hana pva sira saṅ Pratīpa sira rakva vəka nira suśīla digjaya 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paran pva vəkas uṅsirənta paḍa vastu kita vəka niṅ uttamaprabhu para prabhu kapan paḍâsira lavan sira təvas amilət-milət vulat ameta kita len muvah təvas aṅel midər ibu kapana n pamaṅgiha mataṅnya sira səṅgahənta kaka yogya sira manuvalêṅ ujar* yayi 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


yadin siddhā rakryan sasisihana rūm niṅ silih asih avās rakryan glānâhuyaṅ apupul i jro* pakasutan hana lvah ramyâlvā prakaśita si Revā ṅaran ika kitâdyusa ṅkānêsuh-isuhana lāvan saṅ ahulun 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

raras niṅ karva svāmi paran ika rakvâṅləvihana marā riṅ tāman tan hana marəka līlā ṅvaṅ aṅənəs yadin madyūsêṅ lvah talaga vulakan śūnya kasənət vənaṅ sāmbək niṅ svāmi tariman apan tan hana mulat 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kalīṅanyâlah māsku marəka nihan dak parəkakən paran marmantâsuṅsut arəṅu miṅe tan pamituhu paṅantî paṅkvan saṅ prabhu hila-hila ṅ duhkha sivuhən apan māskv âpet-pet hayu pahayu buddhinta ri sira 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan liṅ saṅ Sunandâmirəsəpakən i tiṅkah narārya Pratīpa pathya vruh sopapattîṅgita nikaṅ ucap akrəp kəna prih narendra yâṅde tan saṅśayê tvas nira ri ḍatəṅa rakryan suputrî kisapvan kady aṅhyaṅ motusan vallabha mamagəhakən tan vuruṅ niṅ svakārya 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan putrī miṅe tan vavarəṅəh apa tan tr̥pti rakvê narendra saṅ nātha vruh sira n tan kinaharəpan ikaṅ buddhi maṅkin prapañca āśābhūtânulis ketaka rasa kakavin pə̄h nikaṅ rāga tībra tambā niṅ keraṅan tan vinadal* i liḍah iṅ kāma nāhan rasanya 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ibu tan paphala pva ṅ amalar i hayunta səḍəṅta rare syapa māsku kadi ṅhulun aṅurati rāga lavan turida katunan ləpihan kita kinirimakənku karaskv i kita* təka riṅ kararan pva kita mapa* tiki n sahajâpi lupa 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

səḍəṅ iṅ pabəlah turida kinəkəsanku kitêṅ ləpihan makasādhana kuṅkv aṅiṅət-iṅət i rūmta lanā n pinalar aṅadəg pva kitêṅ puḍak araras inastvakən iṅ bhramara vinaliṅku kitâṅ liṅa puji-puji yan ratu niṅ kusuma 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ apiṇḍa vukir ṅhulun ajar-ajarê kita muṅgva sadā tarukāṅkv i hayunta pamiṣayana rāga səḍəṅkv alulut licinêṅ śayanâkv anusupa ri huləsta sugandha miṅiṅ sipi māsku sukhaṅku katuruna ri sor i təṅahta rari 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan de śrī narendrâkakavina maṅani tvas nirê jro dravâṅras ndātan tiṅhal muvah riṅ nr̥pavaraduhitā kevalêraṅ tumuṅkul māry âśābhūta sampun pinəgat ira lulut kuṅ nirê śrī suputrī hetunya n tan vijil luh nira pamaḍəm irêṅ rāgabahnî daləm tvas 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun mālih sudevī kasusu laku nirâṅəñcuh-əñcuh kaṅelan ndan tiṅhal saṅ Susenâṅiriṅakən aṅamər tan vənaṅ sāh amaṇḍəṅ kady âdandan kisapvan yan alihan asilâhyūn amaṅkvê sudevī harṣâgyā-gyān* anuṅsuṅ riṅ ujar akakavin lvir katonêṅ palambaṅ 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


rakryan saṅ pinunagyakənku śaraṇāśraya tumuluṅa kiṅkiṅ i ṅhulun aṅlū māsku kisapvan i ṅhulun aluṅguha kita yayi hayva saṅśaya t asy-âsih kita māsihê* kavi guṇaṅku palar amaləsêṅ karāsikan lambā kaprabhun i ṅhulun kita rumaṅkəpana saphala yogya tuṅgalən 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅke n prāpta ni māsku tambay iṅ anon vvaṅ ahayu kadi devakanyakā yan riṅ śūnya katəmvananta saha bhūṣaṇa maṅənəsa tan parovaṅa byaktânəṅgaha devatī kaləmahan* ṅhulun iri kita dūra saṅśayā āpan de ni hayunta yogya kita māsku panadinakəna n pinaṅkvakən 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paṅkvankv îbu paranti niṅ vvaṅ anukər-nukər aṅəsah-əsah pinaṅkvakən śīrṇa syuh ləṅən i ṅhulun pinakarantunan i kuku niṅ epu tan panūt tan pamvas jaja ni ṅhulun vahu varas linavad i panəpak niṅ aṅrəṅih lagy emə̄ pipi ni ṅhulun sabha-sabhā ni vaja niṅ anulak vineh səpah 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sojar saṅ nātha kady âṅalapana kasusuk niṅ kənêṅ rāgapāśa kady ânambāna kiṅkiṅ niṅ amalaku suval kevəhan kāladeśa sākṣāt sambat niṅ onəṅ kinirimakən apet-pet manis de ni kuṅnya mambə̄ rūm niṅ katurvan vinuṅu ni jarumanyânəkākən vilāpa 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tatkāla śrī suputrī sapavulatan aṅantî harəp saṅ Susenā tan kantun saṅ Sunandā marək ataña təhər sopacārâtalaṅkup rakryan sampun kita vruh ri narapati mapâmbəkta māsku n patəmva āpan saṅ nātha sākṣāt Madana midər amet hyaṅ Ratī riṅ kaḍatvan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yadyastun māsku siddhâṅhaturakəna hayuntêṅ kisapvan narendra ṅkānêṅ Gəṅgā kitâmena mahas-ahasa riṅ nūsa śūnyê təṅahnya mvaṅ yan rakryan marêṅ Vr̥ndavana taman irânopamêṅ laṅva-laṅvan akveh bhuktinta ramyâmarəkana Yamunā lālanâkuvva-kuvva* 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan putrī tan eṅəh sira kinədə-kədə̄ yan panivyê narendra siṅgih rakva n rarā suṇṭi masəmu ləṅa suṇṭy âkalis de nirâmbək ndan buddhi śrī Susenā kadi pulut atəguh tan lumer de nirâhyun saṅkṣepanya ndi tan siddha kapalikətana śrī suputrî narendra 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

luṅhā lampah sudevī narapati kavəkas keraṅan tan tinolih kady agriṅ nora rakvâṅinaki laṅu-laṅun yan mulat riṅ sərəh* vvah rakryan putrī jugânuṅgayap i hati nirâtyanta riṅ priṅga viṣṭi maṅkin bhrāntâṅikət bhāṣa panalimur irê tībra niṅ rāga tikṣṇa 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


dyah mah luṅsuran i ṅhulun pasuṅa ni ṅhulun* iri kita māsku taṅgapən siñjaṅ-siñjaṅa rakryan iṅ paṅaraṅan ri huvus iṅ anulis* pralāpita gə̄ṅ ny âsihku ri māsku yogya suvalən ṅhulun amalaku luṅsuran tapih donyêbū pinakātmarakṣa n amərənkv abasahana təhər pamera* luh 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan saṅ hinarəp-harəpku śaraṇāśraya mulata ri rāga ni ṅhulun tan sênuṅsir adoh manahta salavasku təka ri kita mogha tan liniṅ ṅhiṅ gānyā hana kāsihanta ḍatu-ḍatva kahulunana tan sahê kita yêkī pañjiṅanaṅkva nitya saparan ṅhulun aṅucap-ucap lavan kita 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan bhāṣa nira n tiniṅgalakən iṅ paṅaraṅan i layat suputrikā mantən duhkha nirâsamun turida rāga ni manah ira tan tinūtakən śrī Hemāṅgada kabvatan* kuṅ i ḍatəṅ nr̥pavaraduhitā marê sira vvāgan mogha gumanty amukti lara rāga niyata sira tan kinahyunan 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


śrī devîndumatī ḍatəṅ sira ri saṅ sampun kaciryan smara evəh tan kahiḍəp harəp nira lavan tan hyūn irê saṅ prabhu ndān eman vəkasan katarkan i kalis ny ambək nira n tan rimaṅ aṅhiṅ piṅ rva mulat kapiṅ rva sahajâtuṅtuṅ tikəl niṅ halis 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun vaspada doh i rāga nira tan tuṅgal panononana suṅsut-suṅsut ira n kinon* marəka len tiṅhal nirâṅrəṅvani ākārêṅgita niṅ manah saha vijil niṅ śabda norâkadi ahyun kavruhana n tan ahyun* ika kaprajñān irâpet vival 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tan vruh śrī naranātha yan tan aharəp rakryan suputrî sira aṅgəṅgə̄ṅ kamadan tr̥ṇāṅkura* hiḍəp saṅ nātha riṅ vvaṅ kabeh hamham parcaya de ni rūpa nira təkvan śakti vānîṅ raṇa kədv âkuṅ makasoṅ larônəṅ ira yan pojar vaśâkon marā 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ sākṣāt Smarakanyakā saṅ anarīra ri hati saṅ amiṇḍa riṅ hiḍəp* buddhiṅkv âlal aṅantyakən siha ni māskv ahuyaṅ ajaruman pralāpita maṅke pvā təka tan vavaṅ marək avarṇa kəna guṇa miṅe kitâriris rakryan hayva kakanta māsku sinaranta kalalah ibu rāga ni ṅhulun 1

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakveh saṅ marək uttamottama vival mundur paḍâmid miṅe* aṅheman ri narendra yan sira tan antuk śrī suputrī mulat mvaṅ strī-strī paricārikā paḍa humuṅ maṅyogyanî saṅ prabhu ḍyam têkî vəkasan tuhun hana mulat yan saṅ Sunandâṅucap 1

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvantən rājya nirê* Kaliṅga kita yogya hyaṅ-hyaṅanyâhaləp təkvan parśva nikaṅ Mahendragiri hetunya n kadîndrālaya gəntər ny ampuhan iṅ mahodadhi karəṅv âgənturan tan pəgat aṅhiṅ donya mamuṅva saṅ prabhu lavan māsku n katurvān apə̄m 4

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vruh ku n tan paṅənoha kuṅku ri kitâpan ahayu sakadaṅ lavan Ratih tuṅgal rakva rarasta riṅ mukha lavan rəsəp i raras i māsku riṅ pupū rāgaṅkv îbu hanêṅ təṅahta kapipis lara turida kinə̄lva riṅ susu lampūn kaprəma riṅ pasaṅgaman i paṅhapit i vətis i māsku ri ṅhulun 2

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


rāga śrī naranāthaputra masəvə̄ kadi kayu ragas iṅ labuh kapat osik buddhi nirê ḍatəṅ nr̥pasutā vinaliṅ ira təkâkisapvana agyâveha səpah sakê vaja silih suvala guyu panarka niṅ mulat bvat śr̥ṅgāra dahat panāntva nira marma rasa nika rəsəp rinəṅvakən 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅke rakryan pakisapvan onəṅ alavas ṅhulun ibu saṅ apiṇḍa nīrada saṅ saṅhub ni lulutku saṅ patər i kuṅku kilat i pətəṅ i tvas i ṅhulun saṅ rəm niṅ turidâṅalah sih apuput huyaṅ aməkasakən putək hati saṅ truh-truh ni laṅə̄ṅku mukṣa hiniḍəp kinisapu sahajâtəmah riris 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

donkv aṅlitlita roma rakryan anapak-napaka hayu ni māsku riṅ tilam āpan tan hana len pramāṇa ri rarasta n aṅaraṅ aṅisapvakən puḍak māskv induṅ huniṅan ṅhulun ri manis iṅ mata sarasija kābunan madhu suṅsuṅ rāga təṅah purihta kalavan* pipi taḍaha ni luhta pintanən 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan de saṅ Ajâṅucap mətu raras ni kataruṇan irâṅhiḍəp smara mambə̄ turvan i paṅkvan aṅharas i paṅlavad iṅ ahayu riṅ pasaṅgaman kady aṅrəṅva rəṅih lavan paṅəsah iṅ kinisapu rasa niṅ vvaṅ aṅrəṅə̄ śrī devîndumatī pva muṣṭi niṅ akuṅ kapana sira n aṅiṣṭya mintara 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ujar saṅ Aja varṇa varṣa tumibânəkarakən asanâṅrəṅə̄ gərəh aśoka ḍinəḍər* savaṅ nr̥pasutā vahu kasiram alūṅ apādapa vavaṅ səkar irânəḍəṅ bhramara tan hana vani mara kevalâtilar apan saṅ Aja rakva tan vuruṅ aṅol aṅarəkana məne n pamaṅkvakən 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

narendratanayâvənəs mulat i rūpa saṅ Aja vavaṅ agriṅ aṅlayuṅ kasambət i manis-manis ni luṅid iṅ mata sarasija keṅgutan halis huvus vruh i manis nira n kasarik iṅ lituhayu subhagêṅ svayəmbara ya kāraṇa nirâharəp marəka paṅkun uvat-uvatanêṅ səpah sarik* 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

savet ni pamanas nikaṅ madanabahni ri hati nira maṅkin aṅlare tinarka nira rājaputra dadi niṅ Smara saṅ Aja marêṅ svayəmbara* muvah saṅ Aja saṅsayânaha-nahā mulat i hayu narendraputrikā Ratih karika sinvayəmbarakən* iṅ Madananagara liṅ nirê hati 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sipat nr̥pasutā lutur kadi humer i paṅusapa nareśvarātmaja gəluṅ nira baṅun harəp suruyanê jariji nr̥patiputra yan lukar aṅrəs kadi harəp kadəmvanana de saṅ Aja mata nirâṅdadak lumuh paniṅsət i tapih nirâsəmu harəp lukarana ni taṅan* nr̥pātmaja 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vaja nrəpatiputra kātara rarasnya təka ta mamusuh yan iṅ laṭi alal kətə-kətəg nirêṅ jaja lumiṇḍihana jaja narendraputrikā asaṅgraha nakhâluṅid taṅan irâmirah aharəp adun lavan susu təkêruṅ ira tan pakāla kuməsut səmu-səmu niṅ asəṅhit iṅ pipi 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ mambaṅ Kavidoṣa tan sah i narendrasuta marək amaṅku pavvahan lāvan dyah Jayavaspa kāsih ika tan sah i pada naranāthaputrikā ndan rakvênalapan səḍəṅnya n ahañaṅ tinut ika mapasah madum tuhan təmbenya n sapatiṅhalan paḍa lumuh kavəlas-arəp aluṅluṅan taṅis 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ mambaṅ Kavidoṣa mājar i narendratanaya nəhər aṅhəmū taṅis rakryan honya manəhta tiṅhalana pun marika makaṅaran Madhūdakā pun muṅgv î hiriṅan marək linihaṅan vagəd araras amaṅku pavvahan aṅhiṅ pun juga tan vənaṅ mulat avarṇa lara mata n aṅə̄lakən taṅis 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yadyastun nr̥paputrikā mara məne humaturakəna rūm nirê kita rakryan tan vənaṅ edihê sira yadin sira tuməṅəta pun Madhūdakā dūra n dhāraka riṅ lara smara manəhta pinasahakən iṅ tuhan-tuhan ṅhiṅ maty âṅaraṅê daganta bapa tan panəmu kahulunan sadā marək 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mvaṅ yan śrîndumatī tan aptya ri tuhanku muliha sira tan panoliha suṅsut śrī naranātha rakva ri manəhta bapa maṅulanəh turuṅ lipur byaktâṅgəgvana səmpalən bapa manəhta bapa kita tan avəlas maṅaryakən mātîṅ* māti kināladeśa kadi kambaṅ iṅ asana sinəmpal iṅ kapat 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan liṅnya nəhər tumuṅkul anaṅis tucapa ta panaṅis Madhūdakā hāh rakryan kadi riṅ paṅipyan ahurip takari manə-manəhta tiṅhali nāhan pun Madhusūdanâmvaṅi narendrasuta marək amaṅku pavvahan kəmbəṅ-kəmbəṅ i luh nipun* marahakən sih ipun arabi tan vənaṅ mulih 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅke ry antuk ipun tumūt ri naranāthatanaya baṅun aṅhuvus-huvus tan lot ṅgānya pun aṅhiḍəp turida rāga kadi vuruṅa matya monəṅa yêkā hetu nipun təkâhañutan aṅlalu pəjahana de nareśvara aṅhiṅ luh ni manəhta kahyuna nipun rurubakəna lavan ṅrəs iṅ taṅis 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ājñā śrī naranātha ṅūni ḍumavuh ri para panəpi riṅ pasir vukir an pun patyana tūt tlasən* haḍaṅən iṅ havan i havan ipun marêṅ musuh maṅke n tan hana patya-patyana sadoṣa nipun i səḍəṅ iṅ svayambara pun ṅgānyêka dumeh pun ahyuna mulat-mulata juga savet ny unəṅ nipun* 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hāh rakryan siha rakryan iṅ manə-manəh ṅhulun ibu pituhun ṅhulun tuhan nāhan śrī naranāthaputra pakisapvan ibu ri sira hayva tâvihaṅ āpan yan tuna kūṅ i māsku ri sirâpa ta haməṅana ni ṅhulun məne tan vandhyā mati karva pun Madhu manəhta tuhan i huvus iṅ svayambara 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

marmā de Jayavaspa mojar ataṅis təka hirəṅ i narendrakanyakā pantəs-pantəs apolahan marək atakvan i manah ira riṅ nr̥pātmajā siṅ solahnya vagəd hanan pamisusal-misusal api calâṅrəṅih-rəṅih kədv âkon marəkâkisapvana nəhər mulat arəṅu vaśâṅdələ̄ mata 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun dyah Jayavaspa mojar irikā ta dyah Sunandâṅucap rakryan tiṅhalananta māsku saṅ Ajâtyantêṅ haləp riṅ sabhā putra śrī Raghu potrakê haji Dilīpâṅhiṅ kadaṅtâparək śuddhakṣatriya sūryavaṅśa taruṇâṅhiṅ śakti maṅke n raray 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vasvāsənta haləp nirâṅdaśaguṇê rūm niṅ tulis mās tatur varṇākāra nirâmarājaya ri varṇākāra niṅ campaka muṅgv î pāda nirâlavan mirah i kəmbaṅ niṅ tavā kedəkan aṅhiṅ ketaka lot pinaṅkvakən ira n lvirnya n vətistâlaris 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tan sāhêṅ śarapuṣpa kenaka nirâpan lvir Smarâṅiṇḍarat mvaṅ maṅgəgvana puṣpacāpa ri kiva n paṅde* raras niṅ mulat pantəs muṅgva ri citta niṅ rara sujanma n sūkṣma tan pāvaka yogyâmaṅkva ri māskv apan paḍa lavan devī Ratih riṅ hayu 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan raśmi nikāṅ ujar təka rəsəp ri tvas narendrātmajā sampun vaspada kuṅ nirê saṅ Aja marma dyah Sunandā sukha ndan mogâṅjrum apet prahelika laṅə̄ siṅgih juga n* strī kavi denyâṅjrum rasa guyva-guyvan araras ndātan təke jro* hati 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


rakryan tan sasivinta māsku sira de ni karakətan irâṅurən laṅə̄ riṅ* tāman sira menduṅ-enduṅan aśoka məkar inarəkan pinaṅkvakən aṅkən māsa kapat mahas-mahas adoh sahaja majamahan karas tanah praṅ-praṅ ciṇḍaga ketakī pracacah akṣara salavas irâsih iṅ ṭikā 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan maṅsula māsku saṅ ratu kabeh muvah ibu parananta vasvasən piṅ pat piṅ lima vaspadākəna raras nira valuyana hayva saṅśaya yadyastun sira nora kāptya ni manahta muvah uvahana ṅ svayambara ṅkā ta dyah t adulur pahur-hurakənanta sira lamakananta mantuka 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan denya n amet prahelika laṅə̄ rasa kakavin anambyakən manis ndan simbantən adoha buddhi nira maṅkin arumah apulaṅ lavan smara tan vruh ry ambək irê narendrasuta yan sira vinarahakən marêṅ laṅə̄ tan pendah lara koluran* turida rāga nira ri saṅ Ajâvuvuh laṅə̄ 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndān ambək saṅ Ajânahā sira ri buddhya narapatisutā n tan ahyuna āpan tan huniṅê haləp niṅ asəkar-taji vədi mulatêṅ ajoṅ kuniṅ tan hep-hepən anivya riṅ kadi sirâpi puji sinahuran patik haji riṅ siṅhāsana saṅ katiṅgal aṅaraṅ paḍa ləṅəṅ aṅikət pralāpita 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aṅlampū saṅ Ajânahən turida māry amalar i harəpā suputrikā āpan tan ratu liṅ nirêry avak ira prabhu tuvi sira tan kinahyunan enak riṅ vəkasan manah nira harəp-harəpən amənaṅêṅ svayambara molah bāhu nirê təṅən marahakən ri pamənaṅa nirêṅ svayambara 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkā n jātismara putrikâtutur i rūpa saṅ Aja ri səḍəṅ nirâpsara riṅ svarga n pakurən lavan sira tuhun kapalaṅ-alaṅ i tan sih iṅ Vidhi maṅke pva n paḍa janma mānuṣa sirâtutur i silih asih nirâlavas vruh meraṅ kadi tan priyâpriya ri kāla nira n atəmu riṅ surālaya 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kāla śrîndumatī kapāśa təkap iṅ lara turida ḍinaṇḍan iṅ smara rāgâṅaṇḍəhi sāhasâmarəpəki tvas ira rasa kapatya riṅ sabhā yekā hetu nira n harəp marəka riṅ nr̥patanaya palar sirâsiha āpan yogya pakāśrayan saphala paṅgajaha maḍəmana ṅ smarānala 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ratnânopama candrasūryaja kaluṅ-kaluṅ ira naranāthaputrikā yêka n pavvat irê narendrasuta rāgapahula sumənə̄ marê mukha embuh teja nikā səḍəṅnya kinaluṅ-kaluṅakən ira riṅ nr̥pātmaja* lvir devī Ratih aṅhyasi Smara sira n paṅamər aṅənakən kaluṅ-kaluṅ 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nr̥pātmaja mulat ry avak nira sukhâmbək ira n amənaṅ iṅ svayambara paḍâṅrahati cakṣur ādi nira molih i turida narendraputrikā təkê mukha nirâprih olih inusap hariṅət ira tumus təkê jaja ginañjar ira riṅ sərəh vaja nirâsəmu-səmu guyu sabhya riṅ sabhā 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

para prabhu sirâlarâlah arəbut ri turida naranāthaputrikā paḍânəsəl avak nirâlaraṅ anaṇḍaṅ inucap ira duryaśaprabhu gəluṅ nira rusak mure n inalapan makuṭa nira katon paḍâkucəm tiḍəm vaja nirâsamun mari lumə̄ṅ hinilan ira sərəh məṅəs-məṅəs 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


hənəṅakəna narendra śrī putrī sira caritan mulih aṅalihi ḍampâvās de niṅ mulat i sira paḍa sukha paḍa harṣânəmvākən kaharəp ira patəmu nira vinasvās devī deva piniturun 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kaka-kaka nira mantən denyâpet vulat amanis akusikan apəgâprih yan lampah paḍa balisah silih usap i mukhâpan rūkṣa glāna hariṅətən vuvuh i hayu nikâṅhiṅ tiṅhalnyârəṅu n ahuyaṅ 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paḍahi paḍa guməntər muny asraṅ-sraṅan i harəp grəbəg i laku nikaṅ vvaṅ sāmānyâṅiriṅ adulur ri harəp i vuri lumrā sakveh niṅ para pajurit saha curiga karəsrəs maṅrakṣê nr̥patanaya 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri təka nira maluṅguh riṅ paryaṅka maṇimaya kaka-kaka para guṇḍik muṅgv î sor paḍa humarəp* kadi talaga patīrthan sakveh niṅ marək apupul nr̥pasuta nr̥paputrī tan pendah kumuda məkar 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tucapa ta para taṇḍa n tan sthity âkuṭa-kaṭikan pijər aṅarahakən vvaṅ siṅ yogyâṅatər-atəra hana sira viku vr̥ddhācārī motus atavura amilihi śubhasaṅjñā mvaṅ saṅ vruh-vruh atavura 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

səḍəṅ atavur ahosan ginyākən sira huvusa curiṅ amarəṅi ghaṇṭârūm lālitya tan asarag paḍahi niṅ atavur śabdanyâraśmi puja-pujān mahuvusan i huvus niṅ pañcabrahma kinənakən 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

huvus asaji pari rvaṅ saṅghârpat* saha pipisan pasikəpan ika tan sah soṅgvan mvaṅ hapit ajajar saṅ Aja sira maluṅguh ṅkāna mvaṅ nr̥paduhitā səmu ni manah irêraṅ yan tuṅkul baṅun aṅurit 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vidhi nr̥pati paṅajyan devī maṅdyusa ri sira nr̥patanaya lavan śrī devī śuddha manah ira ndan i huvus ira dinyus-dyus pahyas nira kuməñar kadi salaga kalahrvan məmbaṅ vāhu kajavuhan 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nr̥pavaraduhitâdan siñjaṅ vāhu sinalinan tapih ira katutuṅkul maṅde tuṅkula saṅ Aja dumadak amuharâśrī siṅ dodot nr̥patanaya silih asiha nirâṅhiṅ don iṅ vastra silih asih 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

atha ri huvus irâhyas prāpta mpuṅkv aṅarahakən sira tumuluy adandan sakveh niṅ marək aṅiriṅ i lari nira cumuṇḍuk riṅ devagrəha madulur dvijavara sira masyaṅ tan sāhê hiriṅan ira 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

huvus ajajar aluṅguh tapvan vanva silih asih sinivikaraṇa de saṅ paṇḍya brāhmaṇa matuha saṅ amava kuśapāśâṅgyākən mādəga ri sira kadi məbəda sira n tan sāhâtəmva silih asih 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hyaṅ Anala sukha harṣa n ton saṅ rvâṅidəri sira dilah ira paṅadeśan tan suṇḍe malad aṅadəg nr̥pavaraduhitâgyaṅ mogânolih i saṅ Aja səmu ni vulat irâjar yan piṅ sapta sira midər 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

muvah ajajar aluṅguh kālih-kālih ira marək kətər i taṅan ira n vahv âpāṇigraha* rumaras paḍa parəṅ anibākən pūrṇāhūti* saha samit Śiva sakala bhaṭārâgni n sākṣī niṅ avivaha 15

huvus mamūjā ri bhaṭāra Pāvaka parəṅ sirânəmbah inastvakən jaya lavan savīja n sinivi n jayêṅ raṇa muvah pratiṣṭhênabhivāda śāśvata 1

śinaṅkhapāṇyan sira de mahādvija muvah mahāpaṇḍita śaiva sogata maśaṅkhapāṇî* sira len mahāguru huvus vineh uttamadāna* de haji 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition
