Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

payuṅ putih rvarva manimbaṅî sira parəṅ lumampah tan adoh paḍâṅadəg pujut lavan jəṅgi rarâmavâhirəṅ baṅun graha rva-rva paḍâṅgayar vulan* 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ri huvus ira təkêṅ paprāsan bvat suranagara sahana-hana nikaṅ vvaṅ bhakty âṅañjali ri sira pasaji ri sira hampyal dantâśrī sira n apupul kadi Surapati saṅkêṅ svarga mvaṅ Suramahiṣī 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tucapa haləp ikaṅ paprāsan dug sira vinaraṅ kadi humarasa vimba hyaṅ candrārka vinulatan təka riṅ alun-alun sə̄h luṅsir baṅ hinatəpakən* paḍa kadi gunuṅ āpuy* muntab de niṅ aṅin adrəs 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rasa bubula təṅah niṅ rājyâpan paḍa gumərəh para ratu saha gəṇḍiṅ goṅ rojeh tabə-tabəhan apituvi para taṇḍâsraṅsāṅan midər aritan* saha paḍahi guməntər lagy atry âsurak aṅavat 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

para vidu səḍəṅ ayvan saṅ taṅkil hyaṅ acarita paḍa gumuyu kapūhan sakveh niṅ vidu binisa hana kavatək ujarnya n guyv âvarṇa macarita uḍuh uḍuh uḍuh āh āh hā hā hāh bisa dahatən 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sahana niṅ abañol denyâṅguyvākəna puraci aṅigəl-igəl agəṅ-gə̄ṅan koṇṭol paḍa mətətəṅ* vəlu sakəbəh* agasyak ndan mogâvədi vəkasan kaguyu-guyu kagə̄man yan prāpta ṅ vəlu sabaṭaṅ 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pirus amirusi* menmen denyâmet pacəh acəməh rabi nika bisa pantəs denyâbhāvaka maṅəyəh laki nika mulat aṅdrəṅ kahyun-hyūn aṅuṅas*-uṅas kadi vəḍus anut añjyan yan təṅhā təka muriṅis 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ikaṅ amacaṅah olih guyv aprih paḍa sinurak təkap ika nini-niny elik masvāmi vərə-vərəh paḍa bisa ṅ avayaṅ vvaṅ denyâṅguyvakən atarik pacəh ika kaki-kaky akrak ginyat mulih akusa 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sahana nika pinaṅguṅ tūt padv âbhinava katon paḍa gumuruh avantus sakveh niṅ guyu gumətər bari-bari kapacəh niṅ vvaṅ thāni n gumuyu kəkəl patəmu ni pasurak niṅ vvaṅ kady ampuhan apagut 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

atali-tali kakulvan lornyârəṅgiṅan ajajar rasa ḍavuha təkapnya n lumpat-lumpat* api tibā milu-milu para raṇḍânonton dan* paḍa gigirən paḍa sinurak i lumpatnya n* kālah paḍa kavalik 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

amənuhi nagara ṅ vvaṅ thāny akveh madulu-dulur vinijilakən ikâsiṅ saṇḍaṅ-saṇḍaṅan* ika mās vijah aməli ḍaḍaṅ saṅgiṅ calvan saha kurupuk anak ika sukha de niṅ tumpi mvaṅ gaja-gajahan 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hana sira viku saṅkêṅ haryāhâləpir acəpuh kasutapan ira maṅde kveh niṅ śiṣya paḍa marək tuhun ulah ira pəñcul siṅ-siṅ bhāva nira kiṭuṅ siṅ ucapan ira baṅsit yêkī śabda nira rəṅə̄n* 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ra tapa laki kapūhan vahv ânon nagarasabhā abhinava mulat iṅ bhogâtyantâmuhara sukha kaləvi-ləvih ikaṅ kory alvâgə̄ṅ gupura nikā nr̥pati təka salumbuṅ riṅgi ṅgānya tinivikan 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nahan ucapan ira vvantən têkā titir ataña paḍa karika ṅ ujar kəto mvaṅ kori hayu nipun* kalavan ujar anəṅgah kāri mvaṅ kari liṅ ikā sira sumahur agampil mruh-mruh maṅhavag aṅucap 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kṣamakəna bapa dentâtakvan yogya tan ahala tumañakən ikanaṅ kori mvaṅ kori paribhaṣa paḍa bapa vənaṅ aṅgon yan tuṅgal taliṅa gajah kalavan ujar adigra mvaṅ tan padriga rahayu 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nahan ujar ira baṅsit-baṅsit tan ya* cala nira sahana-hana nikaṅ vvaṅ thāny atvaṅ mulati sira tapa-tapa nira pəñcul vvaṅ-vvaṅ sākṣara maṅucap milu-milu ta ya baṅsit ndan tvaṅnyê sira liṅ ikā 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hənəṅakəna saṅ aṅdon tontonan səḍəṅ aməpəg valuyana caritan* śrī putrī mvaṅ nr̥patanaya ndan i huvus ira pinrasprās mantuk mara ri daləm gərəh ikaṅ arəbut prasprāsan maṅgyat adadakan 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kunaṅ ikaṅ arəbut penī-penī hana ri ruhur ulih ika paḍa mūlyâpan vastrâhayu saphala binəbədakən ikâkveh len muṅgv iṅ cəṅəl* i gulū hilaṅ i cəṅəl ikê sor mvaṅ dodot nika karəbut 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nda tucapa para nāthân sampun* kevvan ira kabeh paḍa mamaluyakən mās lāvan vastra pamisalin saha manis iṅ ujar ndan liśya n pavvata pahula mulih i huvus irâmvit duhkhâsəṅhit i saṅ Aja 18

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

muvah ucapakəna śrī putrī mvaṅ nr̥patanaya saṅ amaraṅ i sira strī-strī vr̥ddhā pitu ṅ abuyut tuvi kadaṅ ira tan len riṅ sajñâhayu* manulus atuha-tuha tinuṅgal sakveh niṅ marək i sira 19

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


bvat Kāmeśvara ratna nīla vinaṅun gr̥ha linaraṅan iṅ huvus prabhu lvir padmâsana siṅha rūpa ni sakanya kuməñar abirū paḍâkiris kasraṅ de ni sənə̄ nikaṅ kanaka paṅhatəp apituvi sə̄h madhubrata sākṣāt rātri vinətvan iṅ vulan avā linəṅəṅakən i śabda niṅ cucur 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkā devī vinaraṅ lavan saṅ Aja mār hati nira rumaras paḍâvənəs ry antuk saṅ mamaraṅ-maraṅ ri sira kāri sira kadi madhubratâsana maṅke pva n tuməmu ṅ prayojana ni rāga nira malavas aṅhiḍəp smara kady âṅipy aṅisapvakən vulan avâmbək ira n aṅisapu nrəpātmajā 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrī devîndumatī miṅe tan anumoda ri palaku ṅ asih nr̥pātmaja heman luh nira maṅlətuh-lətuhi soca nira kadi saroja kābunan moghanya pva mayat-mayat halis irârəṅu-rəṅu kaharas vavaṅ tikəl tan pātmā kinisapvakən tvas ira tan pajajamuga rəmək sakê taṅan 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ləṅləṅ niṅ lod ləyəp niṅ vukir inayu papaṅgih nirârok piniṇḍa kālaṅkyaṅ mvaṅ rərəb varṇa nira kadi liraṅ kāmukan saṅhub avrā himpər saṅ hyaṅ śaśī kəmbar apupul akəmul truh-truh iṅ kāla sandhyā devī devârdhanārīśvara patəmu nira lvir ṭikâkarva-karvan 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ kady Ânaṅga māry âtanu mijil atəmah rājaputrâdvitīya marmâpet sih tan imbâməkul aṅamər-amər cumbu-cumbv âṅalap sor sotan ta ṅ vvaṅ riris kāṅinan apənəd arūm paṅhilaṅ rāgabahni pə̄mpə̄man rāsika lvir nira paliḍah iṅ elik miṅe riṅ kisapvan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mambə̄ sub niṅ smarâṅde huyaṅ i hati nirâvarsih aprih rasanya sumyuk taṅ rāgavarṣâṅapitu makəcəhan lagy avantə̄ raras tvas atruh-truh harṣacittâmarupuhi turidâvah-vahan sanmatâgə̄ṅ tr̥ṣṇâṅumbaṅ lavan sih manis iṅ ujar arūm saṅsayâdrəs hilīnya 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ hyaṅ-hyaṅ ni laṅə̄ku māvak aśarīra mətu ri paṅaveśa niṅ smara lvir devī sakalânurun bəsur i ramya niṅ aməṅ-aməṅ iṅ surālaya lakṣmī niṅ nagarī turuṅ matəmahan karika kita viśāta lālana saṅ sākṣāt pratimâṅaraṅ hulun anugrahana tariman aṅharas pipi 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅūnî kāla nikaṅ svayambara mijil kita kadi vijil iṅ niśākara sakveh saṅ pininaṅ prabhāva nira sə̄h murub aṅabar-abar təkêṅ laṅit rākantânvam alək tathāpi kita harṣa tan aharəp i vīrya saṅ prabhu gə̄ṅ niṅ prihku lavan* sih iṅ hyaṅ aṅiriṅ ri ḍavuh i turidanta ri ṅhulun 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅke muṅgah apə̄m valiṅku ta kataṅgamaṅakəna pamaṅku ni ṅhulun seṅərku n dinələ̄ ndatan tinarimâṅusapi hariṅət i vvit iṅ susu dentâhyun kadi guyva-guyvan iṅ apa n rəsəpa pisaniṅū təkê hati siṅ solahku sinikvakənta tinəpak hana tinama rare pinīḍana 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan de nr̥paputra harṣa maṅənākən ucapan amanis priyambada aṅluṅlūṅi laṅə̄ hanan pakakavin kakavin aṅarəki nrəpātmajā mogâtə̄n aṅusap jajâṅəluk-əluk ləṅən araras amaṭya-maṭyani pet-pet rāga mamanva-manva maməpər-məpər ataña ri mūlya niṅ tapih 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


śrîndumatī kakənan viṣa niṅ ujar arūm sumusuk ri hati ndan kadi tan huniṅā pavulatan ira mogha mahâpi hade rvā ṅ katahā n uduhən brituha vilaja hetu nirâpi tulak rāga nirâṅulanəh tuhun avədi kavəs riṅ ulah kavava 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

marma nirâvri lanâkiput avədi kasiṅkaba siñjaṅ ira tan huniṅan tinañan lara ni vətu ni luh nira niṣkaraṇa nora vaneh paran iṅ manah apəga kumə̄l vinisik-visikan ṅhiṅ panamantara ri sru saṅ Aja viniveka nirê tvas ira 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sāma paran* vənaṅânulaka ri paməkulnya tan eraṅ aməl dāna paran* ta kunaṅ vənaṅ anuculanê paṅagəmnya tapih bheda paran vənaṅanya kumavaśakəna bvat i rāga nira daṇḍa jugênaka liṅ nira nəhər anəpak jaja sāhasika 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kāla nira n panəpak taṅan ira kadi pādapa molah alon mambət ikaṅ luṅayan kadi lurus iṅ aśoka tinūb niṅ aṅin tiṅhal irârəṅu mogha kadi sarasijê təka niṅ bhramara suṅsut irê nr̥paputra hana kadi gula drava de niṅ əbun 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ai koṅ bhrānta kasop i luh niṅ aṅaraṅ kasarik i laṭi niṅ vineh səpah ləṅləṅ denta mulat pilih vinava niṅ turida sinaput iṅ hyaṅ iṅ ṭikā rūm niṅ śabda mameka sambət i gəluṅ kari kita pati jumput-jumputi dentâṅol midər iṅ təṅah kapana yan varasa kadi panumpal iṅ smara 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

siṅgih bhrānta kakanta māsku mapa don iṅ aṅasag inaventa ləṅləṅa tvaskv aprih binəbədta riṅ tali gəluṅ cinucuk i luṅid iṅ matâluru mogâṅde vulaṅun manista rinasan tuhu-tuhu n agəlaṅ-gəlaṅ kuniṅ ṅhiṅ yan rakryan aṅastva riṅ luh uvatanya marasana ri rāga ni ṅhulun 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pintən māsku vuyuṅta tan hana vaneh pinalar asiha sanmatêṅ akuṅ cəp tênduṅ taha tan taṅis kaharəp i ṅhulun aṅisapu jə̄ṅta sevaka luhtâdrəs humilī pasuṅta karikā taham ibu tan ikā prayojana aṅhiṅ prārthana mogha siddha katəkana silih usapa luh lavan kita 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

intar hayva marək paran karika donta paran iku kinārya niṅ marək tan sih rāga nimitta niṅ taṅis adoh tiki kakənana kapriyambadan lāvan tan sukha hetu niṅ luh aṅasapta ri mata tuvi tan gave-gave luh-luh duhkha luh i ṅhulun taṅi-taṅis prihati karaṇa niṅ lanânaṅis 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan de nr̥paputrikânulak i sāhasa saṅ Aja saranta riṅ prəman tan paṅde vədi riṅ kədə̄ marək aṅol nəhər aṅarəki de nirâṅucap maṅkin harṣa rinəṅvan aṅlalu kasuṅsutana saṅ Aja saṅsayâvavuh* śrī putrī sira kāpəsan ri panulak nira jaja vəkasan sirânaṅis 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


adava n panukər saṅ ahayu kadi tuhva nəhər miṅaya anaṅis kadi tan patəmahana lulut pva ri suṅsut ira aṅəsah kadi tan silih asiha məne ri huvus niṅ ulah anulak ri səpah nr̥pasuta kadi tan pamalakva hələm 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

atukup taliṅâvədi katəkana rūm niṅ ujar kinire susu tan vinəḍar-vəḍar avədi kakukva ragət*-ragəta akəmul-kəmul epu ri pəpəsa ni madhya nira n pinəkul asaput mukha kady avədi hilaṅa rūm nira kārəkana 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nr̥paputra mamaṭyakən i manis ira n gula rāga rinok ratus iṅ madhuparka sira guliga niṅ lara harṣa pinə̄m rinəbut pinakesi ni mata niṅ akuṅ ri daləm nagara papa de nira tan paṅaraṅakəna tan panibākəna luh 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ləṅəṅ iṅ madhumāsakusuma pinakasvaśarīra nira paḍaṅ iṅ vulan aṅrahinakən alaṅə̄ pinakāmbək ira luməkas pva sirâṅhari-hari* kadi kārttika raśmi nira mətu kady asirat-sirata maṇik ujar nira marma dahat 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


māskv induṅ mapa ramya niṅ vulatanêṅ mata mamanis tan pavora luh tan paṅrəṅva rəṅih lavan paṅəsah iṅ kinisapu manukər təkê hati mvaṅ tan paṅgilana n paṅol sahurana n paṅucap ubhayanâṅharas pipi byakta n mūra lavan śavaṅkv ibu yadin kita mulata manuṅsuṅêṅ guyu 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndin vanyâku təkâṅisapvakəna māsku pinaṅəmulakən təpak jaja epu ṅvaṅ mapa tekiṅ enaka baśâṅarəkana pinamə̄makən vaja rəskv induṅ tuməkākənâmbək i hayunta pinaṅagəmakən nakhâluṅid ṅəs-ṅə̄sən mulatêṅ matâmati-matî ri paṅayat i halista mamraṅa 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan vətu ni turida rāga rakryan Aja māvak ucapan amanis an sāhasa sira kahanan vəlas ri panaṅis nr̥pavaraduhitā om yan humənəṅa sakarəṅ maṅantyakəna rāga nira saṅ anukər saṅ hyaṅ Smara ri manah irâṅalah pisaniṅūn vənaṅa pihərana 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ śrī niṅ ahayu sakaḍatvan osah aṅəlih kavarəgan anukər vahv âlupa taṅan ira riṅ tapih tur ira karva lumay akilusū mvaṅ puṇḍutan ira tumibā lukar tali-talinya paḍa tan inivə̄ aṅlampv anaṅis aṅəsəsan paṅevala narendrasuta tinarima 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ambək saṅ Aja sukha girahyasən marək añaṅkiraṅi tan inapa riṅ svapna hiḍəp ira ri tan kavādhan i paṅol nira n inənəṅakən* oṅsil taṅan ira tumamêrikaṅ kadi manuk vahu kumapu-kapu mūrchā tvas ira kava-kavân anon kadi tanah suməlap i taliṅa 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


utpāta nrəpaputra riṅ śayana mogha təka ri papupul nirêṅ jinəm liṇḍū gumrit ikaṅ palaṅka kumətug pakətəb iṅ aṅəsah pinaṅkvakən olah lvir bubula ṅ tilam pakədal iṅ vətis amijilakən larap-larap* vintaṅ sūrya śaśaṅka nāga kagivaṅ-givaṅ i kəlab ikaṅ laṅit-laṅit 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

guntur luh mahavan ri lambuṅ iṅ iruṅ tuməḍun amalapar marê kapə̄ kasrəg katrag ikaṅ payodhara lanâpipit alara kavantus iṅ jaja lambe śīrṇa babak laṭinya hana mātra mirah i tapak iṅ vajânəsəp miṅgut śr̥ṅga nikaṅ halis huvus aparva sana-sini tikəl mayat-mayat 2

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


dumunuṅ sirêña nira kālih uva nira kapaṅgih iṅ natar muṅgv i patiga niṅ aśoka liman akəmit lavan kaka-kakâmajaṅ vulan 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


yak maty âku dələ̄nta māsku palalun makahavana hayunta gəgvana ūrṇā nūpura bhūṣaṇanta katəkāna təmahana ni janma ni ṅhulun mvaṅ rup chattra kaluṅ-kaluṅ saha səkar taji mijila lavan tutup gəluṅ aṅgon denta ri kāla niṅ piniḍuḍuk mapa rasa-rasa niṅ sinanmata 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tan hephepən abhūṣaṇâpan anukər-nukəri laku pataṅkis iṅ kale prāyâṅrup təka karṇaśūla niyatâmuhara tuna ni de niṅ aṅrəṅə̄ kaṇṭhâṅrəs təkap iṅ kaluṅ-kaluṅ ikaṅ payuṅ aṅadəg-adəg hanêṅ adoh ūrṇā vyartha lavan səkar taji tutup gəluṅ anəvasakən bvat iṅ mulat 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nahan ujar ira mambə̄ rāgânūta ri saṅ Aja lukar i tapih irâsove keṅkab hinənəṅakən vahu sumahur anū de maṅke yan tinaña-tañan mari luh ira kuməmbəṅ vahv âveh maṅarəkana* 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nr̥patanaya kasəṅkvan rāgâmarpəki* sumaput amahavas isi niṅ ken sampun vaspada* kaharas aṅamər-amər amakpak vruh ry ambək niṅ aṅəsaha lvir anadaki kənêṅ hrū marmâṅrehi* tan asarag 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri huvus ira* kapiṅrvan saṅ śrī niṅ tulis aṅaraṅ lara nira mahəli prīty âluṅluṅ hyun aṅalaya manah ira vahu tūtūt kālap de nr̥patanaya turida nira kahənti mvaṅ sih niṅ hati kapulut 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paṅusəṅ ira ri lambe-lambe tan təka ri hati panəpak ira huvus mūr mukṣâṅdohi taṅan ira mari marəṅu tumiṅhal tuṅtuṅ niṅ halis alaris manis i guyu nirâṅdyun vruh giṅgaṅ vahu kasiṅī 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

patəmu nira vinasvās kady anvam yumayi-yayi saṅ ahayu sira molah maṅlah-lah kuməda-kədal saṅ Aja sira sumuṅkəm tan paṅle kumuru-kurub* paḍa kuməsək iṅ ambək tan kevrān avuda-vudā 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


riṅ krāban kalasā mijil sira sumaṅgraha vali nira pūrṇa tan kuraṅ sampun kevvan* irânaḍah sira pənuh sama-marək i sira vvaṅ uttama ramyâtiṅkah atūt paluṅguh ira saṅ huvus agati vineh akarvana ācārī kalavan karaṇḍan ira mukhya* pinituhu paḍa vruh iṅ krama 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkānê sor apupul paḍâruhur iṅ ambək aruhu-ruhuran* paḍâṅalih evəh tan kavənaṅ tiniṅkah aputək saṅ amahayu makon atiṅkaha de ni kvehnya vival paḍâvyahata* buddhi nika puji-puji n pakavvaṅan siṅ sor uṅgvan ikânəsəl ri saṅ aniṅkah inucap ika tan vruh iṅ krama 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


vet-vet niṅ brāhmaṇâtyanta vəkas iṅ aruhur kadvijāṅśan ginə̄ṅnya vet niṅ śaivarṣy aluṅgv î nəhər apuji* kabhasmāṅkuran mūlya denya vet niṅ boddhâdvitīya n ruməja-rəja kabuddhāṅkuran kāraṇanya tan tuṅgal mārga niṅ kādyan asəmu havan iṅ muṅgah iṅ parvatāgra 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvaṅ* vruh riṅ lokikācāra səḍəṅ iṅ anaḍah tan kavor-vor manahnya denyâbuddhy âmanis məṅgəp upaśama tinon mevəh olah tiniṅkah aṅdoh tan saṅgrahêṅ uṅgvan aruhur aləməh vorən iṅ tan kaśuddhi maṅgā muṅgvêṅ asor ndan yan apupul atatā sabrayârok sahāryan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

guṇḍik rvarvâpupul tan vənaṅ apasah adoh de ni gə̄ṅ iṅ pamitran kady âkarvan svarūpanya paḍa-paḍa silih mūla tuṅgal pinālih solah seṅərnya mogâṅinaki ri panunasnyêṅ tuhan sāri-sāri denyâniṅkah ry avaknyâṅruhuri rinuhuran ramya savyāpasavya* 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


paḍânaḍah akālihan sama kinon marəka sukha linavva-lavvakən savaṅ hudan atə̄b tibêṅ bañu kəcap niṅ apupul amaṅan rinəṅvakən marək sahana niṅ magoṣṭhi humənəṅ rumasa-rasani pathya niṅ rasa tuhun kasərətən jugâṅucap aminta paluṅan atəkəm jajâsəgu 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

larih lumari tan pararyan alaris ri katahapan ika n hanâtulak surâsira-siran rasanya surasârəbu-rəbu suməḍah kinahyunan maṇik pinakajaṅga tan papəgatan kucur ika kadi pañcuran juruh kilaṅ brəm inalap ginanti kadi tīrtha madhu mamulakan sakêṅ gəḍah 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paḍâlap-alapan tahap sama-marək vija-vijah avərə̄ girahyasən apintiga hanan papiṅpat aṅigəl katəkan urak aganti tan bəsur ikaṅ vvaṅ atərəh manahnya kəna riṅ sayub ahaṅan agasyak iṅ sabhā putus mar atəṅə̄ para mpu bini mogha salah əluk ulah nirâḍake 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


strī niṅ śaiva tan eraṅ-eraṅ aṅigəl kaguyu-guyu vərə̄-vərə̄* davā tan harṣêṅ svara niṅ mr̥daṅga salukat ṅuni-ṅuni yan i gīta niṅ* vaneh hetunya n paṅiduṅ vijil niṅ ajiyah sahuli-hulih ikâṅrəṅə̄-rəṅə̄ sahtote prathamā kiduṅnya n aṅavat midəm aṅujivat ambahan tayoh 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ḍaṅ hadyan* tumurun gumanty aṅigəl oṅsil aṅavak akikat rumampayak ṅhiṅ kahyunya kiduṅ buvun* ya kiniduṅnya n aṅalik-alik endah iṅ sabhā ramyârūm sinəlanya gəṇḍiṅ i tutuk kaguyu-guyu ginañjar iṅ larih gih gih puṅ ri kipah ḍuraṅ dinivayūh amamati juga de nikâmbahan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

endah bhāva nikaṅ vaneh saha kiduṅ midər aṅilagakən vvaṅ iṅ sabhā ndan strī niṅ vidu rakva mogha kavatək savaṅ acarita de nikâṅigəl dhik hah kaśmala nāhan ambahan ikâṅgyat anudiṅi matâṅjəjək ləmah aig ləs liṅnya nəhər mulih matəlasan maṅumik-umik aṅañjalîṅ tavaṅ 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


samantaji tibā ṅ ḍavuh pitu mulih nr̥pasuta kalavan suputrikā parəṅ maṅadəg iṅ natar sira kabeh tumut aṅiriṅakən marê daləm paḍâmvit atatā vineh maṅinaṅârarəm upaśama sādarâṅucap dvijāṅśa madulur-dulur* maṅabhivāda para viku marək maṅañjali 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

gumanti para vālakâmuhun anəmbah inubhaya sināntva riṅ guyu ikaṅ baṇija lot amaṅkari panambah ika kavagədanya tan hilaṅ paḍâṅucap akon ahosana marêṅ jinəm agavaya paṅhavin laras mulat saṅ Aja ri priyā nira nəhər gumuyu-guyu midəm suputrikā 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aliṅgih atitih pupū silih usap mukha sira ri huvus nirâdamu prahāsana narendraputra manəcək-nəcəki rahi ri kəmbaṅ iṅ havu* baṅun harəp aminta paṅkvakəna sə̄ṅ ni paṅavaśa ni sih suputrikā paṅavruhana* ken lukar kadi mahâṅiṅin-iṅin i manah nr̥pātmaja 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sukhâsaṇḍiṅ-saṇḍiṅ samaṅinakanêṅ citta ginave səlaṅ māain pojar saṅ Aja mavarah ry antuka nira manah devī kagyat-gyat asəkəl ikaṅ tvas kapənətan kuməmbəṅ-kəmbəṅ luh nira mijil aṅertambaṅ asayut 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sənəṅ yan yogyê jə̄ṅta vavarəṅəhən luhku k anaṅis viraṅrvaṅ de niṅ tan vənaṅ apasah i śrī narapati manəh rakryan ndi n yogya kavəkasa tan tūta ri kita mataṅnya n paṅher ṅke kahuluna kənaṅkvê kita sadā 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paran kahyunantê haji pisaniṅūn tan katəkana tuhun buddhyantâṅhera pakatuhanən māsiha sivin yadin muṅgvêṅ siṅhāsana pakaratun yan kita harəp katon tan tr̥ṣṇā śrī nr̥pati palakun kaprabhun ira 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


yogya vuvusta tuhun ṅhulun aharəp aṅuṅsira vīrya guṇa ndātan adoha sakêṅ ibu parəkən apan sira māsih anak gə̄ṅ i kabhaktin iṅ aprabhu maṅipulu ri tvas akon muliha ṅhiṅ kita māsku rumaṅkəpana kahulunankv i narārya Raghu 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yan muliha prihavak ṅhulun ibu kita kārya ri jə̄ṅ nr̥pati tiṅhali kāsihan iṅ huvus akurən asih mara tambaṅana yan valuyâku muvah ri kita pira-piraṅ tahunən ḍatəṅa ṅhiṅ panaṅisku lavan kita linalu ri dūra nikaṅ palagan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mvaṅ yan anuṅgaṅa riṅ ratha ləpasa madoha* sakêṅ nagara brāhmaṇa sogata śaiva r̥ṣi sira ta maṅgala niṅ lumaku sə̄h bala śūra kuraṅ havan* aṅiriṅ arampak aṅambah alas śūnya hiḍəpku yatan hana kita maṅisapvana* minta səpah 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


priya kahiḍəp ujartârūm kady âmr̥ta kasirat kunəṅ* amuhara kepvan ry ambək ni ṅhulun alavas ya tan asiha kitânaṅsārâpujya tinutakən syapa ta taṅisanaṅkva ṅhiṅ matyânaṅisi tavaṅ 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ya ta karaṇa niṅ asvī yan rakryan jənəka sivin ivəh iṅ anivi maṅher sih niṅ hyaṅ ya ta tinahā atilara* kita luṅhâtiṅgal vanva n alalisa ṅhiṅ anaṅisana ri śrī Bhoja mvaṅ nr̥pamahiṣī 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

taham ibu taha rakryan marmâsih ṅhulun atuhan saphala pinakadevī tan vvaṅ len kadaṅ aparək sapati sahuripa ṅvaṅ sakvan selvan adulura kita pinakahuripku n sekaprāṇa silih asih 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

manis i vacana rakryan sampun kagraha ri hati pinakapaṅanumānan ry ambəkta n tulus asiha sapara-parana rakryan bhaktyâkv âṅiriṅi kita yadin anadina lampūn matyâśânuku riṅ avak 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅhulun ibu vihikan yan buddhyantâvəlas-asiha ika karaṇa niṅ asvī māsku n rovaṅa muliha nr̥pati Raghu katon gyā-gyā ny ambək nira mulata niyata papagən iṅ strī sāyodhyā n kita ḍatəṅa 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun māyu vuvus nr̥pātmaja lavan devī nira n maṅkata ṅkānê vvit niṅ aśoka rambay anaḍah prāpta ṅ madaṅgâṅhaḍəp luṅhā ṅ kāla huvus hyaṅ arka sumurup sandhyā masəṅsəṅ mirah mambə̄ kasturi niṅ paturvan araras kady âṅutus mañjiṅa 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ambək niṅ paḍa harṣa sampun amatəh riṅ rāga solur lulut tr̥ṣṇêṅ saṅgama tan kavarsihan apə̄m māyvan* raras riṅ prəman yan līlā mijil iṅ natar pinanasan de niṅ smarâṅras hati oṅsil* tuṅtuṅ ikaṅ halis jaruman aṅgyākən marā riṅ tilam 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun muṅgah aṅanti riṅ pasamayan saṅ hyaṅ-hyaṅ iṅ pamrəman marmâsih paḍa de nirâṅənahi rāga vruh ri tuṅgal nira arva-rvan manaḍah manis niṅ upadeśâtyanta riṅ rāsika nora ṅ saṅśaya riṅ rahasya vinəḍar kāgəm rasanyê hati 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ raśmînayu niṅ smarâṅucap-ucap riṅ pamrəman tan bəsur sekaprāṇa sapakṣa tan vənaṅ adoh māsih sadharmâdulur prajñêṅ buddhi silih vikalpa ri rusit niṅ śabda kady âcəṅil paṅliṅganya n anak sinādhya nira masv-asvâmibhāvêṅ tilam 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


i sampun iṅ ulah kapintiga nikaṅ ghaṭita kavaləsan sirâturū ikaṅ huləs adoh sakê sira lanā kavadal alulunan marêṅ dagan hanan pavuṅu sakṣaṇâləh akaraṅ-hulu taṅan aharip suputrikā tapih nira huvus lukar kasarakat kahurup i basahan nr̥pātmaja 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

huvus kalalu de nirâmrəm asuve paḍa tan umik aṅel asaṅgama ikaṅ manuk anaṅhi riṅ ḍavuh ənəm sukha muni maṅuyūyu riṅ taman cucur taḍahasih svaranya kavəlas-harəp anaṅis i paṅlvaṅ iṅ vulan ikaṅ mrak akakab munîṅ gupura lagy amuṅu ri sira riṅ ḍavuh pitu 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paḍâsraṅ aṅajîṅ kuləm sahana niṅ manuk anaravatâguṇêriya parañjaṅan aṅanti riṅ gagana pathya tumiru-tiru śabda niṅ pəkiṅ i sornya hana caṅkiluṅ muni laki-stry asəmu mamarahi ry anak nikā syapêka ta kunaṅ paṅajyan ika maṅhuvusakən ika yan bisâṅaji 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

avuṅv ajajar iṅ surambyan arahup nr̥patanaya lavan suputrikā anəṅgah atis aṅharas*-harasakən* susu saṅ ahayu maṅrəṅih*-rəṅih kataṅgamaṅ aṅolakən saṅ Aja marma maṅəmuli nəhər mamaṅkvakən pupū nira kasiṅgahan huləs i polah ira kasuluhan niśākara 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

samaṅkana ni gə̄ṅ i rāga nira kālih aṅisapu lavan mamaṅkvakən tathāpi sinamantaran manis i de nira ṅucap araras prahāsana saṅ adyah api heva-heva tuhun ambək ira tumiliṅ iṅ karāsikan nr̥pātmaja mañumbu-ñumbu mamibik tapih aharəp* i buṅkah iṅ təṅah 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri luṅsur i tapih nirârukət ikaṅ luṅayan asəmu luṅgah iṅ gaḍuṅ ikaṅ gəlaṅ ataṅkis iṅ vətis apiṇḍa madhukara marâhyun iṅ puḍak payodhara lanâpipit kadi vədinya kaharasa ri tuṅtuṅ iṅ kuku ikaṅ mukha savaṅ vulan marək i vimba nira səḍəṅ ira n sapamrəman 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


maṅkin vr̥ddhi vijil ni rāsika nira n parvarvan iṅ pamrəman nidrâcumbana ta pva nitya ginave maṅde sukhê tvas nira sə̄r mambə̄ vaṅi niṅ səkar kadi mahā mañjiṅ mamuṅv î sira tan vruh yan rahinâpaḍaṅ paḍa mijil de niṅ hrəbuk niṅ puḍak 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


samantaji* mijil hyaṅ arka kadi raktakumuda suməkar sakêṅ bañu vulan mari lumə̄ṅ kagə̄ṅan ahulap sumirəp avədi tan vənaṅ mulat təkêṅ grahagaṇânusup-nusup arəs karahinana humə̄t paḍâkucəm ikaṅ vəṅi huvus paḍəm kadi hilaṅ pinəjahan ira riṅ ḍavuh vvalu* 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ikaṅ bhuvana kālapan vəṅi baṅun jaladhi karaṅ asat ḍasar nika katon avas ikaṅ gunuṅ kadi* timiṅgila makatihalaṅ paḍâṅjəlag urut saka satal* kuməṇḍəṅ ajajar paḍa-paḍa kadi nāga maṅlayaṅ muni ṅ jalada maṅrəguṅ sagajamīna kasatan aṅuliṅ harəp bañu 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


ri vvit* niṅ kayu pārijāta hana tīrthâlantaran vvad kucurnya tūsanyânalagâjajar vatu karaṅnyâgroṅ rinoṅ pañcuranya tampyak-tampyakan iṅ vərəh pamarigi lvirnya n patap de nikaṅ ryak vvainyâbhrā kadi sarvavarṇa ri səḍəṅ niṅ puṣpamāyā hanê jro 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkā devī marahup-rahup sira yathālīlâṅuḍoḍâñavuk vvai tan sah śrī naranāthaputra maṅəmit lvir kumbaṅ aṅrakṣa kəmbaṅ vruh riṅ cāmana pītr̥tarpaṇa satiṅkah-tiṅkah iṅ tīrthayātra mādəg pūrvamukhâjajar parəṅ amūjâṅañjalî saṅ hyaṅ Arka 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


mantuk śīghra marê daləm humatur i śrī Bhoja riṅ pamrəman akveh strī haji sambhramê təka nirâganty âṅucap garjita marma śrī parameśvarī mulat anuṅsuṅ cumbu-cumbv âṅucap ī ī śrī maṇik i ṅhulun sira ḍatəṅ kālih nihan liṅ nira 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrī devîndumatī parəṅ sira manəmbah mvaṅ narāryātmaja riṅ lampit hana siṅhacarma* humaḍaṅ kāna n pratiṣṭhârarəm saṅ nātha vruh i don ira n para vavaṅ śoka drava tvas nira amvit sādara sopacāra saṅ Ajânəmbah ri jə̄ṅ saṅ prabhu 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


səmbah niṅ aśaraṇa ri jə̄ṅ narendra huniṅan parək i narapati amvīta muliha satatâṅrivəg-rivəgi* tan bəsur amaribini* tan səṅgahən akalis i pāda saṅ prabhu pasaṅ kuhira pinahayu paṅgil vənaṅa dadaha riṅ raṇâṅharəpa śatrukula yan iṅ* ayun 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

om vruh ṅhulun ika mara hetu niṅ kahənəṅan kapəgan aṅucapa māsih ṅhulun iri kita mogha tan vənaṅ asih karaṇa niṅ asəkəl* maṅke n mulat iri kita tan palekan aṅəḍap mulih analahasa vahv âpupul alal alavas təka pva kita sakṣaṇa vavaṅ apasah 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pintaṅkv i kita bapa sihanta tan kapalaṅâmipila riṅ agati saṅkan raray uvuh-uvuh ūpamānən iṅ ulah kasih-arəp alavas maṅke n marək iri kita sanmatan kaviguṇanya tan ucap-ucapən aṅhiṅ pakadaṅan i bapaṅku tolihən i māsku laki pakatalin 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nvam ny ambək ika məṅə-məṅə̄ kalotakəna denta kajugulan ikā tan vruhnya riṅ aṅinakanê mulat pipili denta pituturi piṅit saṅkṣepa nika kita vaśa pramāṇa guṇadoṣa nika vavarəṅə̄h yadyastun ivəṅ-ivəṅa riṅ hulun bapa manahnya palu-palu varah 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

atvaṅ saṅ Aja sumahur apraṇamya rumuhun saha manis iṅ ujar ājñā nr̥pati rasa nirâvəkas-vəkas akon silih asiha sadā sampun karəgəp i hati de patik haji minuṣṭi maṅinaki hati ṅhiṅ gānya* n apasaha ri tan sih iṅ Vidhi harəp mulata riṅ alara 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

atyanta həla-həla niṅ aṅrəṅə̄ vacana rakryan aṅinaki hati nirvighna kita bapa təkêṅ sinādhya vənaṅ uṅsirən iṅ aśaraṇa śānti dvijavara ri bapaṅku kesyana tumirva narapati Raghu svasty astu saha tanaya dāra māsku saṅ anəmva jayaphala sadā 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mvaṅ yan pavuvuha kita ghāra pat lima sujanma vəka-vəka ratu tan doṣa tuməkakəna sāmbək iṅ vənaṅ amukti viṣaya saphala ndan hayva sira ta bapa kāri denta pakamaṅgala niṅ anakbi yogya n kaləvihakəna tan paḍan phala nikâṅurati kahulunan 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

təmbe ṅ śubhadivasa bapaṅku maṅkata kakanta maṅatərakəna jyotīṣa paḍa tinañan i ṅhulun viṅi ri kāla nira paḍa marək avyāhata pavarah irâpadohan atukar paḍa kamasəṅərən* saṅ lekan aṅucap apagəh tuvin binisa kāraṇa niṅ amituhu 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yêkī muvah ucapakənê * bapaṅku sahajâlupa kamituturən dūmən sahana-hana ni dr̥vya-dr̥vya haji devata təka-təkanən lāvan sahana-hana nikaṅ rare kavula rakryan aṅalapa muvah yadyan jənəka kita bapaṅku pālihən ikaṅ nagara kaliliran 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan paṅucap-ucap ira lvir amrəta hañar mətu siniratakən maṅdadyakən i sukha narendraputra kalavan nr̥pavaraduhitā kesyan rasa ni manis i de nirâṅucap arūm asəmu gula siṅī bheda mvaṅ ujar amanis iṅ pralāpita namun rəcəpa rasa nikā 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kañcit paḍa təka madulur sirêṅ pagaḍuhan marək i narapati sakveh* ni kəmitan ika mās maṇik pirak ikā ya tinañakən* ira yêka n pamaca padadaran təlas pva ya samaṅkana vinijalakən kasrah satəṅah i* naranāthaputra kalavan nr̥pavaraduhitā 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nantən saməgət aniga mukhya sāra ginulaṅ-halu makəmitana mvaṅ dr̥vya pahula* naranātha sojar i narendra paḍa sinuṅakən lāvan muvah anəkakənêry Ayodhyanagarī tumuta ri saṅ Aja āpan vənaṅ akun iṅ ulah prayatna vəka sādhu vəka niṅ aniga 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

dum-dūman ira pira kunaṅ vilaṅnya kadi tan kavənaṅa vilaṅən yadyan banava saha bahitra dūra vənaṅâmvata niyata sarat muṅgv iṅ ratha pira-pira taṅ rathêṅ nagara hənti paḍa hinibəkan vastrādi pinada-pinadāti pādadara tan vuruṅ apan adadar 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndātan caritan ulah irânaḍah ri huvus iṅ vvalu* vahu ḍumavuh tan sah uva nira kalavan sirêña nira mukhya niṅ aṅiriṅakən sampun praṇata sira paḍâṅadəg mulih i* pamrəman ira ri daləm sakveh ni hulun ira kinon madandana paḍâgaravalan ataña 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

devī sira maṅutus aniṅka-niṅkah i sadr̥vya nira pinahayu norâhala-hala kalasā tinon kinajaṅan vinalunan ahaləp akveh papiku-pikul irâpupul kavula dāsa kaliliran ira boṇḍan sajuru lavan ikaṅ pujut sajuru jəṅgi sajuru humaḍaṅ 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vyāpāra sahana-hana niṅ vvaṅ iṅ nagara tan hana maṅinak-inak kady âsavuṅan asipət* olah-olah adamar-damar amalaku duh ceṭī rumara-rara paḍâṅasū vija-vijah dudu taṅ amususi siṅgoh ya* humuṅ asahuran baṅun śakaṭa gumrit amuhara laṅə̄ 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

guṇḍik kaka-kaka maviveka pahyas ikaṅ endaha tan avanəha lagy âminəkəti hayu tuṅgal əmbulana tan hana niṅ amihaṅa ṅhiṅ raṇḍi dadar ika kabeh kahayvakəna don ika pinagəhakən denyâmahayu sipat ināptyakən pinakadarśana tiniru-tiru 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun ghaṭita pitu tibā putih timur ikâvava rahina mijil ābhā ni pavuṅu naranāthaputra karəṅə̄ pilih anuculi ken devī kadi kahənəkan asriṅ ambəkan irâsahuran aṅəsəsan ākāra ni hənəṅ ira meh tigaṅ paṅinaṅâvuṅu mijil adamu 18

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

devī sira pinahayu hinyasan* pinahavās kadi maluya rarā dūran vənaṅa paṅanumānanê huvus irâpriya luṅayan ira lāvan mata vaja nira tan vənaṅ pinakaliṅga ni pasavi nira ṅhiṅ mājar i huvus ira medəman susu nirê kiva kani* kakuku 19

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun sirâhyas asalin hima puṣpavarṣa dodot narendrasuta rakva kilat rinəṅga āsəṅka niṅ mulat i rūpa narendraputrī putrī sakêṅ surapadânəmu rājaputra 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

prāsāda ratnamaya muṅgv i daləm kaḍatvan ḍaṅ hyaṅ purohita sirêniriṅ iṅ pamūjā ghaṇṭâlaṅə̄ dhvani nikā saha pūja-pūjān śaṅkha lvir asyaṅ aṅuhuh* ri narendraputra 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun ḍatəṅ nr̥patiputra lavan suputrī gandhâkṣatādi humaḍaṅ kalavan nivedya mañjiṅ sirê daləm aṅarpaṇakən pamūjā amvīt i vimba haji devata bhakty anəmbah 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

devī sirâməkul i jə̄ṅ nira saṅ hyaṅ arca arnah manah nira sadâṅaku rāma rena glānânaṅis kasih-arəp tvas ira vyamoha sambat nirâmuhara luh paməlas-harəpnya 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ai rāma rena kita saṅ lumah iṅ kaḍatvan ṅūni n maṇusya kita karva bapêbu liṅku maṅke dadi hyaṅ inaləmbana sārdhadeha hā hāh yayā bapa hajîbu hajîki liṅku 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndā t aṅrəṅə̄ bapa hajîbu hajî taṅisku pamvitku tiṅhali sumambah i* pādukanta āḍā vəkasku mulatî kita têki maṅke rakṣan ṅhulun bapa hajîbu hajî parankun 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan taṅis-taṅis irâlara vāhu mantən milv ânaṅis nr̥patiputra nəhər tumuṅkul lāvan hyaṅ arca pakatonan irêpu* vinvit de niṅ śivāmbha ri mukhâsəmu luh dravâdrəs 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun mijil nr̥patiputra lavan suputrī prāptê narendra mahiṣī tumuluy sirâṅliṅ kəmbəṅ ni luh nira panuṅsuṅ irê suputrī de niṅ səkəl sapaṅucap nira tan sphuṭâsrət 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

māskv îbu hayva kita tan praṇatā subhakti i svāmi rakryan apan uttamarājaputra āsiṅ sakahyun ira tūtakənanta māsku yêkā patibrata ṅaranya pakabratanta 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mvaṅ hayva māsku paṅayāya karājaputryan lāvan hayunta viphala n pakapaṅhaḍanta* tan kveh ni māsta makapaṅgajahanta* māsku kakṣatriyanta manivîbu pakātmarakṣa 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lāvan muvah saṅ Aja hayva bapaṅkv atiṅgal i śrī narendraduhitā paḍa vastu māsku riṅ rūpa sampəlah avarṇa səkar pinālih prāṇanta tuṅgalakənanta maran tan imbā 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tan* ketaka ṅ puḍak adoha ri ṣaṭpadanya tan ṣaṭpada ṅ bhramara sāha sakê puḍaknya tan putrikā sarika yan taya rājaputra tan rājaputra kita yan taya rājaputrī 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nā liṅ narendramahiṣī n panaṅis sumuṅkəm i śrī narendraduhitā pinəkul siniṅsət akveh mulat kapitaṅis ri narendraputrī āpan vəkas nira katon ri Vidarbharājya 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

embuh taṅis ri pataṅis-taṅisan suputrī de niṅ svavandhu nira sə̄h atuluṅ bvat iṅ* luh prāptâmalandani pirak maṇi vastu mūlya len taṅ sərəh kinajaṅan saha modakādi 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


śrī nr̥paputra lavan* nr̥paputrī amvit anəmbah i jə̄ṅ mahadevī mary ataṅis-taṅisan paḍa līlā śeṣa ni luh nira mātra kuməmbəṅ 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

marma dahat paṅucap mahadevī om bapa saṅ makapunpunana ṅ* rāt sora samāpta para prabhu denta śrī Raghu māsku tirunta jayêṅ praṅ 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrîndumatîbu huripku kitântən mogha katəmva sukhanta dadi strī rovaṅa rakryan Ajâsisihan* sih tuṅgalən apriya riṅ nr̥paputra 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun ira n paṅucap mahadevī śrîndumatī kalavan nr̥paputra mādəg inumbalan iṅ paricārī* maṅkat avarṇa śaśāṅka kameghan 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kīrṇa tikaṅ pamikul*-pikul akveh* denya lumampah arampak apaṇṭa nora jaruh vihikan ri dulurnya yogya katiṅhalanâpan atiṅkah 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅkana taṅ ratha nora kagiṇḍal mevv-ivu* lampah ikâdədər adrəs dr̥vya narendrasutā vinavanya mās maṇi len rajatādi suvastra 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

salvir ikaṅ paḍahîṅ* nagarâsraṅ ramya təkapnya hanan sinameni len masarag makapaṅhaḍa gə̄ṅnya lvir kətug iṅ ləvu denya guməntər 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrîndumatī sivuhən sira luṅhā de ni lulut nira riṅ nr̥padevī lūh ira tan pəgat adrəs avantu śrī nr̥paputra kaṅelan ameri 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

muṅgv irikaṅ kapiṅan sira kālih ramya katonan irâpan avelā lvir kavəlad tvas ikaṅ vvaṅ aniñjo bhakti mamakpak aṅañjali māsih 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

marma nira n mari suksəka rañca rūm saṅ Ajâṅhari-hary aṅalap sor mvaṅ Jayavaspa vicakṣaṇa tan sah māry aputək sira rakva tumon ya 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

strī ri daləm nagarârəja pantəs mātus-atus paḍa marma rarasnya kocap anampikakən səkar aṅjrah milv aṅiriṅ ri nareśvaraputrī 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kādbhuta lampah iraṅ nr̥paputrī de ni haləp* para guṇḍik atiṅkah vastra nikā paḍa raṇḍi sapaṇṭa lvir kusumânəḍəṅ iṅ pratimāsa 12

Translation

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun ira n ləpas iṅ kuṭa vetan tolih ikaṅ* nagarâsəpi tistis kayvan ikā manirâṅavay asriṅ kady aṅutus maluyê sira kālih 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndan sadavā ni hənu nira ramya sontən ikaṅ javuh adrəs asove śīghra pucuk ni təkinya tumūvuh varṇa nikā kadi campaka siṅsal 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


kīrṇa katon vijil iṅ laru-laru kumukus kadi tan ləvasa harṣa sirêña nira mvaṅ uva nira rivə̄nya* katon aṅəlih mvaṅ para guṇḍik amupv avurahan arəbut paḍa buddhi rare śrîndumatī marək iṅ nr̥pasuta sukha harṣa sirâmavani 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mogha jənək sira de ni paṅaraman ikaṅ bañu vāhu ḍatəṅ katkat alivran amet valaṅ asira-siran kalavan dadali aṅləṅəṅi tvas irêka ta karaṇa nirâsrət alon lumaku lālana lagy anəpər*-nəpəri səkar arūm kadi mitra kadaṅ 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tigaṅ vəṅi sirâṅinəp nr̥pati mamvit i saṅ Aja lavan nr̥pātmajā i pāntaran ikaṅ vukir hiṅan irâṅatərakən i nareśvarātmajā maluy sira lavan gajâśva ratha tan hana hiḍəp ira vanya vādhakā narendratanayânaṅis nr̥patiputra salahasa tumon kamānuṣan 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

muvah nr̥patiputra maṅkat aṅusī pakuləmana nira vvaṅ iṅ pasir karaṅ-karaṅan endah-endah alaṅə̄ hinaturakən* ikā lavan sayub paḍânrik aṅinum tvak iṅ pasisi saṅ vatək Aja karuhun nr̥pātmaja bhaṭāra Baruṇâṅalih nagara rūpa nira vahu mijil sakêṅ tasik 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

riṅ eñjiṅ i vijil hyaṅ arka sira maṅkat adulur ahavan gunuṅ-gunuṅ huvus təka sirêrikaṅ pəkən agə̄ṅ səḍəṅ aməpəg ikaṅ vvaṅ iṅ pəkən ikaṅ baṇija saṅśayânaha-nahā ri patukara nareśvarātmaja lavan sahana saṅ vatək ratu kabeh ruməbuta ri narendraputrikā 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mpu rāma humatur marê saṅ Aja sādara təkap ika mojar aprəgi tuhanku bapa sugya tan vruha bapaṅku ri hana nira saṅ vatək ratu ry ulih nira sakêṅ svayəmbara* paḍâpupul amarəki deśa durgama kunaṅ bapa panarka-narka ni manəhta kadi ruməbutê suputrikā 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

putus mara ləbā nikaṅ təgal ayun palapat alas-alas gunuṅ-gunuṅ tathāpi paḍa sə̄h kinuvvan arupək vəkasan asaləsək təkêṅ juraṅ dudū savəṅi saṅsayâvuvuh ikaṅ gaja ratha saha sañjatâsinaṅ mataṅnya bapa yatna-yatna tuhan i ṅhulun apupula hayva vismr̥ti 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nahan vuvus ikā nr̥pātmaja vavaṅ sumahur asəmu siṅha kātara* mpu rāma tak anāgatâkv iriya yadyan avuvuha muvah samaṅkana muvah yadin ameta daitya saha dānava pakaśaraṇanya riṅ raṇa hade Raghusutâku tak sy Aja ṅaranya yak atakuta riṅ samaṅkana 8

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


śīghrâdandan kinon de saṅ Aja marəka lumrā katon sañjatanya āpan prāpta ṅ musuh sāhasa varagaṅ ikā krūra tan paṅgalaṅ tvas sakveh niṅ śūra-śūra ṅ vatək Aja kumutug sə̄ṅ ikaṅ krodhabahni gut-gūtən tan panaṅgəl tr̥ṇa hiḍəp ira riṅ sañjatâkrəp lumaṅkuṅ 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakveh niṅ strī makādi nrəpavaraduhitā muṅgu riṅ deśa durga mvaṅ salvir niṅ rathâmvat pahula haji lavan dr̥vya rakryan suputrī līlânon tan tinon śrī nr̥pavaraduhitā de nikaṅ kayva-kayvan təkvan salvā nikaṅ papraṅana kalihatan koṅkulan tan pavighna 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mojar saṅ mambaṅ iṅ śrī Raghusuta bapa hayvâta tan yatna-yatna hayvêcchâpan musuhtâṅdaśaguṇa ri vilaṅtêṅ mahāpadmasankhya lor kulvan vetan akveh tumut i paṅuliliṅ niṅ gunuṅ sə̄h lumaṅkuṅ vadvāntâṅhiṅ vijilnya n paṅayat-ayat i gə̄ṅ niṅ prabhāvanta riṅ praṅ 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndā nahan śrī mahārāja Magadhapati kady ânəṅah riṅ samudra āpan sāmantarājâkəmit i sira lavan rājaputra pravīra ratnâyv-ayvan lavan mās ratha nira kuməñar katraṅan de hyaṅ arka śvetākārâhaləp chattra nira kadi haləp niṅ vulan tan kameghan 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

parnah kulvan saṅ Aṅgādhipati kadi kilat niṅ truh iṅ kāla sandhyā de niṅ sarvāstra muṅgv î hiriṅan ira pətəṅ lvir hudan tan pamegha lāvan mātaṅga mevv-îvu kadi gunuṅ apuy de ni rəṅganya kumram aṅlīlânuṅgaṅ iṅ ratnaratha sira hanê vvit nikaṅ pārijāta 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan taṅ bāṇa sālas kadi sinalivah iṅ campakâṅjrah səkarnya akveh vīrâṅrərəb ṅkāna saha gaja turaṅgâvakîvv-îvu lakṣa honyê vvit niṅ susantən ratha kanaka rinəṅgan maṇī hīrabajra uṅgvan śry Âvantināthâdbhuta bapa kadi digdāha niṅ kāla sandhyā 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndah nāhan śrī Pratīpâṅadəg amava laras riṅ rathâṅdandani hrū akveh vadvā nirâtumpuk avuvuh i* harəp maṅrəgəp sañjatanya lvir priṅ sālas galah niṅ prajurit ira* vahosnyânamar megha məṇḍuṅ maṅde rəs niṅ tumiṅhal raṅin i bala nira n* lvir gəlap tan pavarṣa 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lamban* lor saṅ Susenā saha bala kadi siṅhâsigâsiṅhanāda salvir niṅ sañjatâlas nira pinakaguhā rūpa niṅ hastirəṅga vyāghrâṅjurv âpupul tiṅkah i bala nira muṅgv î harəp sāra śūra buddhinyâsiṅ musuh kevala dəmakən ikā pavvatanyê narendra 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nā saṅ Hemāṅgadâḍəm savatək ira kabeh riṅ kəpuh rambay akrəp tan pendah rākṣasa mvaṅ bala nira kadi daityâṅuhuh sāri-sāri solahnya n kādbhutâsañjata baḍama lavan laṇḍəsanya n pamə̄ki agyâmūkêṅ musuh sāsinəsəb ika turuṅ matya laṅgan ya* rahnya 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

parnah vetan valū mvaṅ karamayan aṅurambat marêṅ siṅkṣapâgə̄ṅ saṅ Pāṇḍyâṅhə̄b karəsrəs kagiri-giri baṅun rāja bhūtâtirodra vadvā pekâsəmu preta hana kadi piśācâlapā rah paḍâṅhruk agyā-gyān apraṅâgyâṅrujaka hati nikaṅ śūra sampun pinə̄kan 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nā liṅ saṅ mambaṅ ojar saṅ Aja mijil ikaṅ buddhi kakṣatriyāṅśan siṅgih kveh niṅ musuh liṅta kadi jaladhi bahny atrigañcâṅgaluntaṅ ndātan vaṅ* mātra vədy âku dan* irika kabeh mon patambəh samāna siṅhâṅantî guhā byūha nika surupi vūk həntyakən hīnaśakti 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan liṅ saṅ narāryātmaja kadi sinaṅa* tvas nirâsəṅhit aprih tan sah saṅ mambaṅ āpan marək añamarani mvaṅ kavi ḍaṇḍanīti siṅgih yan putra niṅ śakti saṅ Aja katəṅər* krūrasiṅhâvamāna agyâmūkêṅ musuh duṣṭa kamadan ika śīrṇan marapvan panəmbah 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sākṣāt hyaṅ niṅ dhanurveda saṅ Aja sakala n pāvak iṅ dharmayuddha raktākārâkiris vastra nira kilat i sub niṅ praṅ asriṅ larapnya saṅkêṅ svargânurun cāmara nira kuməlab roma niṅ sarvakadga saṅhub niṅ sañjatâḍəm pinakapayuṅ irântuk niṅ aṅdaṇḍa śatru 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hyaṅ-hyaṅ niṅ tuṅgaṅan sārathi nira vəka niṅ siddhi sāmbəknya siddha ratnênādyūta de hyaṅ ravi ratha nira tan manda-manda prabhānya śuddhākārâputih roma ni kuda nira pə̄h niṅ prabhā niṅ śaśāṅka rvaṅ lakṣa ṅ sūryabaddhadhvaja nira piturun saṅ hyaṅ āditya sevu 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

akveh sāmantaputrâṅiriṅ i sira paḍâtuṅgalan sargacāpa pantəs lvir hyaṅ-hyaṅ iṅ sañjata təka rumaras mār tvas iṅ śatru denya sevu kvehnyânvam-anvam vruh akuda-kudan iṅ papraṅan vīraputra jihvā niṅ mr̥tyu sākṣāt dhvaja nira dumilah rājasiṅhâmarəmpu 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vīra prajñā juru dyah nira sama-sama gandharva denyâmavâmbək ilvêlvanyânvam*-anvam saṅaṅ ivu taruṇânaknya mantrī narendra aprih riṅ praṅ sujanmâratha-rathan apupul tan sah iṅ vaṅśa sālas vālārkākāra* sākṣāt lvir ika n aruṇamegha dhvajanya pradīpta 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakveh-kveh niṅ rare jro vani hañar anapuk sañjatâgyâmrihêṅ* praṅ rvaṅ lakṣa kvehnya məttâṅuhuh* aṅayam-ayam śatru mvaṅ deva daitya anvam vruh riṅ dhanurveda juru nika huvus kāku siṅhanya riṅ praṅ devāṅgâneka tuṅgulnya saṅaṅ ivu kadîndrādi milvâmukêṅ praṅ 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ambək niṅ dāsa śūrâpraṅa rumuhun apan kāsatan pva ṅ* hatinya mattā vīryâṅuhuh* gə̄ṅ ni kamanan ika riṅ praṅ murub tan pahīṅan miṅsor məntas mariṅ tuṅgaṅan apan ahuyaṅ kvehnya sevvarvudâḍəm* mātaṅganyâpupul mvaṅ dhvaja nika dumilah citrameghâkilat mās 18

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ jurv Âjâbala rvaṅ prayuta pinakasenāpati prāṇa niṅ praṅ kapvâdandan rukuh mās kavaca minaṇikan lvir samudrāgni muntab vadvâṅjurv aprameyâratha sayuta gajahnyâtatā sevu lakṣa lākâneka dhvajanya n pracalita kadi bahnî səḍəṅ niṅ yugānta 19

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mantrī rvaṅ lakṣa sampun ginəlar i hiriṅan bāhudaṇḍâṅgakāra len tekaṅ pādarakṣa prakaṭa kadi tasik rvaṅ puluh durga niṅ praṅ arpat muṅgv î təṅah śrī nr̥pasuta mukha niṅ siṅha śārdūla śakti kady Âgastyâṅuyup sāgara vunuhan ikaṅ byūha sampun tiniṅkah 20

arpat ikaṅ varagaṅ sahasa silih usī paḍa nora vədi siṅ sakasambut ikaṅ pinakagada-gadānya paḍâmurulu umban alivran arok rəmək iṅ avaṅ-avaṅ kapagut kavaluy dukduk ikā kadi sarpa pakan aṅin aneka hanêṅ gagana 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvaṅ bahulâtuha milv ajurit alara təṇḍas ikā ginutuk ai putu liṅnya nihan laku valəsi gutuk buru demu pisuh ndi n vənaṅ aṅgutukâṅrahana tan ubhayâku putu prihavak dval putu demu palakvan i katigavəlas təṅahê laku ta 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

brāhmaṇa vany apulih galah apupul aḍəm pinurugnya rəbah* tan vruh aveda kuraṅ-kuraṅ aji makapaṅhaḍa timbul ikā kepvan ikaṅ musuh amraṅa paḍa vədi yan rah ikā mijila ṅhiṅ pamədinya pulut-pulutan ika ta hetu nikā malayū 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nya ṅ sogatânvam ajurit kəna tan dva bəntar mojar kutiknya ḍuh uḍuh pukulun laranya yêka n mijil para cəṅəlnya nəhər sinuṇḍaṅ kadyaṅgan iṅ ghaṭa rəmək tika yan panaṇḍəm* 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nā liṅ nira mpu tucapa ṅ prajurit silih praṅ ārok rinok avur-avur paḍa tan vri rātnya teg tog* ḍaḍap nika bubul ginalah tinaṅkis* ḍə̄hak musuhnya sinuḍatnya pəjah kasoran* 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

gəntə̄r i śabda ni gubarnya baṅun silih prəp kady âcakəp dhvani nikaṅ kukulan karəsrəs kaṅsinya lāgi manah ambək iṅ ajrih iṅ praṅ moṅmoṅan aṅgyat* anamar macan asriṅ olih 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vadvā nr̥pātmaja tumampuhakən gadānya rvaṅ lakṣa tan kuraṅ asəṅhit* asiṅhanāda akveh tikəl-tikəl igā ni lavanya rəmpuh aṅrvaṅ-pulūh ulih* ikā ri patuṅgalanya 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vīrânapuk* raṅin apiṇḍa sahasra vr̥nda mevv-îvu koṭi pagalahnya parəṅ tumampuh gək ghor rəbah viphala siṅ kinayuhnya runtuh savrənda māti ginalah savaneh pinə̄kan 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sevvarvudâmana*-manah mvaṅ ikāṅ agaṇḍi tandaṅnya tan dva kinavədyan apan karəsrəs hrūnyânrik iṅ gagana sə̄h kadi megha məṇḍuṅ* sar cəb tibâṅənani* siṅ kəna tan pasāra 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vadvā narendra malayū savatək-vatəknya peka pravīra kəna tan dva yaya praṅ aṅrok* kombak linūd avalikan kuməlab dhvajanya himpər nadī kinəbur iṅ gaja sevu lakṣa 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

bhātriṅśa lakṣa ṅ apulih kalulun kavaṅsul kālah tibā silih idək sinəsəb pinə̄kan rəmpak* tikəl viphala salvir i sañjatanya lvir kayva-kayvan asipattra rəbah kaliṇḍvan* 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vadvā nareśvara inatyan* irêṅ kasiṅhan śakti pravīra parapə̄k i musuh yan iṅ praṅ yêkâpulih tan avədî ripubāṇavarṣa vany ânusup təpət amūk makasoṅ ḍaḍapnya 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ai koṅ vatək Raghusuta prih avakmu maṅko hayvâpraṅ undur athavā paṅalih para* ṅke āpan ya tan hana sihankva ri kāsy-asihmu kāton pəjahmu pususəṅkva ri sañjataṅku 14

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


śrī Magadhādhipa sāhasa mijil abhimāna nirêṅ palagan nāgamayāstra laras nira səḍəṅ inayat bhramita ṅ pr̥thivī gə̄ṅ svara niṅ tali de ny aṅin ika kumusuh mətu kātatakut hrū nika kādbhuta kātara gunuṅ ahəlar varakadga murub 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

prajvalitāgni cucuknya kagiri-giri dhūma dilahnya murub sek gumuruh paṅavaknya kumisik aməgat jaladêṅ gagana bor kumutug śara bajra saṅ Aja kumətug ləpas aṅdviguṇa teg tumibā ṅ vihagācala mati pinanah makəbət-kəbətan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


muntab krodha saṅ Aṅganātha kadi bahni maṅaraman i puñcak iṅ vukir ṅkānê kūvara niṅ rathâmahayu lañciṅan ira pinisit siniṅsətan hrū lāvan laras advitīya sinamādhy amijilakəna sarvasañjata vuntv îkaṅ gaganāntarāla təkap iṅ panah atip atətəl turuṅ tibā 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

devanyâvurahan təkâṅamah-amah harəp amususa riṅ nrəpātmaja lvir meghodaya māghamāsa sumaput pətəṅ alimunan aṅhudan havu saṅ hyaṅ bāyvanala pracaṇḍa pamanah nr̥patanaya dumeh kavaṅsula bək gək tor* cərəcəb tibêṅ bala nareśvara makasulayah kavaṅsulan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śaktîṅ praṅ saṅ Avantinātha sira Mr̥tyu sakala yan i madhya niṅ musuh maṅgəh buddhi nirâpulih nəhər aṅakv aməjahana nareśvarātmaja rahasyântya nikaṅ kaśaktin inayat nira mətu ṅ ayudhâgniparvata bor muṅgv iṅ gaganāntarāla paḍa yatna bala saṅ Aja kebəkan panas 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tan kevran saṅ Ajâpan adbhuta kaśaktin ira tumiru śakti saṅ Raghu rəp mārādhana pañcabāyu mətu kātaratara gumərəh magənturan kabvaṅ taṅ śara parvatâgni kadi handaru sayuta dilahnya riṅ laṅit bhur tog sə̄ṅ prəkətək nahan svara nikâməkasi hurip i madhya niṅ tasik 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅsə̄ sāhasa tan surud saṅ Anupādhipati manah ira n vanîṅ raṇa paṅhrik niṅ kuda len grit iṅ ratha karəṅv asəlur i hiriṅan hanê harəp pakrak niṅ balasaṅgha maṅgyat aṅasut ri bala saṅ Aja vāni kāmbulan teg tok* lvir garuḍâḍahəm kətug ikaṅ gubar asahuran apratidhvani 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampunya n luməpas panah saṅ Anupādhipa kadi ruga ṅ aṇḍamaṇḍala pātālastha samāpta nāga ləkər iṅ bhuvana ruməbuti nrəpātmaja porot bor dumilah mara ṅ* viṣa sinəmburakən ika hanâtəmah kukus byur lar ləs paḍa mukṣa de ni kuku saṅ garuḍa vahu minuṣṭi riṅ laras 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


krodhâmbək saṅ Susenā saha bala sumaput kātarâsiṅhanāda harṣa n ton saṅ narāryātmaja pinakamusuh kevalânuṅga-nuṅgal hrū-hrū śaktîṅ daṅū sə̄h linəpasakən irâtaṅkis akrak karəsrəs āpan pakṣy âhəlar sañjata kadi garuḍâneka sevv arvudâhə̄m 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sumyaṅ sumyak həlarnya n kinirigakən ikâghāṣa muntab dilahnya sumyuk tan kāvaran drəsnya kadi dinukakən yan tumandaṅ sakêṅ doh kāṇḍəg katrən dinuk de saṅ Aja linud irêṅ cakra puṅgəl gulūnya perat sok rahnya saṅkêṅ* ḍaḍa nika kavutah mrəm tibâdoh guməntər 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅhiṅ saṅ Hemāṅgadâmrih-mrih apulih i luyuk saṅ Susenā katampək sampun kempun sinimpən bala saṅ Aja paḍa krūra kedran kavuṅkus syuh tan sārā sa-Hemāṅgada mati tinəḍak bəntar alvaṅ salakṣa kāry aṅlīlā narendrâmanahakən irikaṅ sāgarâtyanta rodra 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śīghra rvabnyâṅgaluntaṅ gaganacara ləpas māmpuhan matrigañca ləmboranyâṅlayaṅ* kābhinava kadi gunuṅ sevu mālih marampak sumyūk adrəs tuməmpuh ri saṅ Aja kavaluy de ni gə̄ṅ niṅ kaśaktin mavrəg luṅhâstra de hyaṅ Baruṇasuta karəsnya n hilaṅ tan paśeṣa 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ Pāṇḍyâmah gunuṅ sāhasa təka rumahab de ni gə̄ṅ niṅ kamānan sākṣāt guntur sakêṅ parvata tumurun atūt lvah juraṅ durgamâjro mātaṅga mvaṅ ratha lvir vatu gumuluṅ apan tan pararyan lakunya krodhâməṇṭaṅ* laras saṅ prabhu mamanahakən bahni saṅkêṅ samudra 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lumrā riṅ dik vidik teja nika saha panasnyâṅgəsəṅ sarvavr̥kṣa sakveh niṅ megha məṇḍuṅ pinaṅan ika huvus hənti lāvan gəlapnya lvir jihvānya ṅ Mahāmr̥tyu dumilata narendrātmajâtyanta rodra saṅ hyaṅ Kālāgni muṅgv î naraca saṅ Aja marmanya mātîṅ raṇāṅga 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ Pāṇḍya sor titih alah malayū tinaṅkis vadvā nirâlara hilaṅ kahalâvrəg alvaṅ āpan silih praṅ arəbut havan ahrit evəh vadvā nr̥pātmaja maluy sakarəṅ mararyan 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ saptarāja sumahab saha bhr̥tyamantrī sampun sirâṅhabətakən dhvaja śīghra maṅkat sar sə̄k pravīra gumuruh kadi sāgara rvab lvir siṅha sārvuda paḍâkrak asiṅhanāda 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vīrâtyan iṅ vani hinatyan inəṇḍəm-əṇḍəm* agyâpraṅ aṅgətəm atə̄n maṅusap ləṅənya mvaṅ sarvasañjata nikā milu harṣa riṅ praṅ paṅliṅganâṅiṅis-iṅis kuməñar vajanya 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hamham təkâmanah añakra bubak sakāmbah rodrâmupak cəṅəl amūk arəbut kasiṅhan len taṅ paḍâpapatihan kuḍuvak paḍâkre saṅhāra kātəkan i rūpa nika n karəsrəs 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śūrâmərəh* kadi surat təkap* iṅ kaśūran kontanya kādbhuta sahasra kuvuṅ-kuvuṅnya asraṅ kətug ni panutugnya ḍaḍap guməntər himpər prabhāva ni musuhnya pəjah kapə̄kan 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mundur bala nrəpatiputra tinūt cinakra avrā rinampak inirup pinanah ginaṇḍi ndātan vədîṅ panah atip kadi megha məṇḍuṅ* tahv âhudan-hudan i madhya niṅ astravarṣa 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vadvā narādhipati sāhasa tan panaṅgəl śārdūla śakti pinakāgramukhêṅ kasiṅhan mañjiṅ marêṅ pakəkəs iṅ vunuhan təkâmraṅ* tan sāra hənti satəṅah rinakut kadi bras 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kagyat vinūk pinəgatan tinalaṅkup avrəg tiṅgalnya sañjata rathâśva sahasra saṅkhya kedər gajahnya rinubuṅ dinudut śinūla lvir vaṅkay iṅ valaṅ inīrakən iṅ səmut baṅ 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ saptarāja kadi saptasamudra muntab de niṅ kamānavibhavan pinakasvabhāva maṅsə̄ sahâśva ratha vāhana Meru* tulya apvī sakêṅ panah irôjvala mumbul-umbul 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

*meghodayâmaḍəmi sakṣaṇa tan paśeṣa saṅkê panah nr̥patiputra lavan halisyus mətv âmusus-musus anūb ratharəṅga kabvaṅ lāvan gəlap makasulambər anambər aṅgyat 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ saptarāja saha bhr̥tya rəbah katampək bəntar vinūk saha gajâśva rathâlah avrəg guntur pravīra kumusuh katəḍun marêṅ lvah himpər gunuṅ pituṅ atus rəbah iṅ samudra 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ saptarāja kabələt vəkasan sirâdan rəp sy Andakâvak aśarīra liman savr̥nda saṅkê panah nira mijil təkap iṅ kasiddhyan vuntu ṅ nabhastala lavan pr̥thivī kasəṅkə̄ 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śīghrânurumbunuh amūk ri narendraputra atyadbhutâlimunan iṅ gaganāntarāla məttâṅuliṅ kadi gunuṅ kumukūs umaṇḍəm saṅ saptarāja humuṅ atry asurak guməntər 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

de niṅ maṅadvakən* apiṇḍa təkap niṅ apraṅ* āh āh mati sy Aja mulat muliṅā kaṅelan kedran kavuṅkus i təṅah kalulun kapəṇḍəm nā liṅ nirâṅgətəm atə̄n dan asiṅhanāda 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kāla nrəpātmaja n inambulan iṅ gajendra eṅət sirâmanahakən śara hastiśikṣā mevv-îvu hənti mati śīghra parəṅ tuməmpək* himpər namuk tinəpak alvaṅ atambəh akveh 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

riṅ sakṣaṇa nrəpatiputra kumə̄l ayoga saṅ hyaṅ Smarāntakaśarāgni mijil sakêṅ hrū śīrṇa ṅ gajah ginəsəṅan paḍa bhasmibhūta lumrā havunya kumutug baṅun andhakāra 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

krodhâṅayat śaravarāgni narendraputra āpan musuh nira sudhīra mahāprabhāva maṅsə̄ paḍâṅləpasakən śara nāgapāśa tapvan təkâpan avilət pinəgat nirêṅ hrū 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ saptarāja paḍa śakti vidagdha riṅ praṅ vil krūra daitya pamanah nira sevu lakṣa krodhâmupul* səmut amūk ri narendraputra himpər grahâṅhibəki rāt marəbut śaśāṅka 18

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

siṅhapravīra saṅ Ajâṅayat astra śakti ḍaṅṣṭrā niṅ Antaka minuṣṭi huvus minantran devātmakâmava gadāyudha mətv arampak mavrəg pəjah silih idək para daitya mukṣa 19

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

an maṅkana praṅ ira tan hana sor avantah maṅsə̄* nr̥pātmaja lavan naranātha maṅsə̄ təmpuh ni sañjata nirâpagut ātirodra himpər gunuṅ madu guməntər inadv atəmpuh 20

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

liṇḍū bəlah bhramita bhūmi nikaṅ raṇāṅga mvaṅ saptaparvata kadînayun agrah olah pātāla sapta kadudut kagiriṅ kagiṅgaṅ nya ṅ saptasāgara katumpək arok bañunya 21

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kveh niṅ pəjah saka salakṣa sahasra vr̥nda len taṅ paḍâməkasi jīva humūṅ aṅohan meh matya maṅrəguṅ ikaṅ gajah asriṅ aṅgro abyūran iṅ rudhirasāgara kombakan ryak 22

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mātaṅga len turaga nūsa nikâṅalimbuṅ* sarvāstra kayvan ika śīrṇa marok* dhvajâkrəp ṅkāna ṅ* pravīra marəbut phala niṅ kasiṅhan vetnyâləyə̄ kasidəkuṅ-sidəkuṅ silih praṅ 23

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkānê pasir-pasir ikā naranāthaputra apraṅ lavan ratu kavīśvara riṅ palambaṅ hrū muṅgv i karṇa nira piṇḍa tanah kasumpiṅ tapvan varəg praṅ alaṅə̄ lagi kombakan rah 24

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Rudrāyudhāgni pinasaṅ naranāthaputra Durgānalâdbhuta* mijil pamanah narendra trus riṅ laṅit dilah ikâsəmu megha bahni lumrâvilət latu-latunya mahāsurâkrak 25

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vidyādharī saha vimāna sumaṅgrahâkveh muṅgv î tavaṅ vruh irikaṅ vani-vāni riṅ praṅ dukduk* hayunya sinahāyan iṅ ambək ahyaṅ harṣâmapag ri para vīra pəjah kapə̄kan 27

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mvaṅ paṅrəṅə̄kv* i kita yan pinakāntaśāpa de saṅ Priyambada səḍəṅnya gajendrarūpa kāruṇya māsih amaləs ri valuy nira hyaṅ saṅmohanêkaṅ inajinta kənoh parīkṣan 31

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sāmānya* peka rumuhun para taṇḍa mantrī mātaṅga matta turagâṅrəpa tan vri rātnya mūrchâturū kadi tasik vvaṅ ikaṅ* raṇāṅga mombak raṅin gajah aghaṇṭa karaṅ liman ya 38

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun jayêṅ raṇasabhā naranāthaputra saṅ saptarāja kadi māti parəṅ katurvan təkvan huvus kacuriṅan rah i tuṅtuṅ iṅ hrū yêkā siluṅluṅ ira yan kaparājayêṅ praṅ 39

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ hyaṅ sirâjaya-jayêṅ gaganāntarāla mvaṅ puṣpavarṣa tumibā kadi kasturi mrik prīty âdara nrəpatiputra sinādhukāra sampun maṅañjali saharṣa nəhər tuməṅhā 40

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun byakta kacakravartyan i nr̥pātmaja ri huvus irâmarājaya nora lvaṅ nira pūrṇa maṅkana sasañjata nira kadi ṅūni dug siṅī sakveh niṅ bala śūrasaṅgha humatur paḍa maṅarahakən lumampaha maṅkat śrîndumatī lavan nr̥patiputra paḍa sukha makālihan ratha 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tiṅkah-tiṅkah i de nirâpraṅ inucap vinarahakən irê suputrikā mojar śrîndumatī vagus kita kakâpa haməṅan ikanaṅ vatək ratu rakryan yêki panahkv amuṅvakəna tan dadi viphala ləpasnya riṅ musuh saṅhārāstra vimohanākhya paṅalah pinakakajayaśatrun* i ṅhulun 2

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun rakva gənəp salek lavas irêṅ havan asukha-sukhan dudū gave lok niṅ mārga pasir vukir tinutakən lamakan ira macaṅkramâṅləṅəṅ ry Âyodhyānagarī katon hada-hadā ni dilah i gupuranya mās maṇik saṅ hyaṅ sūrya niśākarêṅ udayaparvata paḍa nira kevalâhaləp 2
