No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vr̥tta śrī naranāthaputra katəkê nr̥pati Raghu lavan nareśvarī an sampun sira labdhakārya ri Vidarbhapura mamənaṅ iṅ svayambara mvaṅ ry âlah para nātha riṅ praṅ aharəp ruməbuta naranāthaputrikā harṣa śrī parameśvarī makamukha nrəpati təhər akon anuṅsuṅa 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vvaṅ ri jro paḍa muṅgah iṅ paṅuṅaṅan ruməṅə-rəṅə hanan silih pəḍək agyā-gyān hana tan tulus sipat ikânahəlay apan alah girahyasən len taṅ strī malajəṅ vagəd-vagəd anaṅga susu nika sinaṇḍuṅ iṅ sakhī akveh mādəg adan tapih mirir inir nika nəhər akaluṅ-kaluṅ sabuk 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

strī ry Âyodhyapurī parəṅ mijil anuṅsuṅ ahayu kadi paṅjrah iṅ səkar ndan buddhinya kaḍaṅhanan raras i denya mulat inuparəṅgan iṅ guyu rūm niṅ strī ri Vidarbharājya kadi pāləman i hayu ni rūpa niṅ rakət aśrī denya mavâmbək abvat atərəh tumiru-tiru manah suputrikā 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

akveh rājasutā ry Ayodhyanagarī mada makapaṅayāya rūm nikā maṅgəh rūpa nira n panampikakənê nr̥pavaraduhitā n pinaṅkvakən maṅke n vruh ri haləp narendratanayā kavədi-vədi ni rūpa niṅ Ratih mrəm tan lə̄ṅ kadi vintaṅ iṅ vəṅi katon akucəm i kəñar iṅ niśākara 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

miṅgut piṇḍa nikaṅ kaḍatvan i səḍəṅ saṅ Aja təka lavan suputrikā āpan kādbhuta siṅ sapolah ira kābhinava ri halivat nirêṅ* ləbuh sakveh-kveh para taṇḍa sə̄h parəṅ anuṅsuṅ i sira paḍa harṣa garjita abyūṅan kumisik garantuṅ ira ramya kadi papagut iṅ ryak iṅ pasir 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅhiṅ devînaləm iṅ mulat syapa ta taṇḍiṅa nira liṅ ikânulus dahat yadyan sevu purī pametana* mamarpatana hajəṅ ira ndatan hana strī sāmantasutā paḍâhyaṅ araras ndan arada kapalaṅ tiniṅhalan byakta śrîndumatī pakaprabhu nirêṅ śayana pisaniṅū katampika 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nā liṅnya n paṅaləm katuhvan apa tan hana kadi sira ratnakanyakā āpan sarva-səkar sugandha makanāyaka pənəd i raras ni rūm nira lāvan madhya nira pramāṇa ri kəlab ni ləməs ikaṅ aśokapādapa śrī śrī niṅ mukha śuddha pūrṇa gumavaṅ tuhu-tuhu ratu niṅ niśākara 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun śrī naranāthaputra kalavan nr̥pavaraduhitā marê daləm bhakty ânəmbah i jə̄ṅ narendra Raghu karva nr̥patimahiṣī sirâpupul buddhi śrī parameśvarī makamukha nrəpati sukha tumon anak nira prajñā* śāstravit iṅgitajña vani śakti lituhayu dumeh sirâsiha 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrī devîndumatī kinon marəka de nr̥pati Raghu kagə̄ṅan iṅ sukha lāvan śrī parameśvarī sira makon marəka nəhər aṅol sirâsəgəh pāman* penan avās marâṅgəh ira de saṅ ahayu paḍa sūryavaṅśaja vet niṅ harṣa lumuh sira n marahakən pakadaṅan ira riṅ nr̥pātmajā 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

səmbah śrī naranātha Bhoja ri narendra Raghu vinaca marma riṅ rasa an devîndumatī kaśuddhyana pakānak-anaka nira nitya kāsy-asih rājasvâdbhuta rājayogya maṇirāja pahula nira muṅgu riṅ ratha kesî səmbah ira pramāṇa guməlar hinaturakən irê nareśvara 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

buddhi śrī parameśvarī sukha lavan nr̥pati Raghu tumon anak nira an polih maṇik iṅ kaḍatvan i Vidarbha saphala sira rājakanyakā təkvan kapvanakan paḍâparək ikaṅ pakadaṅan avilət karaṅkəpan boṅgan rūpa nirâhañar-hañar amantu saparan ira tan kasah tumūt 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

buddhi śrîndumatī rəsəp makabapebv i* sira puji-puji n kināsihan byātītan salavas nira n təka paḍâsukha-sukhan adulur macaṅkrama mary onəṅ ri Vidarbharājya tuvi rāka nira sira marək manuṅgayap ry Âyodhyānagarī jugâṅinaki de ni sih ira ri nareśvarātmaja 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sakveh niṅ makapuṇya rāga nira riṅ nr̥patisuta paḍâṅhiḍəp smara sampun rakva sinūkṣma riṅ pahula mās maṇi rajata suvastra kasturi aṅkən māsa silib-silib vvaṅ irikaṅ vəṅi pinaran irêṅ paḍaṅ vulan vāvaṅ mātra karəṅvan iṅ taṅis arūm vinisikan ira māsku cəp tuhan 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

mālih tan təka saprahāra ri huvus niṅ ulah aṅalih asriṅ iṅ tilam marmâṅdūmi karāsikan vruh i harəp-harəpan iṅ aharəp haləmbaṅən rakryan saṅ pinakādipūrva niṅ amūrva kataruṇan irêṅ pasaṅgaman kañcit mogha kapaṅgih aṅliga-ligā kinisapu nira sāhasâvuyuṅ 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


kakâja vinaliṅku tan vruha kitâṅlvaṅa turida ni rāga ni ṅhulun hanânak-anakanku ketaka miṅiṅ sahaja tan inakunta rakva ya putih siki kaduryaśaśruti vavaṅ katalu sagalakanta tak vədi manahku vani tan surud pva ya tat antu kita ya karaṇaṅku tan rara 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aum* yayi saliṅta māsku n avuyuṅ sapaṅucapan i māsku lampunən ṅhulun yayi turuṅ vənaṅ maṅavayuh rumatakəna vilāpa ni ṅhulun ya hetu ni kakanta tan vənaṅ asih ləvu marika sih i ṅhulun yayi hələm ṅhulun atəmva māsku kalavan kita ratakəna hayva saṅśaya 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

paran tiki dumeh kitâṅucapa maṅkana dali-dalihanta keraṅan katon aṅavatāra denta tan asih pati-pati parihāra* tan padon tahâkv alara denta yan kadi kadaṅ haji para kulaputra kāsy-asih kita pva ta bakal ratu syapa ta tan kapanasana hatinya kinvakən 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

valiṅkv* asisinahva tan vənaṅa mithya kita ri rasa ni* pralāpita apan kita sinambhavâṅadəga ratv aṅalilirana kaprabhun haji ujarta kita tan paṅakva ləpihanta nəhər aśapathâṅdilat laṭi adalka kita tan panampa ri laraṅkv apuji-puji kita n tuhan-tuhan 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tuhanku yayi ni ṅhulun vruh aku yan kita mujarakəna ṅ salah kəna tuhun palaku ni ṅhulun siha ni māsku tumutakəna buddhi ni ṅhulun rahasyan ibu polah i ṅvaṅ apa tan vuruṅa kahaturê nareśvara huvus kaka huvus nahan vuvus ira n vinuvusan akəcap miṅəl-miṅəl 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

taṅeh yan ucapən paganti saṅ amālihi prəman i narendraputrikā paḍəm pamanas iṅ smarānala ri buddhi nira siniram iṅ karāsikan nr̥pātmaja sirâmrih aṅlih aməkul-məkul aməkasi turvan iṅ tilam mulih sira bisâpi* sādhu kanin iṅ jaja kakuku kinampu-kampuhan* 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


jāti nikaṅ caritêṅgal aṅucap adavā n hiḍəpən ri hati śrī Raghu vr̥ddha sirâṅlvasi sukha ni pamukti nirêṅ nagara indriya tan vənaṅ iṅ viṣaya ri sira nir pakənanya kabeh kady asalin rasa tan parasa virasa salvir ikaṅ viṣaya 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hetu nirâsrah i kaprabhun ira ri narāryasutêṅ pasabhān kādbhuta de niṅ aṅastvakən i sira samâhaləpêṅ nagara saṅ ratu nora parāṅmukha sahana nirâvədi sampun anūt śrī Raghu paṇḍita valkaladhara magave patapan riṅ alas 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yāvat alas bhaya durgama paṅulilan iṅ mr̥ga siṅha baroṅ yan sinusuk patapan təkap ira paramarṣi sabhā vəkasan tonən ikaṅ vana śūnya tinaruka saṅ uttama niṅ karatun lvir suraloka təkânurun iṅ acala ramya katon ahaləp 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ hulu kəmbaṅ anak vəsi haji sira milv anadin viṣaya tan tuna riṅ paribhāṣa sira dahat aləp nira yan paṅucap āpan inuttama tuvy apatih atiśayâdbhuta* vīrya nira tan hana śeṣa niṅ ambək aruhur i huvus niṅ aḍampa vuluṅ 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kveh nira saṅ bhavika prakaśita milu vikv anusup riṅ alas bhakti tuvin katəkan tuha masa niṅ avalkala nora hiner gīta lavan kakavin binisa pinakacaṇḍi nirêṅ* nagara māyvan akīrti palambaṅ amanis alaṅə̄ hibək iṅ patani 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vuṅkuk aṅambəkakən kavi milu kavilaṅ kavi vikv alavas sabhya jitākṣara hāsyakaraṇa pinakādi ni kavruh ikā lumbu valuh hajujə̄ṅ* rasa ni manis i lambaṅ ikā rinasan ṅhiṅ rva tivas dumadak lagi vinaca-vacâṅrahatîṅ* amaca 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


vikv âpa ta* ṅaran ira saṅ tamuy pili-pilih viku nagara sira akveh marək i sira maliṅ-maliṅ rusi-rusit kinahatakən ira dondonan inucap ira ramya-ramya niṅ aṅəṇḍəki turuṅ inucap yapvan binuru sinulagah* luput liṅ ira sor saphala niṅ alayar* 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

heman vruh aṅaji sira tan palokika sadā marika viku haji prāyâpi lupa kadi lamur sināpa dumadak sira maləs ataña kastryan pva ta marək atəkən-təkən sira nəhər lumaku ginaməlan *de niṅ hyun ira pinakaśaṅkhapāṇya tumuhâpi pikun* api lupa 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


yeki palambaṅ ira mpu tapa tucapa ramya nikaṅ patapan vāṇḍira sampun agə̄ṅ pinakasabha-sabhā para śiṣya lanā campaka tañjuṅ aśoka pinatiga tinumpyatak iṅ harəpan bvat halu* piṅgir ikaṅ talaga ri harəp iṅ gupurâṅharəpi 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun avās paripūrṇa sahana-hana niṅ vaṅunan hinəduk bapra lumaṅkuṅ ikaṅ patani jamur alaṅv aṅuṅaṅ pasisi tal tirisan pinakādi ni tuvu-tuvuhanya* huvus pinahat saṅ para śiṣya paḍâṅigəl aṅiduṅ i kāla nikaṅ tutuban 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vet ni lavas naranātha lumaku viku muṅgv irikaṅ patapan mār kumətər sahana ny avayava ni śarīra nirâṅləvasi* rūkṣa samāpta ni təṅran ira paṅanumānan ira n* pəjaha kevalatattva ginəgvan ira pamariśuddha nira n ləpasa 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun svargastha rājarṣi saṅ Aja vinarah mār gupe tvas nirâṅrəs dadyâṅganyâhaṅan tan sapira lara nira n kantuna śrī sudevī byakta pvâkālihan maṇḍyuṣa sira sahavan mantuk iṅ svargaloka tan pātma śrī narāryâja vinidhi pinəgat sih nirârāma-rena 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

eṅgal mary âlarâpan vihikan i purih iṅ janma riṅ martyaloka an tan sthitya ṅ śarīrânut i hala hayu niṅ karma tan sāh aṅinte śaivarṣy* akveh ḍatəṅ maṅgəsəṅi śava maharṣînutus śrī* narendra byātītan bhasmi rājarṣi inañut* i təṅah niṅ tasik śūnya ramya 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun līlā* manah saṅ prabhu mari sivuhən kevalâṅgə̄ṅ kapūjān mānak tuṅgal prasiddha hyaṅ Atanu maśarīrâtəmah rājaputra anvam prajñā sirâpañji Daśaratha huvus kaprakāśêṅ triloka vahv âṅajy âhiḍəp vruh ri samaya ni rusit niṅ dhanurvedaśāstra 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ mambaṅ Kavidoṣa karva Jayavaspa sukha manəmu vīrya de haji sedəmpaty adulur marək silih asih tuməmu phala nikâmalar-malar sojar saṅ prabhu kevalôjar ika* siṅ savacana nika śabda saṅ prabhu vet niṅ sampun anəmvakən kahulunan satirun iṅ amalar tuhan-tuhan 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ekacchattra narendra saṅ para ratu praṇata paḍa vineh anugraha icchā nora kasaṅśaya prakaśitêṅ tribhuvana sira digvidikjaya* dharma kṣatriyadharma pinrih inivə̄ nira pamahayu dharma saṅ viku mvaṅ tar kevəhan iṅ giṇâmayuṅi rāt sakala tuhu-tuhu Prajāpati 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

śrī devîndumatī lavan saṅ Aja tan bəsur aṭika-ṭikan sirâlavas śr̥ṅgārātmaka rāsikâṅdadi manuṣya sira pinakamaṅgalê daləm hyaṅ niṅ saṅgama pāvak iṅ paṅəsah iṅ śayana sakala janma niṅ rəṅih sih-sih jaṅga vəlas-harəp sah ira* saṅsaya lumuṅ avilət paḍâlaṅə̄ 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


gərəh vruh i masanya ramya sinuluh dulur i raras i gandha niṅ səkar ya hetu nira lālanâməṅ-aməṅ iṅ taman aṅənəs akālihan kəmul* adoh kahiḍəpanya de ni pəluk iṅ havan i siluk ikaṅ latāgr̥ha hanâmbək ira mampirâpan asənət vulat ira muliṅânahā-nahā 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri sampun ira məntas ahyas asalin jayaphala kadi raṇḍi kābunan rah iṅ ripukulâlah iṅ samara tattva nika sinuji niṅ surāṅganā paḍâyugala rūmnya jāti kadi kasturi vaṅi nika tan gave-gave* amānuṣa haləpnya mūlya sakaḍatvan ulih iṅ amarājayêṅ musuh 5

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

prahāsana narendra rakva vihikan ri karaṇa ni vuyuṅ nareśvarī sumatya* ri laṅə̄ nira n paṅikəta ry avak ira nəhər aṅdilat pupur amaṅkvakən ameri luh tuhu-tuhu n kavi siṅ ulah ira n təkâmanis raras-raras i kapriyambadan irâṅhari-hari saha luh mavor taṅis 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ujar saṅ Aja mātra marma rinasan tuna-tuna maməlas-məlas-harəp nimitta ni manah narendramahiṣī vədi kaluputanê* nareśvara hilaṅ taṅis irâtəmah gərəh arūm luh ira suməmu riṅ hudan mulih aminta səpah esi de nira mulat kadi mavarah i hənti niṅ lara 6

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kāla dyah Hariṇī śināpa ri pamighna nika tapa madadya mānuṣa mogâsih vəkasan dvijarṣi Tr̥ṇavindu ri panaṅis ikâmaṅun vəlas ndan rakvânta ni* śāpa saṅ rəṣi səkar sumanasa havananya mantuka ndah yêkī ginave bhaṭāra Paramārtha karaṇa nika don ikêṅ jagat 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ saptarṣi sulakṣaṇâhaləp aseva satata sira śuśruṣâguru ndān aṅhiṅ rəṣi Nāradâṅgupit inuttama tuvi kavi gīta susvara vinvītan lalitâmanis tinəṅahan* raras inapi tinuṅtuṅan laṅə̄ kālap citta bhaṭāra mūrchita saśoka hati nira kaləsvan aṅrəṅə̄ 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lvir strī-stry arja kavîṅgitajña para gīta pavulatan i piṇḍa niṅ gupit ṅkānê tuṅgul ikā səkar sumanasênikət asəmu sadak hanêṅ gəluṅ kady ânumpiṅakən tanah ri səḍəṅ iṅ tabəh inənah i tambaṅ iṅ valuh mvaṅ kady âsidəhâṅrəṅih-rəṅih* i pəs* ni ləṅən ika lanā katiṇḍihan 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sr̥ṣṭi hyaṅ Madanâtikaṅ sumanasa mrik inalap iṅ aṅin huvus ləvas kāry âśâlara piṇḍa niṅ gupit arūm savaṅ anaṅis inambilan səkar akveh ṣaṭpada maṅrubuṅ milu katūt humuṅ alivəran iṅ nabhastala saṅ hyaṅ lek alaṅə̄ lumə̄ṅ səmu nikaṅ sumanasa ḍumavuh sakêṅ tavaṅ 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

harṣa śrîndumatī mulat ri səkar iṅ sumanasa kadi tan pamatyana * āpan de ni laṅə̄nya kāṅinan amet ri sira katəmu riṅ pasaṅgaman ndātan vruh sira yan sinādhya ya ta hetu nira kahənəṅan pijər maṅə̄ ndah yêkī karaṇanya śīghra tumibā ri jaja nira kasuṅsaṅ iṅ susu 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ndātan vyartha ḍavuhnya māti sira denya tuhu vəkas i śāpa saṅ rəṣi mrəm tan sāra tibê kisapvan i vulat saṅ Aja milu tibā sirâpupul kālih māti sirêṅ tilam tuhun udhāni saṅ Aja vəkasan sirâṅlilir akrak taṅ sakaḍatvan aṅgyat adadak taṅis ika ri pəjah nareśvarī 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

gə̄ṅ niṅ duhkha kabhukti de saṅ Aja tan papaḍa vəkas i tībra niṅ lara kāla śrîndumatînalap ni səkar iṅ sumanasa mulih iṅ surālaya kāry aṅhol śava koṅ* pinakpak inamər tinañan ira təhər pinaṅkvakən rəñcəm tvas nira hetu niṅ luh aṅasapta kalara-lara de nirânaṅis 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

rakryan saṅ lumah iṅ kisapvan ahurip karika kita məne n malih yayi hayvântənkv asuve* pəjah yayi tutur-tutur ibu paṅucap kitê ṅhulun heman* māsku śavanta tiṅgalakənanta səḍəṅ ahayu kāsih i ṅhulun maṅkin rūkṣa tuhanku tan patuluṅan dudut aku ta* dulur-dulur pəjah 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

*prāṇaṅkv Indumatīṅku māsku pavuṅu ndak amalaku sərəh lavan pucaṅ aṅgy-aṅgī saha pastikêbu palakuṅkva muvah i kita hayva tâsuve agyâveha səpah sakê vaja kakanta yayi ri kita māsku paṅlilir* sih-sihkv î kita tan pahīṅan ibu sugyan asəbəla hatinta yan pəjah 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

maṅke n* tan pakakāraṇa ṅ lara patinta pəjah i taṅan i ṅhulun kita t asy-âsih pavarah ri doṣa ni kakanta karaṇa niṅ atiṅgal i ṅhulun paṅher māsku valuy muvah ri śava rakryan apa haməṅanaṅkv inaryakən suṅsuṅ vāhu ḍatəṅ kisapvakən anakta si Daśaratha māsku həmbanən 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

karvânakta karîṅ kaḍatvan aku denta yayi kadi linad tvas i ṅhulun sambatnya n patañê nimitta ni patinta kavəlas-arəp aṅgaməl taṅan yâṅde syuh ni hatiṅku mār kapənətan* humənəṅ apəga tan* vənaṅ mulat aṅhiṅ luhku lavan taṅisku sahur i ṅhulun ibu ri kədə̄ nikâtaña 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

yêkī sambat irânaṅis kasih-arəp kaluputan i pəjah nareśvarī maṅgā matya matêṅ aṅə̄lakəna duhkha paməkas ira saṅ huvus pəjah maṅke n tiṅhal amaspadākən irikaṅ kusuma kasəlaṅan taṅis nira de niṅ krodha lavan putək hati mijil paṅuman-uman irêrikaṅ səkar 13

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lāvan deṅkv anahā-nahā ri dadimu n* kusuma təmahan iṅ varāpsarī saṅkêṅ svarga təkânurun harəp anivya ratu huvus akīrti riṅ jagat ndātan harṣa n amarva hetumu n amatyani ri kasi-kasihku putrikā riṅ śūnya n valuyâpsarī marəka tan sah anilihana saṅ huvus pəjah 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nā de śrī naranātha mojar irikaṅ sumanasa səkar iṅ kadevatan sakveh saṅ rəṣi śaiva sogata kaparcaya haji marək aṅlavad-lavad mvaṅ ḍaṅ hyaṅ karuhun purohita nareśvara paḍa humatur marê daləm nirvighna ṅ ruməṅə̄ pavitra ni taṅis-taṅis ira paḍa vr̥ddhapaṇḍita 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


səḍəṅ tinaṅisan narendramahiṣī lumay avənəs apan huvus pəjah taṅis nr̥pati rakva mātra rinəṅə̄ nira tuna maməlas-məlas-harəp nimitta nira n aṅlilir tutur irâmuhara vəlas irê nareśvara* aṅiṅkin atalaṅkup amvit i nareśvara pəjaha nəhər maṅañjali 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

prabhuṅku huniṅan taṅisku rasa mamvita pəjaha ri jə̄ṅ nareśvara hilaṅ manə-manəhta tan təmu kabhaktin ika* pahalavə̄ kita prabhu patikta kavəlas-harəp syapa vidhin haji tumuta rumakṣa riṅ* hənu ahā haji valiṅku ramya parəṅâku pəjaha kalavan kita prabhu 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

narendra varahən ṅhulun ri paran iṅ mati tuduhakənanta riṅ hənū ndya taṅ hiḍəpən i ṅhulun karaṇa niṅ maluya silih asih lavan kita apan kasi-kasihta ratnavanitā juga təmahana ni ṅhulun pəjah sahasraśatajanma janma ni patikta huluna pakənaṅkva de haji 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


tr̥ṣṇāṅkv i nāthaṅku mapôlahaṅkva hilī ni luhtâkilayū hiḍəpku aṅrəs hatiṅku n ruməṅə̄ taṅista ay ay ṅhulun matya tuluṅ laraṅku 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

svāmiṅku nāthaṅku vəkasku maṅke marək* ri paṅkvanta cinumbananta amvīta mūrâku sakê jajanta lalun patiṅku n lumah iṅ kisapvan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan taṅis śrī naranāthapatnī rasâməlas-harṣa təkap nirâmvit sampun sirâṅañjali satyabhakti pəjah sirâgəgvan i jə̄ṅ narendra 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nitya prakampâmbət i madhya niṅ strī prabhāva saṅ satya matî* kisapvan truh-truh luh iṅ śoka hañar tinambaṅ kətug kətīg* iṅ vahu-vahv apaṅgih 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

bhakty âtuhan dyah Jayaluh tumuṅkul mulat kapūhan ri pəjah sudevī tan sambhavā matya sirâpan anvam hiḍəpnya ri tvasnya nəhər masambat 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

āḍā tuhankv Indumatīṅku māsku ṅhulun tuhan pun Jayaluh kasihta yêki n humaṇḍəm ri padadvayanta asiṅ sapatyanta tumūta bela 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

līlā tuhan pun Kavidoṣa vinvit maveh tumūtêka pəjahta māsku āpan katon milva nipun dəlāha namaś Śivāya n pəjaha prabhunta 8

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

patrəm pabelan vulatîbu yêki umigrahâtmā ni manəhta maṅke nāhan vuvusnya trus avaknya* mūrcha pəjah tumūt satya ri jə̄ṅ sudevī 9

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

vahv aṅlilir śrī naranātha meṅət apan katuhvan lara niṅ kapatyan keṅər mukha śrîndumatī kaləṅgak huvus katon līna yayan tinaṅhi 10

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

induṅ pavuṅv îbu lihat kakanta ikaṅ turū hayva ginə̄ṅta māsku āḍā pəjah kapva tuhanku maṅke dumeh si tan paṅlilir an tinaṅhi 11

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

atyanta sihtêry aku tan pahīṅan ujarta matyê kapatiṅku liṅta maṅke kitâniṅgalakən huripku valiṅku tuhv âsiha mithya māsku 12

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan śava dyah Jayavaspa māsku tumūt avās bela təlas mapatrəm svāminya* lāvan tanayanya kāri laranya tuṅgal kalavan laraṅku 14

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nā de narendrâṅucap asrət ahrək mavor taṅis luh nira maṅkin adrəs ndan soca devîndumatî tibānya paḍânaṅis rūpa nira n paḍâṅluh 15

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

sampun śava śrîndumatī pinuṇḍut *sakê kisapvan saṅ Ajâlupâvak mūrchā pəjah sakṣaṇa śīghra meṅət tuhun sira glāna masū masambat 16

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

induṅku māskv Indumatīṅku paṅher ah ah yayi ndī parananta maṅko āḍâlalis tan panahā laraṅku tuhanku tolih kavəlas-harəpku 17

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nāhan taṅis saṅ prabhu mār rasanya* tamuy nira prāpta maharṣi vr̥ddha ndan rakva saṅkêṅ bhagavān Vasiṣṭha narendra masvāgata sārjavâtvaṅ 18

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kṣāntabya rānak mapa don maharṣi ḍatəṅ səḍəṅ niṅ lara tan patambān saṅ paṇḍitâtah karaṇanya marya prasiddha śuddhāmr̥ta saṅ munīndra 19

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


kṣama yogya de saṅ ahulun mataña ri ḍatəṅ bhujaṅga haji riṅ nagara bhagavān Vasiṣṭha maṅutus marəka tuməkākənôcapan irê nr̥pati 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

haji rakva hayva kalaran dahatən purih iṅ dadi n dadi kalotakəna lara duhkha mogha tumuvuh riṅ avak ya tikā prihən saṅ ahulun paḍəmən 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

suraputrikā kəta saṅ Indumatī subhagêṅ triloka maṅaran Hariṇī śuci rakva janma nira śuddhy anulus sira devatī niṅ araras pinuji 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ri səḍəṅ dvijarṣi Tr̥ṇavindv atapa hana saṅśayê hyaṅ Amarendra mulat i mahāprabhāva nira riṅ patapan tinahā nirâṅadəha kendran ira 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

irikā ta rakva sira saṅ Hariṇī katuduh mamighnana tapâṅənəsa i ḍataṅ nirêṅ patapan epv aputək bhagavān sirâsəgə-səgəh ya masih 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

suraputrikâṅucapakən hyun ira marək iṅ dvijarṣi səḍəṅ iṅ majapa amahayva kəmbaṅ ira tan kasaha atəhər manaṅhuluha riṅ śayana 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


mavuyuṅ dvijarṣi vəkasan rumasa-rasani de nirâṅucap tumuluy śināpa nira tan valuya muvah i jə̄ṅ Surādhipa jənəkêṅ manuṣyapada kevala matəmaha janma mānuṣa ujar iṅ viśeṣapuruṣa pratiniyata tətəpnya tan vuruṅ 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

i ḍavuh ni śāpa bhagavān sira kapəgan ikêpu keraṅan anaṅis nəhər marək aminta tinurunan anugrahâṅədə̄ bhagavān mulat ri kavəlas-harəp ira vəkasan sirâvəlas ikaṅ antaśāpa səkar iṅ sumanasa paṅanugrahêrika 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


irikā n pəjah ta sira riṅ patapan tumuluy prakāśa dadi rājasutā i Vidarbha martyapada rājya nira Krathakeśikendra makavīja sira 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

pira taṅ tahun lavas irêṅ nagara mətu devatī nira n arūm rumara səḍəṅ iṅ svayəmbara kinārya nira naranātha kahyun ira nora muvah 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

matutur sirê səḍəṅ ira n panivi i narendra riṅ surapada n patəmu dumadak pva saṅ prabhu hilaṅ rumuhun *dadi rājaputra sira rājasutā* 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

akurən muvah sukha təkêṅ karatun təka ṅ antaśāpa maṅutus muliha maluyê svajāti nira devasutā tumibā ṅ səkar sumanasâməjahi* 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kaliṅanya saṅ prabhu hade kalarā- kəna saṅ pəjah mulih iṅ Indrapada apa tan vuruṅ haji matəmva muvah kalavan sirêṅ amaraloka hələm 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

nya vuvus maharṣy apitutur i* haji ahəbaṅ-həbaṅ lara nirâtəlasan umulih maharṣi tumuluy kalaran pitutur nirê saṅ Aja rakva* tumūt 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun śava śrîndumatī bhinasmi murub siluṅluṅ nira ratnacetya maṅkin prapañca nrəpati vyamoha vvaluṅ tahun kāla nira n katiṅgal 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


irikā ta saṅ Daśarathâṅadəg anilihi kaprabhun haji buddhi saṅ Aja sukha harṣa mulat i kasiṅha-siṅhan ira digjayêṅ jagat 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tadanantarêrika ta buddhi saṅ Aja sivuhən sirâlara monəṅ i hayu saṅ aniṅgalakən mulih iṅ surālaya maluy surāpsarī 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


hana tīrtha nirmala vəkas niṅ anindyaśuci i patəmvan iṅ Suranadī kalavan Sarayū naranātha karva Kavidoṣa pəjah lumabuh mulih iṅ surālayapadântya* pinaṅgih ira 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

Jayaluh dadi hyaṅ aṅaraṅ rumuhun katəmu* tumuluy kataṅgamaṅ anəmbah i jə̄ṅ saṅ Aja anaṅis nəhər mulat i saṅ Kavidoṣa marək umucap lavasnya mapasah mataṅis-taṅisan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

parameśvarī haji sirâṅdadi devasutā surarājya* Nandanavanākhya katəmvan ira pinəkul pinaṅkvakən aveh pipi vet niṅ unəṅ asalin śarīra paḍa mārdava rūpa nira 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ apiṇḍa puṣpa tamuyan bhramarâṅarəki kamatəṅgəṅən sira mulat ri papaṅgih ira kadi tan patəmva muvah iṅ* paḍa sūkṣma pəjah madulur taṅis vara-varah nira marma dahat 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ sākṣāt hurip i* ṅhulun kavəkas iṅ nagara ri səḍəṅ i ṅhulun pəjah duhkhantê ruhun i ṅhulun mulih iṅ Indrapada karaṇa niṅ lanânaṅis maṅke n prāpta paran təmunta* kaka de ni kavəlas-arəp i ṅhulun maṅə̄ aṅhiṅ luhku panuṅsuṅaṅkva tarimanta kaka vijil i rāga ni ṅhulun 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

induṅ tan sipi kapva gə̄ṅ i lara niṅ huvus atəmu rinuddha niṅ Vidhi saṅsāraṅkv aṅajap tavaṅ karaṇa niṅ ḍatəṅ i kita katalyan iṅ hayu ndan maṅke n təka śūnyahasta yayi kevala ḍatəṅ aṅisapv aṅolakən aṅhiṅ kūṅ ulih i ṅhulun saha taṅiskv asəkəl i hati māsku sanmatan 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tonton ku n rumuhun pəjah karika hetu niṅ anəmu larônəṅ antya ya tontonən taṅan i ṅhulun ri kita yan panipati nəhər aṅdələ̄ mata mvaṅ tan kram vaja ni ṅhulun kadi humer kita masuṅa səpah sakê vaja milv âkuṅ təṅah i ṅhulun kaka paṅavruhana lagi kaluṅsuran tapih 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

hāh svāmiṅkv alavas dahat kita tan antuk iṅ amarapadâparan* hiner mūrchâprih ṅvaṅ aṅantyakən ri ḍatəṅanta tumutura ri līna ni ṅhulun tr̥ṣṇantê sukha niṅ hanêṅ kabinihajyan amuhara lalista ri ṅhulun deṅkv ânarka ri tan təkanta tumuluy pilih aharəp* i patya ni ṅhulun 4

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

aṅkən rātri ri tambvaṅ iṅ vulan avā ṅhulun aṅaraṅ anaṅhulun puḍak de ny ûnəṅkv i kitâṅutus taḍahasih tuməkakəna taṅisku riṅ kuləm kālaṅkyaṅ jarumankva* riṅ masa kapat ḍatəṅa ri kita kāla niṅ rəməṅ her-herən ri təkanta kevala kitâtiśaya kadi hinundaṅ iṅ patər 5

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lvah* luh vādhaka ni ṅhulun drəs i hilī nika kadi minahâməgat havan vvat goṅgaṅnya gaḍuṅ mure səkar ika mrik avaṅi sinaluṇḍiṅ iṅ puḍak luṅgah niṅ katirah lumuṅ pinakagəgvan i təka niṅ aṅin kadînayun aṅlaṅvākən ululnya puṣpa vinaṅun hinəduk i həlar iṅ madhubrata 6

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

ṅkâku n ton kakavinta riṅ vəla-vəlah paḍa-paḍa tinatā limaṅ viji vvantən ṣaṭpada kanyakânaṅis i saṇḍiṅ ika karaṇa ni ṅhulun mulat harṣaṅkv ânuculî talinya tumuluy kinisapu hiniḍəp-hiḍəp kita tan pātmâkv amacânaṅis katitisan luh araras ikaṅ akṣarâmanis 7

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


saṅ apiṇḍa* madhubrata taruṇa manəhta savaṅ salaga vinaraṅ-varaṅ iṅ masa kapat alaṅə̄ kararas-rarasan irikā ta tuvuhkv asana vavaṅ alum kita kāry anaṅis maluyā sahanêṅ katiga kaka maran ṅvaṅ atəmva muvah 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

kaka yan kita lūha niṅ amaca vilāpa suval piniṅit təmahaṅkva taṅisnya vinuni sinamar-samar iṅ kakavin yan adadyana ketaka kita təmahaṅkva tulisnya ṭikā kaka de ni laraṅkva pinasahakən iṅ Vidhi niṣkaraṇa 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


vruh kv î tan vənaṅanta dhāraka kumə̄lakəna* lulut unəṅta ri ṅhulun vvat niṅ lvah luh ariṅguṅan havana saṅ prabhu tumutur i līna ni ṅhulun tiṅhaltê lara ni ṅhulun vinaṅun akṣara rasa kakavin* pralāpita byaktâdadyana luh tuturta ri hatinta yak amaca ri lambaṅ i ṅhulun 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

saṅ kārî nagari ndi sihta vinaliṅku tumuta saparanku tan saha ry antuk ni ṅhulun iṅ surālaya təvək niṅ anaṅis apasah lavan kita kālanta n* panulis karas mvaṅ aṅikir tanah i kuku ya konəṅ i ṅhulun kāpan svāmi muvah ṅhulun varahananta kakavin anəhər pinaṅkvakən 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

lāvan pājara ni ṅhulun hana gaḍuṅ lumuṅ avarah i tiṅkah iṅ hənū makveh luṅnya hanan paṅulvan aṅalor hana lumuṅ aṅidul ya tan tutən vvantən luṅgah ikâṅavetan amənər səkar ika kadi kəmbaṅ iṅ laṅit aṅhiṅ tūtakənanta riṅ gagana Nandanavana tinujunya nora len 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


yayi rasa ni palambaṅtêki mār ṅhulun amaca muvah inənahakənku ry uṅgvanyâlavas alaṅə̄ lumaku-laku tumolih rākantêbu karakətan pavarah ika tinūtkv induṅ maṅke* n təka ri kita 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

tarima yayi paṅolkv î rakryan kuṅkv amarəpəhi syapa parana ni rāgaṅku n harṣaṅku katulaka hənəṅakəna taṅankv âmet-met mogha kajənəkan sapamalaku niṅ onəṅ rakryan hayva pinihəran 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


rakryan hayva kitâṅhəmū guyu nəhər miṅay amiru-mirū tapih lukar rəñcəm tvasku mulat raras paran ikā ṅaran ika ləṅəṅ aṅligā təṅah ndan mogârəṅu tan tulus vaśa kita n paṅutu taṅan inambilan tapih māskv akras karikā manis-manis i denta lumiriṅ anamar* linurvakən 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


nāhan paṅucap-ucap irêṅ taman sinəlaṅan prəman uvat iṅ akuṅ sasvarga paḍa sukha tumon i ramya ni papaṅgih ira silih asih ṅūnî səḍəṅ ira ratu cakravarti sukha niṅ ratu tinəmu nira maṅke n sukha riṅ amaraloka maṅdaśaguṇê sukha nira mava* rāt 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

riṅ Nandanavana sira karva raśmi niṅ asaṅgama hinarəp ira riṅ pūrṇama mijil amaḍaṅ vulan sira marêṅ taman aṭika-ṭikan riṅ svapna tuvi sira yayâmanəh-manəhi rāga nira tan avanəh kiṅkiṅ ni hati nira miniśra kāraṇa ni tuṅgal i turida nira 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

riṅ Nandanavana vəkas iṅ kathā Sumanasāntaka riṅ aji Raghu pinrākr̥ta rasa kakavin tinīrthakən i jə̄ṅ nr̥pati rasa laṅə̄ sih kāraṇa nira n anumāna mājara rikaṅ paṅikət amanisa śuddhāmr̥ta varah ira hetu niṅ kadi gaḍuṅ lumuṅ anəmu kapat 3

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition


sampun kekətan iṅ kathā Sumanasāntaka vinaṅun ahəmbanan laṅə̄ kāla śrîndumatī lavan saṅ Aja mantuk iṅ amarapadâkurən muvah yêki tambay ira mpu Monaguṇa milv aṅikət-ikət amarṇana ṅ kathā ṅhiṅ śrī Varṣajaya prasiddha guru niṅ guru-laghu sira hantusâmuruk 1

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition

dīrghāyuṣya janapriyā saṅ amacâmahiḍəpakəna saṅ harəp vruha nirvighnâstu saṅ aṅrəṅə̄ sakaharəp nira katəkana mogha sanmatan salvir saṅ makapustaka ṅ Sumanasāntaka kasihana de nareśvara siddhi mpuṅkv i garuṅ tirun saṅ anulis katəkana sasinādhya saṅ viku 2

Translation

No translation available yet for this part of the edition
